123a2('dul ba): /sdom la/bya rog spyod dang sun phyung dang //rku thabs gnas dang
123a3('dul ba): ni rab tu dbyung bar bya ste/'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o//
123a4('dul ba): slo skyes pa mi rgyus nas na gan la ma dzin po de la chu ba kyi
123b1('dul ba): dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i sring mo'i bu gnyis shig pha mas bor nas de dang don 'khyams pa las/mnyan yod kyi tshong pa dag zong thogs te ser skya'i gnasu dong ba dang /de dag gis de
123b2('dul ba): gnyis bzhin gzugs las ngo shes nas smras pa/khye'u gnyis khyod kyi pha ma gnyis gang na/de gnyis kyis smras pa/'phags skyes po mo gti mug can gyis bas do//mnyan
123b3('dul ba): yad na khyed gnyis kyi zhang po btsun pa kun dga' bo zhes bya ba dge slong rab tu grags pa 'dug na ci'i phyir der mi 'dong /de gnyis kyis smras pa/kho bo cag su zhig gis der khrid
123b4('dul ba): par 'gyur/kho bo cag gis bkri'o//de dag gis zong bsgyur nas rin blangs te/khye'u de gnyis khrid nas mnyan yod du song ste/de dag gis khye'u de gnyis rgyal byed kyi tshal
123b5('dul ba): gyi sgor bor ba dang /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos de gnyis bzhin gzugs los ngo shes nas des smras pa/khye'u gnyis kyi ba ma gnyis gang na de gnyis kyis smras pa/'phags
123b6('dul ba): skyes po mi gti mug can gyis bas do//tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo nye du la mnyes gshin pa yin pas/des nye du dang bral ba thos nas mtshe mas banangs te 'dug/dge slong rnams
123b7('dul ba): kyis de la smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo khyod kyi khye'u 'di gnyi suM dag yin/sring mo'i bu dngo//khyod ci'i phyir 'di gnyis sdud par mi byed/des smras pa/kho bo ni lha
124a1('dul ba): 'drangs tsam gyis bsod snyoms blangs nas phyir 'byung na//dngos 'di gnyis la gang nas sbyin/de dag gis smras pa/khye'u 'di gnyis kyis dge slong dag pa
124a2('dul ba): lo ma dang me tog dang 'bras bu dag 'dul na/dge slong dag kyang 'od gnyis la lhung bzed kyi lhag ma sbyin par 'gyur ro//des de gnyis bsdus nos dge slong dag la lo ma dang me tog
124a3('dul ba): dang /'bras bu dag 'dul du gzhug par brtsams pa dang /dge slong dag kyang de gnyis la lhung bzed kyi lhag ma sbyin par byed//de dag gis de gnyis la zhag nyung shas shig
124a4('dul ba): byin nas/yung mi sbyin par rnams pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' ba ste 'brangs tsam gyi bsod snyams blangs nas/phyir 'byung bar byed cing /de byed ni bdag nyid zab
124a5('dul ba): spyod/byed ni de gnyis la sbyin par byed pa na/skya bo bseng bsed par ring ba dang /nyam chung bu dang /rke ba dang /skam pa dang /lus ma thob par gyur to//sangs rgyas bcom
124a6('dul ba): skyon 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste/mkhyen bzhin du rmed/mkhyen kyang mi rmed pa/dus rmed pa dang /dus las yol bar ma rmed pa/sman dang ljon pa rmed pa/
124a7('dul ba): don dang mo ldan pa mi rmod pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni don dang mi ldan pa rjod pa la chu lan gyis zlog par mdzad pa yino//de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
124b1('dul ba): rnams ni don dang ldan pa rmed pa la dus mkhyen pa yin pas/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la rmas pa/dge slong dag ci'i phyir dge slong kun dga' bo skya bo bsang
124b2('dul ba): bseng po rid pa dang /nyam chung ba dang /rke ba dang /skam pa dang /lus ma thob par gyur/de dag gis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das tshe dang ljon pa kun dga' bo'i sring mo'i bu gnyis
124b3('dul ba): shig pha mas bor nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo g.yar bltam pa tsam gyi bsod snyoms blangs nas/slar 'byung zhing de phyed ni bdag nyid 'tshal bar bgyid/phyed ni de gnyis la stsol
124b4('dul ba): bas/des na tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo 'di ska bo bseng bseng po rid pa dang /nyam chung ba dang /rke ba dang /skam pa dang /lus ma thob par gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe
124b5('dul ba): dang ldan pa kun dga' ba la bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo khye'u de gnyis rab tu mi 'byin tam/bcom ldan 'das rab tu 'byin to//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/de lta bas
124b6('dul ba): na/rab tu 'byung bar 'dod pa dge 'dun gyis zas sbyin par rje su gnang ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyis rab tu 'byung bar 'dod po dge 'dun gyis zas sbyin par bya'o//zhes bka' stsal nas/
124b7('dul ba): dge slong dag gis zhag nyung shas shig byin nas smod par brtsamaso//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' ba la yang lan gnyisu bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo khye'u
125a1('dul ba): de gnyis rab tu mi 'byin tam/btsun pa de gnyis kyis dgung lo bco lnga ma lagaso//khye'u de gnyis kyis dge 'dun gyi skos mal nas/bya rog spyod nus sam/
125a2('dul ba): btsun pa rngo thog/kun dga' bo de lta bos na lo bdun len pa bya rog skrod nus pa yongasu spang bas rab tu dbyung bar rje su gnang ngo //tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos de gnyis rab tu phyung
125a3('dul ba): ngongo//rab tu phyung nas klog tu gzhug par brtsams pa dang /de gnyis kyis zhag nyung shas shig glags nas/mi nyen par brtsams pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen
125a4('dul ba): pos/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dge tshul 'di gnyis ci'i phyir klog tu mi gzhug/des smras pa/gnas brtan bdag la mnyan par mi
125a5('dul ba): bya bar sems na bdag gis ji ltar bya/bdag gis 'di gnyis klog tu gzhug/des smras pa/gonas brtan de bzhin gyis shig/des de gnyis glog tu gzhug par brnam so//
125a6('dul ba): de gnyis kyis de la yang zhag nyung shos shig blags nas/de la yang me nyan par brtsams pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos smras pa/gnas brtan dge tshul 'di gnyis
125a7('dul ba): ci'i phyir klog tu mi gzhug/des smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo 'di gnyis kyis bdag la yang mi nyan par brtsams//tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos smras pa/gnas
125b1('dul ba): brtan dge tshul 'di gnyis re shig yid byung bar gyis shig/tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos de gnyis la smras pa/dge tshul gnyis nyin mo spyod du 'dong ngo //de gnyis kyis
125b2('dul ba): smras pa/'phags pa bzhud do//stan khyer cig tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos dge tshul de gnyis khrid nas nyin mo spyod du song //de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen
125b3('dul ba): pos phyogs gcig tu sems can dmyal ba dag sprul te/de na gcod pa dang /gsheg pa dang /rdung ba dang /'dral ba lo sogs pa'i sgra dag grago/de gnyis kyis smras pa/
125b4('dul ba): 'dugos pa 'di ci lags/des smras pa/deng l-i ltos shig/de gnyis der dong ba dang ji tsam na gcod pa dang /gsheg pa dang /rdung ba dang /'dral ba la sogs pa'i las dag byed
125b5('dul ba): cing de na kha cig ni sog le dag gis gshegs par byed/kha cig ni rang thag gis 'thag par byed/kha cig ni zangs po che khel ba dag gi nang du 'jug par byed/de na lcags kyi zangs
125b6('dul ba): po che gnyis shig khol zhing 'dug pa mthong nas/de gnyis kyis smras pa/shes ldan dag 'di gnyis su yang mi gzhug gam/de dag gis smras pa/su yang mi gzhug ste/'di
125b7('dul ba): ltar 'phags pa kun dga' bo'i sring mo'i bu gnyis rab tu byung nas le los 'da' bar byed pa de gnyis shi zhing dus la bab na/'dir skye bar 'gyur bas de gnyis kyi don du bzhag
126a1('dul ba): de gnyis shin tu skrag nas gal te/shes na de nyid du gzhug par 'ong ngo snyam nas/phyogs bzhir rnam par blta bar brtsams nas/de gnyis tshe dang ldan pa
126a2('dul ba): mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po'i gan du dong ba dang /tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos smras pa/khyed kyis mthong ngam/'phags pa mthong ngo //de na ci yod/sems can dmyal
126a3('dul ba): bdag mchis//de na ci byed/de gnyis kyis smras pa/gcod pa dang /gsheg pa dang /rdung ba dang /'dral ba la sogs pa'i las dag bgyid cing /de na kha cig ni srog mo
126a4('dul ba): dag gis gshag par byed/kha cig ni rang thag dag gis 'thag par bgyid/kha cig ni zangs po che khol ba dag gi nang du stsol bar bgyidade/de na lcags kyi zangs po che gnyis shig
126a5('dul ba): khol ba mchis pa mthong nas/bdag cag gis shes ldan dag 'di gnyisu su yang mi gzhug gam zhes bgyis na/de dag gis mchid nas su yang mi gzhug ste/'di ltar 'phags
126a6('dul ba): pa kun dga' bo'i sring mo'i bu gnyis rab tu byung nas/le los 'da' bar byed pa de gnyis shi zhing dus la bab na/'dir skye bar 'gyur ba de gnyis kyi don du gzhag zhes mtsho'o//
126a7('dul ba): dge tshul gnyis de ltar na nyi dmigs 'di dag dang /gzhan dag kyang le los 'byung bar 'gyur bas brtson 'grus gyis shog/de gnyis brtson 'grus rtsom pas klag par bya bar
126b1('dul ba): brtsams shing /gal te snga dro sems can dmyal ba dran na ni zan za bar yang mi byed la/gal te phyi dro dran na ni zan de skyug par 'gyur bas/de gnyis skya bo bsang bsong po rid pa dang /
126b2('dul ba): nyam chung ba dang /rko ba dang /skam pa dang /lus ma thob par gyur na/des smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo de gnyis yid byung bar byas zin to//gnas brtan 'di gzeng stod
126b3('dul ba): cig/tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos de gnyis la smras pa/dge tshul gnyis nyin mo spyod du 'deng //de gnyis kyis smras pa/'phags pa bzhud/phyogs gzhan du bzhud
126b4('dul ba): kyi der ni mi bzhud//stan khyer cig/de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos de gnyis khrid nas nyin mo spyod du song //de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos phyogs
126b5('dul ba): gcig tu lha dag sprul te/de ni pi wang dang 'o ma dang ba la ri dang /ma ha ti dang /su g+ho sha ka dag gi sgra dag grago/de gnyis kyis smras pa/'phags pa 'di ci lags/des smras
126b6('dul ba): pa/deng la ltos shig/de gnyis der dad pa dang /ji tsam na pi wang dang 'o ma dang ba la ri dang /ma ha ti dang /su g+ho sha ka dag gi sgra dag sgrogs shing /de nas gzhal med khang
126b7('dul ba): mal cha dang /stan bshams pa lha'i bu mo dag gis yongasu gang ba gnyis shig yod/de gnyis na lha'i bu su yang mi 'dug pa mthong nas/de gnyis kyis smras pa/shes
127a1('dul ba): ldan dag ci'i phyir gzhal med khang 'di gnyis na lha'i bu su yang mi 'dug/de dag gis smras pa/su yang mi 'dug/ci'i phyir de dag gis smras pa/'phags pa
127a2('dul ba): kun dga' bo'i sring mo'i bu gnyis rab tu byung nas/brtson 'grus brtsams shing spyod pa de gnyis shi zhing dus la bdan 'dir skye bar 'gyur bas de gnyis kyi don du bzha'o//de
127a3('dul ba): gnyis yongasu dga' nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po'i gan du dong ba dang /tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos de gnyis la smras pa/khyed kyis mthong ngam/
127a4('dul ba): 'phags pa mthong ngo //de na ci yod/lha dag mchiso//de na ci byed/de gnyis kyis smras pa/pi wang dang 'o ma dang ba la rI dang /ma hi ti dang /su g+ho sha ka dag gi sgra
127a5('dul ba): ngag sgrogs shing /de na gzhal med khang mal cha dang stan bshamos pa/lha'i bu mo dag gis yongasu gang ba gnyis shig mchis te/de gnyis na lha'i bu suM yang ma mchis pa
127a6('dul ba): mthong nas/bdag cag gnyis kyis shes ldan dag ci'i phyir gzhal med khar 'di gnyis na/lha'i bu su yang mi 'dug ces bgyis na/de dag gis mchid nas yang mi 'dug//
127a7('dul ba): ci'i phyir zhes bgyis na/de dag gi mchid nas/'phags pa kun dga' bo'i sring mo'i bu gnyis rab tu byung nas/brtson 'grus brtsams shing spyod pa de gnyis shi zhing dus la
127b1('dul ba): bab na 'dir skye bar 'gyur bas/de gnyis kyi don du gzhag go zhes mchi'o//dge tshul gnyis de ltar na phan yon 'di dag dang gzhan dag kyang brtson 'grus brtsams pa las byung bar 'gyur/
127b2('dul ba): bas brtson 'grus gyis shig//'dul ba gzhi/bam po brgyad pa/de gnyis brtson 'grus rtsom pas klag par bya bar brtsams te/lung nod pa dang /ji tsam
127b3('dul ba): na gleng gzhi dang /yang dag par ldan pa'i rgyud du gtogs pa las/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag gis sen mo'i rtse mos rdul dge bzhes nas/dge slong rnams la bka' stsal
127b4('dul ba): pa/dge slong dag de ji snyam du sems/ngas sen mo'i rtse mo'i rdul dag blangs pa gang dag yin pa dang /sa la gnas pa'i rdul gang dag yin pa de dag gang mang snyam/btsun pa
127b5('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag gi sen mo'i rtse mos rdul dag bzhes pa gang dag la lags pa de dag ni nyung ba dang /nyung ngu dang //nyung shas dang /nyung zad lags te/de dag dog sa la
127b6('dul ba): gnas pa'i rdul dang /bskrun na brgya'i char yang nye bar mi mchi/stong gi cha dang brgya stong gi cha dang /grangs dang cha dang bgrang ba dang /dpe dang rgyur yang nye bar ma mchi'o//bcom ldan
127b7('dul ba): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag sa la gnas pa'i rdul ji snyed pa de snyed kyi sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi nang nas shi 'phos te/sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi nang du skye bar
128a1('dul ba): 'gyur gyi/se num brtse mo la gnas pa'i rdul dag ji snyed pa de skyed kyi sems can dag ni sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi nang nas she 'das te/mi rnams kyi nang du sgra
128a2('dul ba): bar 'gyur//sa la gnas pa'i rdul dag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi sems can dag ni sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi nang nas shi 'phos te/dud 'gro rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur gyi/san
128a3('dul ba): mo'i rje ma la gnas pa'i rdul dag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi sems can dag ni sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi nang nas shi 'phos te/mi rnams kyi rlung du skye bar 'gyuraro//sa la gnas pa'i rdul
128a4('dul ba): dag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi sems can dag ni sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi nang nas shi 'obs te/yi dwags rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur gyi/son mo'i rtse mo lnga gnas nga'i rdul dag ji
128a5('dul ba): snyed pa de snyed kyi sems can dag ni sems can dmyal po rnams kyi nang nas shi 'phos te/mi rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro//sa la gnas pa'i rdul dag ji skad pa de snyed kyi sems
128a6('dul ba): tsacan dag ni sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi nang nas shi 'phos te sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur gyi/sen mo'i rtse mo la gnas pa'i rdul dag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi sems
128a7('dul ba): can dag ni sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi nang nas shi 'phos te/lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'argyu/sa la gnas pa'i rdul dag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi sems can dag ni sems can
128b1('dul ba): dmyal ba rnams kyi nang nas shi 'phos te/dud 'gro rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur gyi/sen mo'i rtse mo la gnas pa'i rdul de dag ji skyed pa de snyed kyi sems can dag ni sems can dmyal ba rnams
128b2('dul ba): kyi nang nas shi 'phos te/lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro//sau la gnas pa'i rdul dag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi sems can dag ni sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi nang nas shi 'phos te/yi dgas
128b3('dul ba): rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur gyi/sen mo'i rtse mo la gnas pa'i rdul ngag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi sems can dag ni sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi nang nas shi 'phos te/lha rnams kyi nang du
128b4('dul ba): skye bar 'gyuraro//sa la gnas pa'i rdul dag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi sems can dag ni dud 'gro rnams kyi nang nas shi 'phos te/dud 'gro rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur gyi/sen mo'i rtse
128b5('dul ba): mo la gnas pa'i rdul dag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi sems can dag ni dud 'gro rnams kyi nang nas shi 'phos te/mi rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyuraro//sa la gnas pa'i rdul dag ji snyed pa de snyed
128b6('dul ba): kyi sems can dag ni dud 'gro rnams kyi nang nas shi 'phos te/sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur gyi/sen mo'i rtse mo la gnas pa'i rdul dag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi sems can
128b7('dul ba): dag ni dud 'gro rnams kyi nang nas shi 'phos te/mi rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur//sa la gnos pa'i rdul dag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi sems can dag ni dud 'gro rnams kyi nang nas shi
129a1('dul ba): 'phos te/yi dgas rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur gyi/sen mo'i rtse mo la gnas pa'i rdul dag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi sems can dag ni dud 'gro rnams kyi nang nus
129a2('dul ba): shi 'phos te/mi rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyuraro//sa la gnas pa'i rdul dag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi sems can dag ni dud 'gro rnams kyi nang nas shi 'phos te/dud 'gro rnams kyi nang
129a3('dul ba): du skye bar 'gyur gyi/sen mo'i rtse mo la gnas pa'i rdul dag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi sems can dag ni dud 'gro rnams kyi nang nas shi 'ongs te/lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyuraro//
129a4('dul ba): sa la gnas pa'i rdul dag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi sems can dag ni dud 'gro rnams kyi nang nas shi 'phos te/sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur gyi/sen mo'i rtse mo
129a5('dul ba): la gnas pa'i rdul dag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi sems can dang /ni dud 'gro rnams kyi nang nas shrI 'phos te/lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro//sa la gnas pa'i rdul dag ji snyed pa
129a6('dul ba): de snyed kyi sems can dag ni dud 'gro rnams kyi nang nas shi 'phos te/yi dgas rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur gyi/srin mo'i rtse mo la gnas pa'i rdul dgra ji snyed pa de snyed kyi seMn
129a7('dul ba): dag ni dud 'gro rnams kyi nang nas sho 'phos te/lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyuraro//se la gnas nga'i rdul dag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi sems can dag ni/yi dgas rnams
129b1('dul ba): ma na dzi te/yo gas rnams gyon du rgyur 'gyur gyi/sen mo'i tsa mo la gnas pa'i sa dzind pa de d+had kyimamasna can dag ni mi ga sa rnams kyinang nas sha 'ongs
129b2('dul ba): to/mi rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro//sa lo gnas pa'i rdul dag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi sems can dag ni yi dgos rnams kyi nang nas shi 'jos te/sems can dmyal ba
129b3('dul ba): rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur gyi/sen mo'i rtse mo la gnas pa'i rdul dag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi sems can dag ni yi dgas rnams kyi nang nas shing phos te/mi rnams kyi nang du
129b4('dul ba): skye bar 'gyur//sa la gnas pa'i rdul dag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi sems can dag ni yi dgos rnams kyi nang nas shi 'phros te/dud 'gro rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur gyi/seMn
129b5('dul ba): mr-i'i rtse mo la gnas pa'i rdul dag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi sems can dag mi yi dgas rnams kyi nang nas shi 'phos te/mi rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur//sa la gnas pa'i rdul dag
129b6('dul ba): rje skyed pa de snyed kyi sems can dag ni yi dgas rnams kyi nang nas shi 'phos te/yi dgras rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur gyi/sen mo'i rtse mo la gnas bu'i rdul dag ji snyed pa de snyed
129b7('dul ba): kyi sems can dag ni yi dgas rnams kyi nang nas shi ros te/lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyuraro//sa la gnas pa'i rdul dag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi sems can dag ni yi dgas
130a1('dul ba): rnams kyi nang nas shi 'phos te/sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur gyi/sen mo'i rlo mo la gnas pa'i rdul dag skyed pa de snyed kyi sems can dag ni
130a2('dul ba): yi dgas rnams kyi nang nas shi 'phos te/lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyu ro//sa la gnas pa'i rdul dag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi sems can dag ni/yi dgas rnams kyi nang nas shi 'angs
130a3('dul ba): /dud 'gro rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur gyi/sen mo'i rtse mo la gnas pa'i rdul dag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi sems can dag ni/yi dgas rnams kyi nang nas shi 'phos te/lha rnams
130a4('dul ba): sprinang du skyo bar 'gyur//so la gnas pa'i rdul dag ji rnyed pa de snyed kyi sems can dag ni/lha rnams kyi nang nas shi 'phos te/sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur
130a5('dul ba): gyi/srin mo'i rje mo la gnas pa'i rdul dag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi sems can dag ni/lha rnams kyi nang nas shi 'phos te/lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyuraro//sa la gnas po'i rdul
130a6('dul ba): drug ji snyed pa de snyed kyi sems can dag ni/lha rnams kyi nang nas shi 'obs te/dud 'gro rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur gyi/sen mo'i rje mo la gnas pa'i rdul dag ji snyed pa de skad
130a7('dul ba): kyi sems can dag ni/lha rnams kyi nang nas shi 'phos te/lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur//sa lo gnas pa'i rdul dag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi sems can dag ni/lha rnams
130b1('dul ba): kyi nang nas shi 'phos te/yi dgas rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyuraro//sen mo'i rtse mo la gnas pa'i rdul dag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi sems can dag ni/lha rnams kyi nang nas shi 'phos te/
130b2('dul ba): rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro//sa la gnas pa'i rdul dag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi sems can dag ni/mi rnams kyi nang nas shi 'phos te/sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur
130b3('dul ba): gyi/sen mo'i rtse mo la gnas pa'i rdul dag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi sems can dag ni/mi rnams kyi nang nas shi 'phos te/mi rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyuraro//sa la gnas pa'i rdul dag rdza
130b4('dul ba): snyed pa de snyed kyi sems can dag ni mi rnams kyi nang nas shi 'phos te/dud 'gro rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur gyi/sen mo'i rtse mo la gnas pa'i rdul dag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi sems can
130b5('dul ba): dag ni/mi rnams kyi nang nas shi 'phos te/mi rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyuraro//sa la gnas pa'i rdul dag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi sems can dag ni/mi rnams kyi nang nas shi 'phos
130b6('dul ba): te/yi dgas rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur gyi/sen mo'i rtse mo la gnas pa'i rdul dag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi sems can dag ni/mi rnams kyi nang nas shi 'phos te/mi rnams kyi nang
130b7('dul ba): du skye bar 'gyur//zhes gsungs pa/'khor lo bzhin du sbyar ba blags pa dang /de gnyis kyis smras pa/'phags pa bdag cag gi snga lha dang mi rnams kyi nang nas shi 'phos te
131a1('dul ba): sems can dmyal ba dang /dud 'gro dang /yi dgas rnams kyi nang du skye bar bgyi 'am/des smras pa/bzhin bzangs gnyis 'gro ba lnga po'i 'khor bar ji srid
131a2('dul ba): du nyon mongs pa rnams rgyun chad par ma gyur pa de srid du/zo chun rgyud mo'i tshul gyis yongasu 'khor bar bya dgos//de gnyis yid byung nas tshig su bcad smras pa/gang phyir mi rnams
131a3('dul ba): lha rnams mi bzang ste//'tsho ba thung ba'i mi rnams mi bzang ngo //gang na zhi med srid pa mi bzang ste//mya ngan 'das pa mchog ces bde gshegs gsungs//'phags po ci nas kyang
131a4('dul ba): bdag 'khor bar 'khor na slan chad nyon mongs pa de lta bu dag kun tu spyod par mi 'gyur ba de ltar bdag cig la chos bstan du gsol/tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos de
131a5('dul ba): gnyis kyi bsam pa dang /bag la nyal ba dang /khams dang /rang bzhin khong du chud nas gang thos nas de gnyis kyis nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas/dgra bcom
131a6('dul ba): pa nyid mngon du byas te/dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa las 'dod chags dang bral ba/bde ba dang gser du mnyam pa/na mkha' dang lag mthil du mtshungs pa'i sems dang ldan
131a7('dul ba): pa/cen don dang sto'ur mnyam pa/rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs dral bar gyur cing /rig pa dang /mngon par shes pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/srid pa dang
131b1('dul ba): 'dod pa'i rnyed pa dang /bkur sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa/dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod par bya ba dang /rjed par bya ba dang /mngon du slu bar bya bar gyur pa
131b2('dul ba): de lta bu'i chos bstan pa byas so//de gnyis rdzu 'phrul gyis steng gi na mkha' la me tog dag thu zhing 'dong pa dge slong rnams kyis mthong nas/de dag gis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa dag
131b3('dul ba): 'di gnyis gang dag yi nau/che ge mo dang che ge ma yin no//de dag gis smras pa/bdag cag lhung bzed nag por zos nas so dag lhung zhing mgo skya bor gyur kyang /bdag cag gis
131b4('dul ba): sems rtsa gcig pa yang ma thob na/tshe dang ldan pa 'di gnyis dang po lo bdun kho na lon pa rab tu byung na/nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du byas pas
131b5('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo brtson 'grus kyis byang chub thob zhes bka' stsal pa/de ni legs par gsungs pa yino//dge slong rnams the tsom skyes nas/the tsom thams cad
131b6('dul ba): gcod pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus po/btsun pa dge tshul 'di gnyis kyis las tsa zhig bgyis nu las de'i rnam par smin pas lo bdun kho na lags na/rab tu byung ste/
131b7('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis 'byung ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi btsa' ba mdzad pa gang lags pa de 'di gnyis kho na la brten nas bag yang su mdzad cing /nyon mongs pa thams ca
132a1('dul ba): sbyangs ngas dgra rtsam pad mngan du bgyis/bcom ldan das sa go/ stsa ba/dag slong dag 'dri gnyis nyid kyis las tshogs rnyed pa snron sa smra gyur
132a2('dul ba): /'od ba bzhin du nye bar gnas pa/gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba dag byas shing bsags pas/'di gnyis nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan su zheg
132a3('dul ba): gis myong bar 'gyur/dge sbyong dag las byas shing bsags pa dag ni/byi ma gyos ni khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/chu ga khams la mi 'gyur/me'i khams lam
132a4('dul ba): 'gyur/rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur gyi/'di ltar las dge 'dung/po dge 'byas shing bsags ni nini de'i thung ba dang /khams dang skye mched dag la rnam par smin par
132a5('dul ba): 'gyur te/lus rnams bskul pa brgyur yang ni//chung mi zang 'ang tshogs dang dus//rnyed na lus can rnams la ni//'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid//dge slong dag sngon byung ba bskul
132a6('dul ba): pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dguni tshal nyi khri thub pa na/ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa /ji tsam pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhang su ldan pa/bde bar gshegs
132a7('dul ba): pa/'jig rten mi smyon pa/skyes du 'dul ba'i kham sbyar ba/blan med pa lta dang marnams kyi ston te/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung 'jig rten du byung ste/de da/
132b1('dul ba): slong gi 'khor nyi khri dang /bA rA nA si na drang srong smra bar dgas kyi nags na nye bar rten cing bzhug so//bar na si no khyim bdagu phan tshun ba shes pa gnyis shig gzhan nu'i gnas skabasu rab tu
132b2('dul ba): 'byung bar 'dod na/de gnyis kyis nye du dag yis rab tu 'byung bar ma thob nas/gang gi tshe lang tsho yol bar gyur pa de'i tshe na/de gnyis kyis nye du dag la bltas te/yang dag par
132b3('dul ba): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la rab tu byung //'di ni chos nyid de rtag tu gzhon rims kyis las bya ba yin pas/dge slong rnams kyis rgan zhugs 'di gnyis deng shig/
132b4('dul ba): rgan zhugs 'di gnyis 'khod cig ces bsgo'o//den cig ni spro ring ba'i rang bzhin can yin cig shos ni spro thung ba'i rang bzhin can yin pas/de khro bar byed pa dang /cig shes kyis
132b5('dul ba): smras pa/rgan zhugs gzhon pa'i gnas skabasu rab tu ma byung na/de ci'i phyir khro de na 'di gnyis kyis tshe ji srid par tshangs par spyod pa spyad na/yon tan gyi tshogs 'ga' yang ma thob
132b6('dul ba): nas/de'i 'og tu 'chi ba'i tshe smon lam 'di skad ces bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dang par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon gnas bla na med
132b7('dul ba): pa'od srung la tshe ji srid par tshangs par spyod pa spyad na/yon tan gyi tshogs 'ga' yang ma thob ste/bdag cag gis ni tshe ji srid par tshangs par spyod pa spyod pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis/
133a1('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis/bram ze'i khye'u bla ma la bram ze'i khye'u khyod ma
133a2('dul ba): 'ongs pa'i dus na/skye dgu'i tshol brgya thub pa na/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhab su ldan pa/bode par gshe
133a3('dul ba): pa/'jig rten ma khyen pa/skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur zhes/
133a4('dul ba): lung bstan pa de'i bstan pa la bodag tsug lo bdun kho na lon pa rab tu byung ste/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs po'i sangs rgyas mkhye
133a5('dul ba): cing gzigs pa des 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi btsa' ba mdzad pa gang yin pa de/bdag cag gnyis kho na la brten nas bag yang su mdzad cing /nyon mongs
133a6('dul ba): pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du gyur cig ces gdab par brtsamaso//dge slong dag de la de'i tshe de'i dus na/khye'u gnyis gang dag yin pa de dag ni dge
133a7('dul ba): tshul 'di gnyis yin te/de gnyis kyis der smon lam btab pa gang yin pa des da ltar lo bdun kho na yin nas rab tu byung ste/ngas 'dub ba lo nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gan
133b1('dul ba): pa gang yin pa 'di gnyis kho na la brten nas bag yang su byas shing /nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du byas//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yul ka shau dag
133b2('dul ba): tuljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa ni phyogs gcig tu byon pa dong /'dzum pa mdzad//chos nyid kyis nu gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe na/zhal nas 'di zer
133b3('dul ba): sngon po dang /ser po dang /dmar po dang /dkar po dang /btsod ka dang /shel dang dngul gyi kha dog lta bu dag byung nas/kha cig ni 'og logasu 'dong /kha cig ni steng phyogasu 'dod
133b4('dul ba): bas gang dag 'og log su 'dong ba de dag ni/sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang /thig nag dang /bsdus gzhom dang /ngu 'bod dang /ngu 'bod chen po dang /che ba dang /rab tu
133b5('dul ba): tsha ba dang /mnar med pa dang /chu bur can dang /chu bur rdol ba dang /so thams thams dang /kyi hud zer ba dang /a chu zer ba dang /ud pal ltar gas pa dang /pad+ma ltar gas
133b6('dul ba): pa dang /pad+ma ltar gas pa chen por dong ste/sems can dmyal ba che ba gang dag yin pa de dag tu bsel bar gyur te/'bab par byed la sems can dmyal ba grang ba gang yin pa de dag tu
133b7('dul ba): dro bar gyur te/'bab par byed do//des sems can dmyal ba de dag gi gnod pa'i bye brag dag rgyun gcod par byed cing /de dag 'di snyam du shes ldan dag ci bdag cag 'di nas shi/
134a1('dul ba): 'phos sam/'on te gzhan du skyes snyam du sems//de dag dad pa skyed par bya ba'i phyir/bcom ldan 'das kyis sprul pa gtong bar mdzad/de dag gis sprul pa mthad/
134a2('dul ba): nas/'di snyam du shes ldan dag bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos pa yang ma yin la/gzhan du skyes po yang ma yin te/'di ltar sems can sngon ma mthong ba 'di'i mthus bdag cag
134a3('dul ba): gi gnod pa'i bye brag dag rkyen chad par gyur to snyam du semaso//de dag sprul pa la sems mngon par dad par gyur nas/sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad par
134a4('dul ba): byas nas gang du bden pa dag gi snod du gyur par 'gyur ba'i lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du nying mtshams sbyor ba len par byed//gang dag snying log su 'dong ba de dag ni rgyal chen ban
134a5('dul ba): po dang /sum cu rtsa gsum pa dang /'thab bral dang /dga' ldan dang /'dul dga' dang /gzhan 'dul dbang byed dang /tshangs ris dang /tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang /
134a6('dul ba): tshangs chen dang /'od rung dang /tshad med 'od dang /'od gsal dang /dge rlung dang /tshad med dge dang /dge rgyas dang /sprin med dang /bsod nams skyes dang /'dus
134a7('dul ba): bu che dang /michi ba dang /mi gdung ba dang /gya nom snang dang /shin tu mthong dang /'og min gyi lha rnams kyi nong du dang nas/mi rtag pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /
134b1('dul ba): sto pa dang /bdag med pa zhes bya ba'i sgra sgrogs par byed cing /tshig su bcad pa gnyis po//brtsam par bya zhing 'byung bar bya//sangs rgyas bstan la 'jug par bya//'dam du'i khyan
134b2('dul ba): na glang chen bzhin//'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par bya//gang zhig rab tu bag yod par//chos 'dul 'di la spyod 'gyur ba//skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas//sdug bsngal tha
134b3('dul ba): mar byed par 'gyur//zhes bya ba yang smraso//de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams byul nas/bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi slad bzhin rje su
134b4('dul ba): 'dong ste/de la bcom ldan 'das 'das pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni/bcom ldan 'das kyi snam log su nub par 'gyur ro//ma 'ongs pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni/mdun
134b5('dul ba): logasu nub par 'gyur ro//sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/zhabs kyi mthil du nub par 'gyur/dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/long bur
134b6('dul ba): nub par 'gyur/yi dwag su skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/zhabs kyi mthe bor nub par 'gyur/mir skye bar lung ston par bzhed na no/pus mor nub par 'gyur/stobs
134b7('dul ba): kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid du lung ston par bzhed na ni/phyag mthil g.yon par nub par 'gyur/'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid du lung ston par bzhed na ni/phyag mthil
135a1('dul ba): g.yas par nub par 'gyur/lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/lte bar nub par 'gyur/nyan thos kyi byang chub lung ston par bzhed na ni/zhal du nub par
135a2('dul ba): 'gyur/rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub lung ston par bzhed na ni/mdzod spur nub par 'gyur/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub lung ston par bzhed na ni/gtsug
135a3('dul ba): tor du nub par 'gyur ro//de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor pa byas te/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi mthil du nu'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das
135a4('dul ba): la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te zhus pa/btsun pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu ma mchis/rkyen ma mchi
135a5('dul ba): par 'dzum pa mi mjed na/btsun pa 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu ni gang lags/rkyen ni gang legs/tshig su bcad pa yang gsol pa/kha dog sna tshogs stong gis bkra ba yi//
135a6('dul ba): tshogs rnams zhal gyi sgo nas byung gyur te//de yis phyogs rnams thams cad snang bgyid pa//nyi gdugs brdal bar gyur pa ji bzhino//rgad bral zhum dang rgyags pa rab spangs/
135a7('dul ba): pa//sangs rgyas 'gro ba mchog gi rgyur gyur pa//rgyal ba dgra thul byed rgyu mi mchis par//rtsa lag dung ltar dkar 'dzum ston mi mdzad//de slad bstan po rang blo dus mkhyen
135b1('dul ba): nas//thub pa khyu mchog dge sbyong skye dbang ngo //nyan pa'i skye bo som nyi ldan rnams la//the tsom skyes pa gsung tshig brtan pa dang //dam pa dge ba dag gis bsal du gsol//cha chu ri rgyal
135b2('dul ba): lta bur brtan pa yi//sangs rgyas mgon rnams glo bur 'dzum mi ston//brtan pa ji smad 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa//skye bo'i tshogs rnams de ni nyan par 'tshal//bcom ldan 'das kyis
135b3('dul ba): bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/kun dga' ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni/rgyu med rkyen med
135b4('dul ba): par 'dzum pa mi mdzad de/kun dga' ba phyogs 'di nyid du g.yon can rab tu mang po dag gis dge slong ma rab tu mang po dag lus bskyod pas sun phyung ste/de dag 'di nas shi 'phos te sama?
135b5('dul ba): can dmyal ba rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur/de nas dge slong zhig gis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
135b6('dul ba): btsun pa g.yon can rab tu mang po dag gis/dge slong ma rab tu mang po dag lus bskyod pas sun phyung ba gang dag lags pa de dag gi nang nas gcig bdag lagaso//mi gti mug can
135b7('dul ba): khyod kyis kyang dge slong ma rab tu mang po dag lus bskyod pas sun byung ngam/btsun po bdag gis kyang dge slong ma rab tu mang po dag lus bskyod pas sun phyung //de nas bcom ldan
136a1('dul ba): 'das kyis dge slong rnams la ga//'asprul ba/dge slong dag gang zag drug dge slong ma spyan byung ban/chos 'dul pa 'di la mi skye ba'i chos can yin das dge slong
136a2('dul ba): dag/khyed kyis gang zag dge slong ma sun phyung ba/chos 'dul ba 'di las bskol bar bya'o//'ga' zhig gi gan du rab tu 'byung bar 'dod pa 'ongs na/des de la dge slong ma
136a3('dul ba): rgyu po ma yin na/ ba / sa par b+hU d+d+ha hrIn pa skye nu/ngas rgyun du / sa rgyas bcom ldan nas
136a4('dul ba): yod ni/rgyul byed kyitshil mgon med pos sbyin gyi kun dga' ri byin bzhugaso//mnyan yod na khyim bdagacig rgyu la byed kyi tshal du 'ang so//dge slong dag 'ad chags deng bral ba med
136a5('dul ba): na/dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba 'byin par bye/kha cig ni gzhan nu'i gnas skabasu myo 'byung nas rgan por gyur//kha cig ni rgud de'i gnas skabs na ltung ba 'byin par byed
136a6('dul ba): //de dag gis gang gi ge/slong med ste 'dzin pa dang /ma pa 'dzin pa dang /mam 'dzin pa rnams las thos pa de rdzun/chos bzhin du sgrub bar hU~M/de dog sa
136a7('dul ba): spro ba dang /mgu bar bya ba spyod zin/dge 'dun la rim gro byed cing dam kha cig ni badrung ba 'drim par byed//kha cig ni gsi pa yab thogs ti gi leb par byedado//ji tsam ni
136b1('dul ba): khyim bdag des de na gnas mal bzang po dag bshams shing kha zas bsod pa'i spyi bungs bshams pa mthong nas des bsams pa/'di dag gi chos ni bzang na/'di ltar 'di dag la skyon
136b2('dul ba): yang yod/'di dag la rjes dang /gus pa medade/rgan pa rgan pa dag las byed du 'jug snyam nas/de skad smras pa dang /drug sde dag gis thos nas/de dag gis smras pa/khyim
136b3('dul ba): bdag ci zer/'phags pa khyed cag gi chos ni bzang /'di ltar khyed cag la skyon yang mchiso//khyim bdag kho bo cag la skyon ci yod/des smras pa/'phags pa dag khyed cag la
136b4('dul ba): rjes dang /gus pa ma mchis te/rgan pa rgan pa dag las bgyid du stsol to//rgan pa dag la yang las byad du bzhug dgos pa yod//'phags pa dag khyed kyi nang du rab tu phyung
136b5('dul ba): na/da yang las bgyid du stsol tam/de dag gis smras pa/khyod pas gang ches khyad par du 'phags pa rab tu phyung na yang de yang nged kyi las byed du gzhug na/khyod lta ci smos/des
136b6('dul ba): bsams pa/gal te bdag 'di dag gi nang du rab tu byung na/bdag kyang 'di dag gi las byed du gzhug par 'gyur gyis/thabs kyi rnam pa zhig bya'o snyam//khyim bdag de mkhas pa'i rang
136b7('dul ba): bzhin can yin pas/des dge slong dag gi gan nas kun tu spyod pa'i chos dag bsla'o//bslabs nas mtha' 'khob cig tu song ste skra dang kha spyi bregs nas/gos ngur smrig dag bsgos te/
137a1('dul ba): 'dug pa dang /ji tsam na/dge slong mchod rten la phyag 'tshal ba dag phyogs de nas 'ong zhing 'gro bar byed pa de dag gis dri mthong nas smras pa/gnas brtan mnyan
137a2('dul ba): yod na chos kyi rje mngon sum du bzhugs shing /de na dus dang dus su lho'i gzugs dag kyang snang /snang ba rgya chen po dag kyang 'byung /lha'i sku dag kyang grag/kun shes pa brda'
137a3('dul ba): spyod pa dag kyang grag/longs spyod gnyis po zang zing gi longs spyod dang /chos kyi longs spyod kyang yod na/ci'i phyir mnyan yod du mi 'gro/des smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa dag 'di
137a4('dul ba): nyid du 'dug par bya'o//de dag gis de la yang dang yang du smras pa/gnas brtan mnyan yod na chos kyi rje mngon sum du bzhugs shing /de na dus dang dusu lha'i gzugs dag
137a5('dul ba): kyang snang /snang ba chen po dag kyang 'byung /lha'i sgra dag kyang grag/kun shes pa brda' sprod pa dag kyang grag/longs spyod gnyis po zang zing gi longs spyod dang /chos kyi longs
137a6('dul ba): spyod dag kyang yod na/ci'i phyir mnyan yod du mi 'gro/de tshangs par mtshungs par spyod pa dag gis dus bskyed pa na mnyan yod du song //ji tsam na des de na gnas mal bzang po
137a7('dul ba): bo shams shing kha zas bsod pa'i spyi bungs bshams pa mthong nas des bsams po/gal te bdag gral gyi dang por 'dug na ni/yon bshad par bya dgos par 'gyuraro//
137b1('dul ba): snyam nas des stan cig bor nas stan gnyis pa la 'dug go/tshe dang ldan pa kun shes ke'u di n+ya 'ongs nas/des bsams pa/bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag snam
137b2('dul ba): sbyar gyi rgyal mtshan 'chang ba rnams kyi mchog tu bstan na/'di su zhig yin snyam mo//ji tsam na bsams pa dang /rku thabs su gnas pa zhig yin par mthong nas/des
137b3('dul ba): de se gol gyi sgras skud do//tshe dang ldan pa rta thul dang /bzang ldan dang /rlangs pa dang /ming chen dang /grags pa dang /gang po dang /dri med dang /ba lang bdag dang /lag bzangs
137b4('dul ba): dang /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po dang /dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan thams cad kyis kyang se gol gyi sgras bskrad do//ji tsam na drug sde dag gi
137b5('dul ba): gan du song ba dang /de dag gis de la smras pa/gnas brtan khyod lo du lon/des na tshod kyi dbang du byas te/kho bo lo drug cu lon no zhes smras pa dang /de dag gis smras pa/bcom ldan 'das nyid
137b6('dul ba): kyis kyang lo drug cu ma bzhes na/'dis ga la lon/de dag gis de la smras pa/rgan zhugs khyod kyi mkhan po gang yin/des smras pa/dge sbyong go'u ta ma'i mkhan po gang yin/de dag gis smras pa/tshe dang
137b7('dul ba): ldan pa dag rgan zhugs 'di ni rang gis rtags blangs pa yino//zhes de dag gis de lag pa dang /rkang pa nas bzung ste/rgan pa'i mthar khrid nas smras pa/dge 'dun btsun
138a1('dul ba): /pa rnams gsan du gastsol/'jog rten na rang 'byung gcig ni bcom ldan 'das lags na/gnyis bya ni rgan zhugs 'di lags//'di ni gsol ba'o zhes
138a2('dul ba): smras nas/rkun pa'i mthu' nas bskyed do//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag gang zag tu sas su gnas pa ni chos 'dul ba 'di
138a3('dul ba): lo mi skye ba'i chos can yin pas/dge slong dag khyed kyis gang zag rku thab su gnas pa chos 'dul ba 'di las bsnyil bar bya'o//'ga' zhig gi gan du rab tu 'byung bar 'dod pa'ong
138a4('dul ba): na des de la rku thabasu gnas pa ma yin nam/zhes dro bar bya'o//ma dri bar rab tu 'byin par byed na/'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa
138a5('dul ba): nye bar 'khor gyis nus pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gang zag rku thab su gnas po bsnol bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal na/btsun pa ji tsam gyis na/gang zag tu thab su gan
138a6('dul ba): pa lags/nye bar 'khor gang tshun chad nas dge slong rang bzhin du gnas pa dag dang lhan cig gso sbyong gi las dag lan gnyis sam gsum nyam su myong bar gyur na/
138a7('dul ba): de tsam gyis na gang zag tu thabasu gnas pa yin//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyon yod na rgyal byed kyi tshol mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga'
138b1('dul ba): rab na bzhugs//mnyan yod na bram ze zhig 'dug pa des/rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/nge de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/dga' bar byed/dga' dgur spyod par byed/rtse bar
138b2('dul ba): byed dga' bar byed/dga' dgur spyod par byed pa de'i chung ma la sems can zhugs par gyur to//de zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'das te bcis pa las mo ning skyes pa 'dra bo bud med kyang ma yin//
138b3('dul ba): skyes pa yang ma yin pa zhig byung nas/bsrings shing bskyed cher gyur to//de khye'u dag dang lhan cig rtse bar byed pa na/de dag la mtshan ma ston par byed nas de dag gis de la smras pa/
138b4('dul ba): khyod ci yin des smras pa/bdag ma ning ngo //de dag gos smras pa/khyod ni bram ze yin pas khyod kyi khyim du mi snyan par grags par gyur na/mi rung gis de ltar ma byed cig/de dag
138b5('dul ba): gis de'i pha ma la smras pa/khyod kyi ma ning 'di ltar 'di lta byed kyis zlog shig/de dag gis de la smras pa/ma ning bdag cag ni bram ze yin pas bdag cag gi khyim du mi snyan pa grags
138b6('dul ba): par gyur na mi rung gis de ltar mi byed cig/de de dag gis bzlog kyang mi 'dug/de dus gzhan zhig na rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ba dang /ji tsam na des dge slong gzhon nu gzhon nu dag
138b7('dul ba): mthong na/des bsams pa/bdag 'di dag gi nang du rab tu 'byung na/'di dag bdag la skyes pa'i bya ba byed par 'gyur zhing /bdag kyang 'di dag la bud med kyi bye ba byed par
139a1('dul ba): 'gyuraro//snyam nas/dge slong gi gan du spong ste smras pa/'phags pa bdag rab tu 'byung bar 'tsha'o//des de la smras pa/khyod pha mas gnang ngam/des smras pa/ma
139a2('dul ba): gnang ngo //song la pha ma la gsol cig de pha ma'i gan du song ste smras pa/yab yum bdag rab tu 'byung bar 'tsha lo//de gnyis des yongasu gdungs pas bsams pa/bdag cag
139a3('dul ba): 'di dang bral bar byas rab tu 'byung la rag go snyam nas/de gnyis kyis de la smras pa/ma ning gnang ngo //dge slong gi gan du song ste smras pa/'phags pa bdag pha mas gnang
139a4('dul ba): gis rab tu 'byung du gsol/des de rab tu phyung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs par byas pa dang /dge slong rnams kyi mdun du mtshan ma ston par byed nas/de dag gis de la smras pa/
139a5('dul ba): khyod ma ning yin nam ci/des smras pa/yin zhes zer ba'i skabs de/bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la
139a6('dul ba): bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag gang zag ma ning na chos 'dul ba 'di la mi skye ba'i chos can yin pas/dge slong dag khyod kyis gang zag ma ning chos 'dul ba 'di la bsnyil bar bya'o//
139a7('dul ba): 'ga' zhig gi gan du rab tu 'byung bar 'dod pa 'ongs na/des de la ma ning ma yin nam/zhes dri bar bya'o//ma dris par rab tu 'byin par byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro//
139b1('dul ba): dge slong dag ma nang ni lnga po 'di dag yin te/lnga gang zhe na/skyes nas ma ning dang /zla ba phyed pa'i mning dang /'khyud nas ldang ba'i ma ning dang /phrag dog can gyim ning dang /
139b2('dul ba): nyams pa'i ma ning ngo //de la skyes nas ma ning gang zhe na/gang skyes nas bud med kyang ma yin/skyes pa yang ma yin pa'o//zla ba phyed pa'i ma ning gang yin zhe na/gang zla ba phyed na
139b3('dul ba): bud med/zla ba phyed ni skyes par 'gyur ba'o//'khyud nas ltung ba'i me ning gang zhe na/gang la gzhan dag gis 'khyud nas dbang po 'byung bar 'gyur ba'o//phrag dog can gyi mi ning
139b4('dul ba): gang zhe na/gang la gzhan dag stsol ba mthong na/dbang po 'byung bar 'gyur ro//nyams pa'i ma nang gang zhe na/ngag gi dbang po nod kyis nyams pa'am/mtshon gyis bcad pa'o//
139b5('dul ba): de la ma ning snga ma bzhi po skyes nas ma ning dang /zla ba phyed pa'i ma ning dang /'khyud nas ldang ba'i ma ning dang /phrag dog can gyi ma ning gang dag yin pa de dag ni rab tu ma byung na ni rab
139b6('dul ba): tudabyung bar mi bya la/rab tu byung na ni bsnyil bar bya'o//de la nyams pa'am ning gang yin pa de ni rab tu ma byung na ni rab tu dbyung bar mi bya la/rab tu byung na ni gal te 'gyur ba mo sten na
139b7('dul ba): baitang ma su byo'o//gal ti 'gyur ba ston na bsnol bar bya'o///sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshol mgon med zas
140a1('dul ba): sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhug so//klu rnams kyi kun tu spyod pa ni lus la nyin mo byud ma me'i mdog lta bu lan gsum 'bab cing /des de dag rus pa'i klung rus tsam
140a2('dul ba): zhig lus par byed do//klu gzhon nu skyes nas ring po ma lon pa zhig gis lus la nyin mo bye ma mo'i mdog lta bu lan gsum bab cing /des de rus pa'i keng rus tsam zhig lus par
140a3('dul ba): byas pa dang /des ma la smras pa/ma bdag gis yun ji srid cig tu sdug bsngal 'di lta bu mnags par bgyi 'tshal/bu ji srid ris mthun pa yod kyi bar du'o//de nas klu
140a4('dul ba): rdo 'phrul che ba dang /mthu tsho ba gzhan gang dag yin pa de dag gi lus la byi ma me'i mdog lta bu mi 'babs nas/des smras pa/ma 'di dag la ci'i phyir mi 'bab/mas smras pa/
140a5('dul ba): 'di dag ni rdzu 'phrul che ba mthu che ba bskal par gnas pa/sa 'dzin pa mdob chags kyi rgyal po 'dab bzangs kyis dbyung bar mi nus pa yin pas/de'i phyir 'di dag la mi 'bab bo//
140a6('dul ba): de nin klu phra mo gzhan gang dag yin pa de dag gi lus la yang bye ma me'i mdog lta bu mi 'bab nas/des smras pa/ma 'di dag la ni rigs na 'di dag lo ci'i phyir mi 'bab/mas
140a7('dul ba): smras pa/'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas skyobasu 'gro ba dang /bslab pa'i gzhi dag blangs pas/de'i phyir 'di dag la mi 'bab bo//des smras pa/gal te
140b1('dul ba): delta na bdag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sna nas skyabasu 'gro ba dang /bslab pa'ogano drug byung ngo //masmra smras pa/buHgcig gi sdug bsngal ni rnan//tshe rabs mang po ni ma
140b2('dul ba): yin te/gal te khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi sprin snga nas skyabasu 'gro ba dang /bslab pa'i gzhi dag blangs nas/yang dag par ma bsrungs na/yun ring por sems can dmyal
140b3('dul ba): bar sdug bsngal mnogs par bya dgos//des bstims pa/sdug bsngal 'dibs ches sdug bsngal ba ci zhig yid kyis/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar skyab su 'gro ba dang /bska
140b4('dul ba): d+h+wi ga dag ldan du 'gyu' ma mnas/des rnas zel na mug sa mngon par sprul nas rgyas da tshul du song ba dang /dzin ma nu des dge slong dag pasam gtan dang /klog pa dang /
140b5('dul ba): 'byor dang /yid la byed par brtson zhing /gnas pa mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang dod po skyes te/nges bsams pa/ji rje dang por skyab su 'gro ba dang /bslab pa'i gzhi dag blang
140b6('dul ba): dom/'on te rab tu 'byung bar bya snyam mo//de yang bsams pa/rab tu 'byung bar bya'o snyam nas/de dge slong gi gan du song ste smrasngo pa/'phags pa bdag rab tu 'byung bar 'a
140b7('dul ba): lo//des smras pa/kha ba ni gser bu yin/gnas brtan gzhan 'da' zhig gi drung du sa shig/des smras pa/'phags pa bdag gis gzhan ngo 'tshal ba ma mchis te/'di ltar/
141a1('dul ba): bdag thog ma kho nur 'phags pa'i gan du mchis pas/khyod nyid kyis bdag dge slong 'ga' zhig la gtad par gsol/dge slong de'i mkhan po dgon pa pa zhig
141a2('dul ba): dgon pa na 'dug pas/des de khrid de'i gan du song nas smras pa/mkhan po rigs kyi bu 'di rab tu 'byung bar 'tshal gyis rab tu dbyung du gsol/des smras pa/bzhin bzangs
141a3('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag shen pa byed du bcug pa ni bla 'i/rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs par byas nas/yal bar dor ba ni mi rung ngo zhes bka' stsal pas/'di
141a4('dul ba): yang sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur lo/kha bo yang ltung ba dang bcas par 'gyur bas/kho bo 'od rab tu mi 'byin to//des smras pa/mkhan pos rab tu dbyung ba
141a5('dul ba): 'ba' zhig mdzod cig dang /bdag gis 'di bslab par bgyi zhing klog tu stsal bar bgyi'o//des de rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs par byas nas/smras pa/bzhin bzangs
141a6('dul ba): 'di nyid khyed kyi mkhan pa gcig pa yin/'di nyid slob dpon yin gyis/khyod kyis 'di nyid la 'dri bar bya/khyod kyis 'di nyid la klag par bya//khyod kyis 'di nyid la bslab
141a7('dul ba): par bya'o//des gcig las 'phros pa'i lung blags pas/des de gcig las 'phros pa'i lung klog tu gzhug par brtsams pa dang /de shin tu brtson 'grus brtsams
141b1('dul ba): pas kha don du lhogs nas/dge slong slob dpon de shin tu mig gang ste/des de la smras pa/bzhin bzangs ci lhan cig tu bsod snyoms la 'jug par bya 'am/'on te so sor dang bsas
141b2('dul ba): pa/bdag gis mi'i zas kyis 'tshe bar mi nus kyis bdag klu'i gnasu song la bdud rtsi zos shing zos shing phyir 'ong bar bya'o snyam nas/des smras pa/slob dpon so sor 'jug par
141b3('dul ba): bgyi'o//des smras pa/bzhin bzangs de ltar gyis shog/de klu'i gnasu lha'i bdud rtsi zos nas phyir 'ong ngo //klu rnams ni gnyid che ba yin pas/de gang gi tshe gnyid log nas
141b4('dul ba): langs pa de'i tshe na/dge slong de bsod snyoms blangs nas phyir 'ong ngo //ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na dge slong des bsod snyoms glo bur ba snyed nas des de blangs te/phyir 'ong ba dang ji tsam
141b5('dul ba): na/gnas khang na 'gar ba'i sdud pa 'bud pa lta bu'i sgra thos nas/des gtan pa'i bu ga nas bltas na/gnas khang de thams cad klu'i lus bskyil bas gang ba mthong nas/des
141b6('dul ba): sprul pa sprul pa zhes sgra phyung ba dang /de sgra la mkhas pas myur ba myur ba kho nar sad nas/rang bzhin gyi cha lugs mi snang bar byas te/de sprul pa'o tsha lugasu 'dug/dge slong dag
141b7('dul ba): kyang lhags nas/de dag gis de la smras pa/'di ci yin des smras pa/sprul pa yino//de dag gis smras pa/tshe dang ljon pa brtson 'grus brtsams pas rtag tu kha ton la btsun pa
142a1('dul ba): yin na/ci khyod 'di la ser sna byed dam/des smras pa/kho bo ni 'di la chung zad kyang ser sna mi byed/'di ltar 'di ni sprul pa yino//de dag phan tshun smra ba na/bcom
142a2('dul ba): ldan 'das kyang phyogs der gshegs nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'di ci yin/dge slong dag gis gsol ba/bcom ldan 'das sprul pa lagaso//bcom
142a3('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag gang zag sprul pa ni chos 'dul ba 'di la mi skye ba'i chos can yin pas/dge slong dag khyed kyis gang zag sprul pa chos 'dul ba 'di las
142a4('dul ba): bsnyel bar bya'o//'ga' zhig gi gan du rab tu 'byung bar 'dod pa 'ongs na/des de la sprul pa ma yin nam/zhes dri bar bya'o//ma dros par rab tu 'byin par byed na 'gal tshabs can
142a5('dul ba): du 'gyur ro//dge slong dag klu'i rang bzhin lnga po 'di dag yin la/lhag ma ni sprul pa yin no//lnga gang zhe na/rang bzhin gyis skyes pa dang /rang bzhin gyis 'chi ba dang /rang
142a6('dul ba): bzhin gyis nyal ba dang /rang bzhin gyis za ba dang /rang bzhin gyis mi tshangs par spyod par 'khrig pa'i chos bsten par byed pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/bzhin
142a7('dul ba): bzangs khyod kyis phung po 'di dag gis yon tan gyis tshogs 'ga' yang thob par mi nus kyis dge slong rnams la ma 'tshe bar song shig/des bsams pa/'bab par ga la bya
142b1('dul ba): snum nas/des sa la'i dgon pa zhig tu song nas/gtsug lag khang rta babs mthon po dang ldan pa/mthongs khung dang skur khu du ba can dang /lad kan gyis brgyan pa/snying dang mug
142b2('dul ba): 'drog par byed pa/mtho ris kyi them ska su gyur pa/khri dang khri'u dang /yo byad phun sum tshogs pa zhig sprul te/dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa dang /'gro bar ches pa rnams la lo/
142b3('dul ba): byad thams cad kyi stobs par byed//rgan zhugs shig gtsug lag khang der dbyar gnas nas mnyan yod du song ngo //drug sde dag gis kun tu spyod pa ni 'dir bdag cag gis bram ze
142b4('dul ba): dang /khyim bdag 'ongs shong lhags pa rnams la yang chos bstan par bya rgol ba dag kyang tshar bcad par bya/rang gi grags pa yang bsgrags par byo'o snyam pas/drug sde dag las
142b5('dul ba): gang yang rung bas rgyal byed kyo tshal gyi sgo stong par mi 'jog pas/nye dgo' nang par sngar langs te so shing bor nus snam sbyar dmar ser gyon te/rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo na 'chag cing 'du'o//
142b6('dul ba): des zag ring po kho nan so rgan zhugs mgo smra ba'i me tog ltar skya ba smin ma 'brang ba zhig 'ong ba de mthong nas/des bis mos pa/'di ni dge slong gnas brtan 'ga' zhig yin gor ma chag
142b7('dul ba): snyam nas/des bsu ste gnas brtan byin pa legaso//blon po lags//zhes byas pa dang /des smras pa/slob dpon phyag 'tsha'o//nye dgas bsams pa/kye ma 'di ni rgan
143a1('dul ba): zhugs shig ste/slob dpon yang mi shes/mkhan po yang mi shes snyam nas/des de la smras pa/rgan zhugs khyod ga las 'ongs/sa la'i dgon pa nas//
143a2('dul ba): ci de na gtsug lag khang yod dam/des smras pa/gtsug lag khang yod//ci de gtsug lag khang yin nam/'on te 'phongs pa yin/gtsug lag khang ni ci 'dra/phongs
143a3('dul ba): pa ni ci 'dra/gang na yo bya thams cad dang ldan pa ni gtsug lag khang yin la/gang na yo byad thams cad dang bral ba ni 'phongs pa yino//de gtsug lag khang yin//de na ci yod
143a4('dul ba): de na dge slong zhal ta byed po gnas te/des dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa dang /'gro bar tshos pa rnams la yo byad thams cad kyis stobs par byed//drug sde dag gis kun tu spyod
143a5('dul ba): pa ni/gang cung zad ci thos pa de phye 'dred kyi dus kyi tshe gcig tu 'dug nas/phan tshun brjod par byed pa yin pas nye dga' gtsug lag khang du song ste/drug sde dag la smras pa/tshe
143a6('dul ba): dang ldan pa bdag cag gis yun ji srid kyis brel ba spang bar bya/khyod kyis thos pa chung zhig yod dam/nye dgas smras pa yod de/sa la'i dgon pa na gtsug lag khang yod//
143a7('dul ba): de na ci yod de na zhal ta byed pa gnas te/des dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa dang /'gro bar chas pa rnams la yo byad thams cad kyis stobs par byed kyis tshur sheg/bdag
143b1('dul ba): cag der 'dong ngo //de dag der 'ong ba dang /des de dag thag ring po kho na nas 'ong ba mthong nas/des bsams pa/gnas ngan len kun tu spyod pa de dag 'dir 'ongaso snyam//des
143b2('dul ba): yang bsams pa/bdag gis 'di dag la yo byad thams cad kyis bstabs na/'di dag gis bdag la ci byar yod snyam nas/des de dag lo rgan rims kyis gnas mal yang
143b3('dul ba): tog dang /khang pa brtsegs pa dag bsgos shing yo byad thams cad kyis kyang bstab so//de dag nyi ma nyung shos shig 'khod nas smras pa/dga' bo nye dga' rgan zhugs 'di la
143b4('dul ba): 'du ba yang mi snang 'god pa yang mi snang bas/bdog cag gis 'di la grangs dag 'debasu gzhug/zhes de dag gis de la smras pa/rgan zhugs khyod la 'du ba yang mi snang //
143b5('dul ba): 'ged pa yang mi snang bas tshur shog/grangs thob shig/des smras pa/'phags pa dag chung zad nyams pa'am gcig tu mi gyur tam/de dag gis smras pa/chung zad
143b6('dul ba): kyang nyams par mi gyur te/tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyis drug sde dag gtsug lag khang de nyid du dbyar gnas pa/de dag gis 'du ba yang mi shes/'god pa
143b7('dul ba): yang mi sheso zhes bdag cag smad par 'gyuraro//des smras pa/gnas brtan dag gal te de lta na bgyi'o//ji tsam na ba/lo bcu gnyis lon na'o//de dag gis smras pa//
144a1('dul ba): sman zhugs lo bcu gnyis na khyod kyis gtsug lag khang 'di skyo 'phar yang rdos par 'gyuraro//des skyes pa/lo bdun na'o//de dag gis smras pa/mi rung /
144a2('dul ba): smras pa/zla ba bdun no//de dag gis smras pa/mi ru //des smras pa/nyin zhag bdun na'o//de dag gis smras pa/dga' bo nye dga' nyin zhag bdun gyis rgan zhugs 'dis ci zhig
144a3('dul ba): zas par gyur te/de bzhin bya'o//de dag gis de la smras pa/rgan zhugs de bzhin gyis shig/des bsems pa/zhag bdun lon na gtsug lag khang 'di mi snang bar 'gyur/
144a4('dul ba): snyam nas/des de na tshangs po mtshungs par spyod pa des pa des pa rnams la/la la la ni snam sbyar 'bul bar byed/la la la ni bla gos/la la la ni sham thabs/la la la ni
144a5('dul ba): rdul zan/la la la ni lhung bzed/la la lo ni lhung bzed chung ngu 'bul bar byed//drug sde dag gis de mthong nas de dag gis smras pa/dga' bo nye dga' rgan zhugs 'di phyogs
144a6('dul ba): tshal gyi zhag bdun 'das nas phyogs dang bcas nas rtsa nas gdon to//des kyang zhag bdun 'das nas de dag nyal ba dang gtsug lag khang de mi snang bar byas nas/rgya mtsho 'gram
144a7('dul ba): du song ngo //de dag kyang sa sgo bo la nyal zhing 'khod nas smras pa/dga' bo nye dga' longs la rdo rgyus long shig dang /grangs 'debasu gzhug go/de dag gis ji tsam na
144b1('dul ba): bdag cags sna bo la nyal bar mthong nas de dag gis smras pa/bcom ldan 'das la mngon par dad pa/sangs rgyas mchos dang dge 'dun la mchod pa da pa zhi//bdug cag /
144b2('dul ba): tho brnams nas/gtsug lag khang mi snang bar byas te/song bde lha 'amaklu'am gnod sbyin nam su yin zhes zer ngo'i skabs de/bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsal
144b3('dul ba): pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sgril pa/dge slong dag dge slong zhal ta byed pa de ni sprul pa gang yin pa de nyid yin te/gal te dge slong drug sde dag gis zo brtsams par
144b4('dul ba): ma gyur na/bstan pa mthar thug gi bar du sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun dag la mchod po byed par 'gyur//bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/nye dmigs gang ci byung ba
144b5('dul ba): de ni/dge slong dag gtsug lag khang gang na 'du 'god me mngon par der grangs 'debasu 'jug pa las gyur pa yin snyam nas/bka' stsal pa/de lta bas na gang na 'du ba yang mi
144b6('dul ba): mngon/'god pa yang mi mngon pa der dge slong gis grangs 'debasu gzhug par mi bya'o//gang na 'du ba ni mngon la/'god pa mi mngon pa der yang dge slong gi grangs 'dib su gzhug
144b7('dul ba): par mi bya'o//gang na 'god pa ni mngon la 'du ba mi mngon pa der yang dge slong gis grangs 'ding su gtsug par mi bya'o//gang na 'du ba dang 'god pa mngon pa der ni dge slong gis
145a1('dul ba): dran pa dang /shes bzhin gyis tshod rig par bya//'dul ba gra na/bam po dgu pa/de'i 'og tu rgyu mtsho'i 'gram du song ste/
145a2('dul ba): gtsug lag khang rta babs mthon po dang ldan pa/mthong khung dong skar khung dra ba can dang /lan kan gyis brgyan pa snying dang mig 'dreg par byed pa/mtho ris kyi them skasu gyur pa/
145a3('dul ba): khri dang khri'u dang /yo byad phun sum tshogs pa gnyis pa zhig sprul te/der rgya mtsho chen po'i klu dag bram ze dang khyim bdag gi che byad kyis mngon du lhags nas/de dag de la
145a4('dul ba): chos nyan par byed do//de dag gis de la chos thos nas dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa dang /'gro bar chas pa rnams la yo byad thams cad kyis stobs par byed//rgan zhugs
145a5('dul ba): shig gtsug lag khang der dbyar gnas nas mnyan yod du song ngo //drug sde dag gis kun tu spyod pa ni ringar bdag cag gos bram ze dang khyim bdag 'ongs shing lhags pa rnams
145a6('dul ba): la yang chas bstan par bya/rgol ba dag kyang tshor gcad par bya/rang gi grags pa yang bzlog par bya'o snyam pas/drug sde dag las gang yang rung ngas rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi
145a7('dul ba): sgo stong par mi 'dzag pas/nye dga' nang bar sngar langs te/so shing bar nas snam sbyar dmar sor gyon te/rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo na 'chag cing 'dug/des thag
145b1('dul ba): la kho na nas rgan thugs mgo sgra 'i me tog ltar skya ba sbyin ma 'byur ba zhig 'ang ba de mthong nas/des bsams pa/'di ni dge slong gnas brtan 'ga' zhig yin/gar mchug
145b2('dul ba): snyam nas des de bsu ste gnas brtan byon po legaso//byin pa log so//zhes byas pa dang /des smras pa/slob dpon phyag 'tshal//lho dgas bsams pa/kye ma 'di ni rgan
