145b4('dul ba): khang yod dam/des smras pa/gtsug lag khang yod//ci de gtsug lag khang yin nam/'on te phongs po yin/gtsug lag khang ni ci 'dra/phongs pa ni tso 'dra/gang
145b5('dul ba): na yo byad thams cad dang ldan pa ni gtsug lag khang yin la/gang na yo byad thams cad dang bral ba ni phongs pa yino//de gtsug lag khang yino//de na ci yod de na dge slong
145b6('dul ba): chos spro ba gnas te/de de na bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams la chos ston por byed cing /de dag gis de la chos thos nas dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa dang /'gro bar chas pa
145b7('dul ba): rnams la yo byad thams cad kyis stobs por byed//drug sde dag gi kun tu spyod pa ni gang cung zad ci thos pa de phye 'bred kyi dus kyi tshe gcig tu 'dus nas phan tshun rjod par byed pa
146a1('dul ba): yin pas nye dga' gtsug lag khang du song ste/drug sde dag la smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag cag gis yun ji srid kyis bral ba spang bar bya/khyod kyis thos
146a2('dul ba): pabacung zhig yod dam/nye dwags smras pa yod/rgya mtsho'i 'gram na gtsug lag khang yod//de na ci yod/de na dge slong chos smra ba gnas te/de de ni bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams la
146a3('dul ba): chos ston par byed cing /de dag gis de las chos thos nas/dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa dang /'gro bar chas pa rnams la yo byad thams cad kyis stobs par byed kyis/tshur
146a4('dul ba): shog bdag cag der 'dongad ngo //de dag der dong ba dang /des de dag thag ring po kho na nas 'ongs pa mthong nas/des bsams po/gnas ngan len kun tu spyod pa de dag 'dir
146a5('dul ba): 'ongaso snyam//des yang bsams pa/bdag 'di dag la cung zad kyang rag lus pa med na/'di dag gis bdag la ci byar yod snyamo//de nas rgya mtsho chen po'i klu de dag bram ze dang
146a6('dul ba): khyim bdag gi cha lugs kyis mngon du lhags pa dang /des de dag la chos ston to//de dag gis de la chos thos nas dge slong glo bur du dngas pa dang /'gro bar chas pa rnams lha
146a7('dul ba): yo byad thams cad kyis bstabs pa dang /drug sde dag gis smras pa/dga'o ba nye dga' rgan zhugs 'dis ci zhig shes/gcig las 'dros pa'o//'di ni re shig rngubs
146b1('dul ba): bas gcig las 'phros pa'i chos ston gyis/dge slong 'di dag ni sde snod gsum dang ldan pa/chos sgrogs pa rigs pa dang grol ba'i spobs pa can sha stag yin na/ci'i phyir 'di dag la gso
146b2('dul ba): ba mi 'debs/de dag gis de la smras pa/rgan zhugs khyod kyis ci shes/des smras pa/gcig las 'phros pa'o//de dag gis smras pa/rgan zhugs khyod ni re shig rngubs pas/
146b3('dul ba): gcig las 'phro ba'i chos ston gyi/dge slong 'di dag ni sde snod gsum dang ldan pa/chos sgrogs pa rigs pa dang grol ba'i spobs pa can sha stag yin na/ci'i phyir 'di dag la gsol
146b4('dul ba): ba mi 'debs/des smras pa/'phags pa dag bdag gis bzlog gam ci na khyed ci'i phyir chos mi ston/de dag gis smras pa/dga' bo nye dga' rgan zhugs 'di bdag cag dang mi
146b5('dul ba): mthun par byed kyis gnas nas dbyung ba'i las bya'o//des bsems pa/gal te 'dog la gnas nas dbyung ba'i las byas na/klu'i gnasu yang skabs mi rnyed snyam nas/des de
146b6('dul ba): dag nyal ba dang /gtsug lag khang de yang mi snang bar byas te/rgya mtsho chen por zhug so//de dag bye me'i thang la nyal zhing 'khor 'khod nas smras pa/dga' bo nye dga' longs la
146b7('dul ba): seng ge'i khri shoms shig dang /chos bstan par bya'o//de dag gis ji tsam na bdag cag bye ma'i thang lo nyal ba mthong nas/de dag gis smras pa/bcom ldan 'das la mngon pa
147a1('dul ba): dad pa sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la mchod pa byed pa zhig bdag cag gis tho btsams nas/gtsug lag khang mi snang bar byas te song ba de lha 'am/klu
147a2('dul ba): 'am/gnod sbyin nam/su yin zhes zer ba'i skabs de/bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol ba dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsol po/dge slong dag dge
147a3('dul ba): slong chos smra ba de ni sprul pa gang yin pa de nyid yin te/gal te dge slong drug sde dag gis tho btsams par ma gyur na/bstan pa mthar thug gi bar du sangs rgyas dang chos dang
147a4('dul ba): dge 'dun dag la mchod pa byed par 'gyuraro//bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/nyes dmigs gang ci byung ba de ni dge slong dag ma gsol bar chos ston par byed pa las gyur
147a5('dul ba): pa yin no snyam nas bka' stsal pa/de lta bas na dge slong gis ma gsol bar chos bstan par mi bya'o//dge slong ma gsol bar chos ston na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyuraro//de'i
147a6('dul ba): ngor 'gron du bos pa la ni ltung ba medo//mnyan yod na khyim bdag sangs rgyas 'tsho zhes bya ba phyug pa/nor mang ba/longs spyod che ba zhig 'dug pa des/rigs mnyam pa las chung
147a7('dul ba): ma blangs nas/de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/dga' bar byed/dga'o dgur spyod par byed//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus gdul ba la ltos pas de'i khyim du song ste/des khyim
147b1('dul ba): bdag de chung ma dang bcas pa skyabasu 'gro ba dang /bslab pa'i gzhi dag la bzhag/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na khyim bdag de'i chung ma la sems can zhugs par gyur to//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i
147b2('dul ba): bus sems can de nges par sgrol ba dang ldan pa nyid du shes nas/phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong med par de'i khyim du song ba dang khyim bdag des rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te smras pa/ci 'phags
147b3('dul ba): pa slad bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong ma mchis sam/des smras pa/khyim bdag ci kho bo'i phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong rtswa ka shu'i byings sam/ku shi'-i byings nas 'byung bar 'gyur ram//
147b4('dul ba): 'di ltar khyod lta bu dag las thob pa gang dag yin pa de dag kho bo'i phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong du 'gyur//khyim bdag sangs rgyas 'tshos smras pa/'phags pa bdag gi mchis brang 'di
147b5('dul ba): la sems can zhig zhugs par gyur gyis/gal te bu pho zhig btsos par gyur na/de bdag gis 'phags pa'i slad bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong du 'bu'o//des smras pa/khyim bdag
147b6('dul ba): thabs yino//de zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'das pa dang /khye'u gzugs bzang ba blta na sdug pa mdzes pa lpags pa gser gyi mdog 'dra ba/mgo gdugs lta bu dang ldan pa/lag pa
147b7('dul ba): ring ba dang /dpral ba'i dbyes che ba/smin ma mdzar ba/sna'i bzangs mtho ba zhig bciso//bcas nas de'i nye du dag 'dus shing lhags nas/de nyi ma bdun gsum nyi shu gcig tu
148a1('dul ba): bcas pa'i bcas ston rgyu cher byas nas/khye'u med cir gdags shes ming 'dog sa par byed//gzhan dag gis smras pa//bya'u di sangs rgyas 'tsho'i bu yin pas
148a2('dul ba): khye'u'i ming dge 'dun 'tshor gdag so//zhes de'i ming dge 'dun mtsho zhes bya bar btagaso de dag gi khye'u dge 'dun mtsho/'o ma dang /zho dong /mar dang /zhun mor dang /mar
148a3('dul ba): gyi snying khu dang /gzhan yang yo byad kyi bye brag gtso bo gtso bo dag gis sring bar byed/skyed par byed cing /rdzing na gnas pa'i pad+ma bzhin du myur du skyed par byed//gang /
148a4('dul ba): na'i nyin mo dge 'dun 'tshe btsas po de kho na'i nyin mo tshang pa lnga brgya dag gi bu dag kyang bcas te/de dag kyang rigs dang 'thun pa'i ming dag btagaso//gong gi tshe khye'u dge 'dun 'a
148a5('dul ba): chen por gyur pa de'i tshe/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus de rab tu dbyung ba'i dus shes nus/gdul ba la ltos pas phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong med par gcig pu de'i khyim du song ba
148a6('dul ba): dang /khyim bdag sangs rgyas 'chos rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te/stan bting ba dang tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'dug/'dug nas kyang khyim bdog sangs rgyas 'tshal po'i bya bar
148a7('dul ba): brtsam so//de nas khyim bdag sangs rgyas 'tshos dge 'dun 'tsho la smras pa/kho bos khyod ma'i rum na 'dug cing ma bcas pa nyid nas/'phags pa shA ri'i bu la phyi bzhin
148b1('dul ba): 'byung ba'i dge sbyong du phul gyis khyod song la 'di la bsnyen bkur gyis shig/de sems can srid pa tham pa sbyin pas/'dzum pa sngon du btang ste/'jigs pa med cing /bzhin nyams
148b2('dul ba): ba med pa dang /dmin pa med pas de ltar baspyira'o//zhes khas blangs nas/de tshe dang ldan pa shA 'i'i bu'i phyi bzhin rjemu 'bring ngo //de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA rI'i bus de rab tu phyung zhing
148b3('dul ba): bsnyen par rdzogs par byas nas/ tu spyod pa'i chos dag snyings te/lung bani klog tu 'atsug/rdo tsamAn dus gzhan zhig na tshang ba lnga bar+b+ha bI de dag gis phan tshun gros b+h+yas
148b4('dul ba): te/rgya mtsho chen po 'dong ba'i zong lte gan byas nas/rgya mtsho chen por 'phags pa dang de dag 'di snyam du sems te/shes ldan dag rgya mtsho chen po ni 'jigs pa du mes kun
148b5('dul ba): turgyagang ba yin pas/bdag cag gis gang bdag cag rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du dong ba rnams la chos ston par 'gyur ba'i 'phags pa 'ga' zhig gsheg su gsol/nges bdag
148b6('dul ba): smi bde lagasu 'gyur snyam nas/de dag gi spyad par ngoms te smrab pa/su gsheg tu gshegs/gzhon dag gis smras pa/shes ldan dag bugs pa dge 'an
148b7('dul ba): 'di bdag cag gi ni'i ljangs sbyin cig skyes pas rdul la lhan cig tsa tso pa min pas/bdag cig gis 'di la gsal pa gang 'i bar byer//de nas de dag de'i gan du ste/
149a1('dul ba): pa la phyag 'tshal nas smras pa/'phags pa dge 'dun 'tsho khyod bdag cag gi ne'u ldangs lhan cig skyes pas rdul la lhan cig rtse rtse ba lags te/bdag cag ni rgya
149a2('dul ba): mtsho chen por 'phags na/rgya mtsho chen po ni 'jigs pa du mas kun tu gang ba logs pas/'phags pas bdag tsog rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du mchis pa rnams la chos bstan na
149a3('dul ba): des bdag cag bde legasu 'gyur ba lags kyis/de'i slad du 'phags pa bdag cag dang thabs gcig rgya mtsho chen por gshegs par gsol/des smras pa/shes ldan
149a4('dul ba): dag kho bo la rang dbang med kyis deng la mkhan po la zhus shig/de dag tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'o rkang pa gnyis la mgo
149a5('dul ba): bos phyag 'tshal te/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras//'phags pa shA ri'i bu mkhyen par mdzod cig/'phags pa dge 'dun 'tsho 'di bdag cag gi ne'u ldangs
149a6('dul ba): lhan tsog skyes pa sa rdul la lhan cig rtse rtse ba lags te/bdag cag ni rgya mtsho chen pore 'phags na/rgya mtsho chen po ni 'jigs pa du mas kun tu gang ba lags pas/'phags
149a7('dul ba): pa dge 'dun 'tshos bdag cag rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du mchis pa rnams la chos bstan na/des bdag cag bde legasu 'gyur lags kyis/de'i slad du 'phags pa dge 'dun
149b1('dul ba): bdag cag dang thabs gcig rgya mtsho chen por btang bar gsol/des smras pa/bcom ldan 'das nyid la zhus shig dang /kho bo zlog par mi byed//de dag bcom ldan 'das ga la ba
149b2('dul ba): der dong ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/
149b3('dul ba): 'phags pa dge 'dun 'tsho 'di bdag cag gi ne'u ldangs lhan cig skyes pas rdul la lhan cig rtse rtse ba lags te/bdag cag ni rgya mtsho chen por 'phags na/rgya mtsho chen po ni 'jigs
149b4('dul ba): pa du mas kun tu gang ba lags pas/'phags pa dge 'dun 'chos bdag cag rgya mtsho chen por mchis po rnams la chos ston na/des bdag cag bde legasu 'gyur lags kyis
149b5('dul ba): de'i slad du 'phags pa dge 'dun 'tsho bdag cag dang thabs gcig rgya mtsho chen por gtad par gsol/bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ci tshong pa 'di dag la dge ba'i rtsa
149b6('dul ba): ba chung zad yod dam/'on te med snyam na yod par gzigasaso//su la rag lus snyam na/dge slong dge 'dun 'tshe la rag lus par gzigs nas/de nas bcom ldan 'das
149b7('dul ba): kyis tshe dang ldan pa dge 'dun 'tshol bka' stsal pa/dge 'dun 'tsho khyod rgya mtsho chen por 'jug tu song la/khyod kyis 'jigs pa dang 'jig su rung ba dag bzod par gyis shig/
150a1('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa dge 'dun 'chos/bcom ldan 'das la cang mi smra bar dang du blangs//de nas tshong pa lnga brgya pa de dag tshe dang ldan pa dge 'dun 'tsho dang lhan cig dge mtshan/
150a2('dul ba): dang /bkra shis dang /bed leg su 'gyur ba dag byas te/shing rta dag dang /khur dag dang /sbyangs pa dag dang /gle ba dag dang /rnga mo dag dang /ba lang dag dang /bong
150a3('dul ba): bu dag gis rgya mtsho chen por 'dong ba'i zong khyer te/rgya mtsho chen por 'phags nas mthar gyis grong dang /grong brdal dang /yul 'khor dang /rgyal po'i pho brang dang /tshong rdal
150a4('dul ba): dag tu rnam por rgyu ba na/rgya mtsho chen po'i 'gram du phyin nas/de dag gis lam gyi dub pa bsil te/zong rnying pa lnga brgyas gru bo che chen po sbyar nas/zho shes 'tsho ba lnga
150a5('dul ba): brgya pa stobs par byed pa dang /sel bar byed pa dang /rgyal chen dang /grub dang /rlung yor thogs pa dag khrid de/lan gsum dril bsgrags nas/nor bslab pa'i phyir
150a6('dul ba): rgya mtsho chen por zhugs//ji tsam na de dag rgyu mtsho chen por dong ba dag gi gru bo ched klu rnams kyis gzung nas/de dag zhi ba dang /chu lha dang /lus dran dang /brgya byin dang /
150a7('dul ba): tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams la/rgya mtsho chen po 'di na lta'am/klu'am/gnod sbyin nami/dri za'am/gang gnas pa de bdag cag la ci 'dod pa smra bor gyur cig/
150b1('dul ba): ces gsol ba gdab par brtsams pa dang /de nas rgya mtsho chen po nas 'phags pa dge 'dun 'tsho nged la byin cig ces smra byung //de dag gis smras pa/'phags pa dge 'dun 'chan
150b2('dul ba): bdag cag gi ne'u ldangs lhan cig skyes pa sa rdul la lhan cig rje rtse ba/bcom ldan 'das dang /btsun pa shA ri'i dus bdag cag la gnang ba yin pas/bdag cag 'di dang lhan
150b3('dul ba): cig 'chi ba dang dus byed pa ni bla'i/'di yongasu gtang bar ni mi bya'o//tshe dang ldan pa dge 'dun 'chos de dag la smras pa/shes ldan dag ci zer/de dag gis smras pa/'phags
150b4('dul ba): pa rgya mtsho chen po naso/'phags pa dge 'dun 'tsho da la byin tsog sgra byung ngo //des smras pa/ci'i phyir mi sbyin/de dag gis smras pa/'phags pa khyod ni bdag cag gi
150b5('dul ba): ne'u ldangs lhan cig skyes pas rdul la lhan cig rtse rtse ba/bcom ldan 'das dang /btsun pa shA ri'i bus bdog cag la gnang ba legs pas/bdag cag khyod dang lhan cig
150b6('dul ba): 'gum pa dang /dus bgyid pa ni blo'i/khyod yongasu gtad par ni mi 'gyi'o//tshe dang ldan pa dge 'dun 'chos bsams pa/bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la dge 'dun 'tsho khyod
150b7('dul ba): rgya mtsho chen por 'jug tu song la/khyod kyis 'jigs pa dang /'jig su rung ba dge bzod par gyis shig ces bka' stsal pa/gang yin pa de ni 'di yino snyam nas/des
151a1('dul ba): lhung bzed dang /chos gos thogs te/bdag nyid rgya mtsho chen por 'tshong bar brtsams pa dang /de nas tshong pa de dag gis des de ltar ba rnams pa mthong nas
151a2('dul ba): smras pa/'phags pa dge 'dun 'tsho ci mdzad ci mdzad/de de dag de ltar bzlog bzhin du rgya mtsho chen por 'chongs pa dang /de ma thag kho nar klu rnams kyis gru bo che de bta //
151a3('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa dge 'dun 'tsho yang klu rnams kyis khrid de klu'i gnasu zhugaso//de nas klu de rnams klu'i bu mo rnams dang /lhan cig 'dzum pa mngon du btang ste/ya mtshan skyes
151a4('dul ba): nas mig tshugasu blta zhing /tshe dang ldan pa dge 'dun 'tsho mchod rten dag la phyag 'tshal du gzhugs par brtsams te/smras pa/'phags pa dge 'dun 'tsho 'di ni yang dgo bar
151a5('dul ba): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyi dri gtsang khang lagaso//'di ni gtsug tor can dang thams cad skyob dang /'khor ba 'jig dang /gser thub dang /'od srung
151a6('dul ba): gi dri gtsang khang lagaso//'di ni bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i dri gtsang khang lagaso//des de dag dang lhan cig mchod rten dag la phyag 'tshal nas/klu'i tshogs kyi gung
151a7('dul ba): la stan bshams pa nyid la 'dug/de nas klu de rnams kyis thal mo sbyar nas gsol ba btab pa/'phags pa dge 'dun 'chi lha dang mi rnams la ni bcom ldan 'das kyi mdo sde
151b1('dul ba): dang /ma mo rab tu gnas na/bdag cag klu rnams ni mi khom par skyes/log par ltung ba'i lus dang ldan pas/kye ma 'phags pas bdag cag la mdo sde'i mtha' rab tu gnas
151b2('dul ba): bar mdzad du gsol/des de ltar bya'o zhes khas blangaso//de nas sprul pa des klu gzhon nu gsum spro ba bskyed nas/gcig la smras pa/re shig khyod kyis ni yang dag par ldan
151b3('dul ba): pa lhogs shig/gnyis pa la smras pa/khyod kyis ni ring por lhogs shig/kho bo kyang gcig la 'phros pa'i lung brjed pa'i skabs de dag nyid gsol bar bya'o//de dag gis
151b4('dul ba): klags par brtsams nas/de ni gcig ni mig btsums te lung nod par byed//gnyis pa ni rgyab kyis phyogs te lung nod par byed do//gsum pa ni thag ring por 'dug ste lung
151b5('dul ba): nod par byed//de dag gi nang nas sprul pa de nyid ni sngon bag chags kyi khyad par gyis/gus pa dang btsos pa dang /zhe sa dang bcas pa dang /'phral gyi bya ba thams cad
151b6('dul ba): la thog mor 'gro ba yin pas de nang par sngar langs te/'phags pa bzhengs la tshems shing 'or cig/bcom ldan 'das kyis dkyil 'khar dang mchod rten la phyag mdzod
151b7('dul ba): cig/bshes gsol cig/gzims mel shoms shig ces smra bar byed//ji tsam na de thams cad kyis rim gyis lung rnams blags pa dang /sbrul si des smras pa/
152a1('dul ba): 'phags pa 'di dag gis lung rnams blags na/ji 'dzin tam//'on te des mi 'dzin/des smras pa/'di dag dran pa dang ldan pas 'dzin par ni 'gyur na/
152a2('dul ba): 'di ltar 'di dag la nyes pa yod//des smras pa//'phags pa nongs pa ci mchis/'di dag thams cad gus pa med pa dang /zhes med pa yin te/re shig gcig ni
152a3('dul ba): mig btsums te lung nod par byed//gnyis pa ni rgyab kyis phyogs te lung nod par byed/gsum pa ni thag ring po 'dug ste/lung nod par byed//khyod 'ba' zhig gus pa dang
152a4('dul ba): bcas pa dang /rjes dang pocas pa dang /'phrol gyi bye ba thams cad la thog mar 'gro ba yino//des smras pa/'phags pa de dkon gus po ma mchis pa dang /
152a5('dul ba): sa ma mchis pa ma legs te/re shig mig bcums te lung nod pa gang lags pa ni mig gdug pa lagaso//rgyub kyis phyogs te lung nod pa gang lags pa de ni dbugs
152a6('dul ba): gdug pa lag s+ho//thag ring por mchis te lung gnod pa gang legs pa de ni reg pa gdug pi legaso//bdag gcig blo ni mtsho ba gdug pa lag so//de nas tshe dang ldan
152a7('dul ba): pa dge 'dun 'tsho skrag nas bsams pa/bdag dgu ba rnams kyi nang na 'dug pa lta snyam nas/de skye bo bseng bseng po rid pa dang /nyim chung ba dang /rke ba dang /
152b1('dul ba): skam pa dang /lus ma thob par gyur to//klu sprul pas smras pa/'phags pa khyod ci'i slad du skya bo bseng ba seng po rid pa dang /nyam chung ba dang /rke ba dang /skum pa dang
152b2('dul ba): lus ma thob par gyur//des smras pa/kho bo ni dgra rnams kyi nang na 'dug ste/gang gi tshe khyed cag los gang yang rung ba zhig 'khrugs par gyur pa de'i tshe na/kho bo ming tsam
152b3('dul ba): zhig lus par 'gyur ro//des smras pa/bdag cag 'phags pa la gnod pa mi bgyid te/'di ltar 'phags pa skur 'dzam bu gling du gshegs bzhed dam ci/des smras pa/
152b4('dul ba): bzhin bzangs kho bo 'di na dga' ba med pas 'gro 'dod do//de nas klu de rnams kyis phan tshun gros byas te/gang gi tshe gru bo che de phyogs der 'ongs pa de'i tshe na/'phags pa dge
152b5('dul ba): 'dun 'tsho bteg ste gru bo che'i nang du bzhag/de nas tshong pa de dag 'dzum pa sngon du btang ste/ya mtshan skyes nas mig tshugasu lta zhing /smras pa/'phags pa dge 'dun 'tsho
152b6('dul ba): byon pa legs//byin pa legaso//des smras pa/shes ldan dag kho bos klu'i gan su klu rnams lo lung bzhi po dag rab tu gnas par byas kyis/rje su yi rang ba gyis shig
152b7('dul ba): de dag gis smras pa/'phags pa 'di lta ste/gzhan la phan 'dogs pa ni ston pa'i bstan pa la rab tu byung bas bgyis pa lags te/rje suM yi ra ngo //de nas tshong ba de dag che
153a1('dul ba): dang ldan pa dge /'dun 'cha dang lhan cig tshogs shing kun dag bzhin du mnar gyis rgya mtsha'i 'grus smra to//ji namA nu thams cad dul zhi dru pas/rtang /
153a2('dul ba): logs pas na/tshe dang ldan pa dge 'dun 'tsho yang rgya mtsho chen po la blta bar brtsams//bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag lnga po 'di dag ni lta bas chog mi shes shing /
153a3('dul ba): mthong na mi mthun pa med pa yin te/lnga gang zhe na/dge slong dag glang po che cang shes gzhon sha can dang /'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dang /rgya mtsho dug can pa dang /
153a4('dul ba): ri'i rgyal po ri rab dang /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni lta bas chog mi shes shing mthong na mi mthun pa med pa yino zhes gsungs
153a5('dul ba): pas/de yun ring du rgya mtsho chen po la lta ba na dub pas tho rangs gnyid stug pas non to//de nas tshong pa de dag khal dag bkal te 'phags nas/mtshan mo nam langs pa
153a6('dul ba): na tshe dang ldan pa dge 'dun 'tsho mi snang nas/de dag gtad cing shes ldan dag 'phags pa dge 'dun 'tsho ga re zhes phan tshun du blta bar brtsams pa dang /de na kha cig na re
153a7('dul ba): bdun du song ngo zhes zer ro//kha cig na re phyi bzhin 'ong ngo zhes ze'o//kha cig na je dbus nas 'gro'o zhes zer ro//de dag rnam pa thams cad du kun tu tshol ba na/yi
153b1('dul ba): chad par gyur cing ma mthong ngo //de nas de dag bzhin nyams shing dman par gyur te/smras pa/shes ldan dag bdag cag gis 'phags pa dge 'dun 'tsho bor ba ma legs par byas
153b2('dul ba): kyis/phyir ldog par bya'o//yang bsams pa/'phags pa dge 'dun 'tsho ni rdzu 'phrul che ba/mthu che ba yin pas 'di ltar rgya mtsho chen por yang dus la ma bab na/de da skam la
153b3('dul ba): phyin na duso la bab par gau la 'gyur/de ni rdzu 'phrul che ba mthu che ba yin pas de tshes sngon du song ba gang yin pa de lta bu'i gnas yod do snyam nas smras pa/shes ldan dag tshur shog/
153b4('dul ba): 'dong zhes de dag 'phag so//tshe dang ldan pa dge 'dun 'tsho yang bye ma'i thang stong pa la nyi ma 'char ba'i dus kyi tshe/nyi ma'i 'od zer dag gis phog nas sad pa dang /ji tsam na ci yang
153b5('dul ba): mi snang nas/des bsams pa/tshong pa dag ni dong na da ji ltar bya/gar bab bab tu 'gro snyamo//tshe dang ldan pa de snying stobs che bas song ba dang /lam mi snang nas des phan
153b6('dul ba): tshun btsal nas/lam srang zhig mthong na de der zhugs pa dang /ji tsam na sa la'i dgon pa zhig na gtsug lag khang rta babs mthon po dang ldan pa/mthong khung dang /skar khung
153b7('dul ba): dra ba can dang /lan kan gyis brgyan pa/snying dang mig 'phrog par byed pa/mtho ris kyi them ska su gyur pa//dri dang khri'u dang yo byad phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa/shing
154a1('dul ba): ljon pa sna tshogs kyis bskor ba/rdzing bu dang mtshe'us nye bar mdzes par byas pa dang /ngang pa dang /khrung khrung dang /rma bya dang /ne co dang /ri skags dang /
154a2('dul ba): khu byug mngon par sgra 'byin pa lha'i gnas ltar dpal gyis 'bar ba zhig dang /de na dge slong legs par bgos shing legs par sbyangs pa/spyod lam zhi bas gnas pa dag
154a3('dul ba): mthong nas gus pa dang bcas pas de dag gi gan du song ngo //de nas de dag gus par sgrim pa dang bcas pas de la smras pa/btsun pa dge 'dun 'i tshe byon pa legaso//byon pa
154a4('dul ba): leg so//khyod da bzod ga las byon/des ji ltar gyur pa thams cad brjod pa dang /de nas de dag gis ngal sor bcug ste/lam gyi dub pa bsal nas gtsug lag khang du
154a5('dul ba): khrid do//jo tsam na stan bzang po bshams pa dang kha zas bsod pa'i spyi bungs bshams pa mthong nas/de dag gis de la smras pa/btsun pa dge 'dun 'tsho ma skyems sam/
154a6('dul ba): mi bkres sam/des smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa dag skomo bsgreso//de dag gis smras pas/btsun pa dge 'dun 'tsho gsol cig/des smras pa/dge 'dun gyi nang du bza'o//
154a7('dul ba): de dag gis smras pa/btsun pa dge 'dun 'tsho khyod shul gyis dub pa lags kyis/da gsol cig/slad kyis 'dir nyes dmigs 'byung bar 'gyuraro//des nyes dmigs
154b1('dul ba): mthong bas/zos nas mtha' gcig tu song ste 'dug/ji tsam na de dag dro la bab ste/gaN+DI brdungs pa na/rang rang gi lhung bzed thogs te gral rim bzhin 'khod//de dag
154b2('dul ba): 'khod pa dang /gtsug lag khang de yang mi snang bar gyur cing //de dag gi rang rang gi lhung bzed kyang lcags kyi tho ba rnam pa sna tshogasu gyur to//de nas de dag ji srid du dri ma
154b3('dul ba): yol gyi bar du lcags kyi tho ba de dag gis phan tshun klad pa bcom nas/de dag klad pa zhom zhing sdug bsngal gyi tshor bas nyen nas nyam thag pa'i skad 'byon te//ji tsam na
154b4('dul ba): do yol ba dang /gtsug lag khang de yang de kho na bzhin du phyir byung zhing dge slong de dag kyang de kho na bzhin du spyod lam zhi bas gnas//de nas tshe dang ldan po dge 'dun 'tsho de dag/
154b5('dul ba): gaM gan du song ste dris pa/tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed su yin/las gang gis 'dir skyes/de dag gis smras pa/btsun pa dge 'dun 'tsho 'dzam bu gleng pa'i mi rnams ni snron
154b6('dul ba): dga' bru khyod yid rgyo bar mi 'gyu ro//de smras pa/kho bos mngon sum kho nar mthong na ci'i phyir yod ches par mi 'gyur/de dag gis smras pa/btsun pa dge 'dun 'tsho bdag cag ni
154b7('dul ba): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyi nyan thosu gyur te/ji tsamo ni bdag cag zan gyi gral du 'thab mo bgyis pas las de'i rnam par smin pos bdag cag nye che 'i
155a1('dul ba): sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi nang du skyes te/bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos pa dag sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ba gang lags pa de lta bu'i
155a2('dul ba): gnas kyang mchis par 'gyur//btsun pa dge 'dun 'tsho de'i slad du 'dzam du'i gling du gshegs nas/tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams la tshe dang ldan pa dag 'di lta ste dper na//
155a3('dul ba): 'od srung gi dge sbyong dag ltar zan gyi bral du 'thab mo ma byed cig/sdug bsngal gyi tshogs de lta bu'i skal ba can du 'gyur bar mo byed cig ces don 'di rgya cher brjod na log so//
155a4('dul ba): des de ltar bya'o zhes khas blangs te song ngo //ji tsam na de kho na bzhin du sa las dgon pa zhig na gtsug lag khang gnyis par+N+Na babs mthon po dang ldan po/mthong khung dang /
155a5('dul ba): skar khung dra ba can dang /lan kan gyis brgyan pa snying dang mig 'brog par byed pa/mtho ris kyi them skasu gyur pa/khri dang khri'u dang yo byad phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa/shing
155a6('dul ba): ljon pa sna tshogs kyis bskor ba/rdzing bu dang /mtshe rus nye bar mdzes par byas pa/ngang ba dang /khrung khrung dang /rma bya dang /ne tso dang /ri skegs dang /khu byug dag
155a7('dul ba): mngon par sgra 'byon pa/lha'i gnas ltar dpal gyis 'bar ba zhig dang /do na dge slong legs par bgos shing 'i gas por sbyangs pa/spyod lam zhi bas gnas pa dag mtho
155b1('dul ba): nas gus pa dang bcas pas de dag gi gan du songo //de nas de dag gus pa dang sgrim pa dang bcas pas/des smras pa/btsun pa dge 'dun 'tsho byon pa legaso//byon pa leg so//
155b2('dul ba): khyod da bzod ga las byon/des ji ltar gyur pa thams cad brjod pa dang /de nas de dag gis ngal sor bcug ste/lam gyi dub pa bsal nas/gtsug lag khong du khrid do//dri
155b3('dul ba): tsom na stan bzang po bshams pa dang /khams bsod pa'i spyi sungs bshams pa dag mthong nas de dag gis de la smras pa/btsun pa dge 'dun 'tshe mi skyems sam/mi
155b4('dul ba): sbrebs sam/des smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa dag skomo bkros//de dag gis smras pa/btsun pa dge 'dun 'tshe gsol cig/des smras pa/dge 'dun gyi mang du bza'o//
155b5('dul ba): de dag gis smras pa/btsun pa dge 'dun 'tshe khyed shul gyis mnyel ba lags kyis gsol cig/slad kyis 'dir nyes dmigs 'byung bar 'gyuraro//des nyes dmigs
155b6('dul ba): mthong bas zos nas mtha' gcig tu song ste 'dug go/ji tsam na de dag dro la bab ste/gar+b+he brdungs pa na rang rang gi lhung bzed thogs te gral rims bzhin du 'khod//de
155b7('dul ba): dag 'khod pa dang gtsug lag khang de yang mi snang bar gyur cing /bza' ba dang btung ba de dag kyang lcags khu dag tu gyur to//de nas de dag ji srid dro ma yol gyi bar du lcags
156a1('dul ba): khu de dag gis phan tshun gtor nas/de dag lus tshig cing sdug bsngal ba'i tshor bas nyen nas nyams zag pa'i skad 'byin to//ji tsam na dro yol ba dang /gtsug
156a2('dul ba): lag khang de yang de kho na bzhin du phyir byung zhing dge slong de dag kyang de kho na bzhin du spyod lam zhi bas gnaso//de nas tshe dang ldan pa dge 'dun 'tsho de dag gi gan du song ste dris pa/tshe dang
156a3('dul ba): ldan pa dag khyed su yin/las gang gis 'dir skyes/de dag gis smras pa/btsun pa dge 'dun 'tsho 'dzam bu gling pa'i mi rnams yid ches par dka' bas/khyod yid ches par
156a4('dul ba): mi 'gyur ro//des smras pa/kho bos mngon sum kho nar mthong na ci'i phyir yid ches par mi 'gyur/de dag gis smras pa/btsun pa dge 'dun 'tshe bdag cag ni yang dag par
156a5('dul ba): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi nyan thosu gyur te/ji tsam na dge 'dun la snum bag gi rnyed pa byung zhing dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa dag kyang lhags pa na/bdag cag ser sna yongasu
156a6('dul ba): bzung ba dag gis ji srid dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa dag ma dong ba de srid du bza' bar mi bya'o zhes de ltar sems bskyed cing tshig tu yang brjod la/zhag bdun gyi bar du dus ma yin pa'i
156a7('dul ba): yul ngan byung nas/des bza' ba dang btung ba de dag rul cing mi rung bar gyur pa de ltar bgyis te/bdag cag gi dad pas sbyin par bya ba chud gzan pas/las de'i rnam par
156b1('dul ba): sman pas bdag cag nyi tshe ba'i sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi nang du skyes te/bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos pa dag sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ba gang lags pa
156b2('dul ba): de lta bu'i gnas kyang mchis par 'gyuraro//btsun pa dge 'dun 'a tshe de'i slad du 'dzam bu'i gling du gshegs nas/tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams la/tshe dang ldan pa dag
156b3('dul ba): 'di lta ste/dper na 'od srung gi dge sbyong dag ltar dad pas sbyin par bya ba chud ma gzon cig/sdug bsngal gyi tshogs de lta bu'i skal ba can du 'gyur bar ma byed cig ces don 'di rgya
156b4('dul ba): cher brjod na leg so//de de ltar bya'o//zhes khas blangs nas song ngo //ji tsam na yang de khaM ni bzhin du sa la'i dgon po zhig na gtsug lag khang gsum po rta babs mthon po dang
156b5('dul ba): ldan pa/mthong khung dang /skar khung dra ba can dang /lan kan gyis brgyan pa/snying dang mig 'brog par byed pa/mtho ris kyi them ska su gyur pa/khri dang khri'u dang /yo byad
156b6('dul ba): phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa/shing ljon pa sna tshogs kyis bskor ba/rdzing bu dang /mtshe'us nye bar mdzes par byas pa/ngang pa dang /khrung khrung dang /rma bya dang /nau
156b7('dul ba): tse dang /ri skegs dang /khu byug dag mngon par sgra 'byin pa/lha'i gnas ltar dpal gyis 'bar ba zhig dang /de na dge slong legs par bgos shing legs par sbyangs pa/
157a1('dul ba): spyod lam zhi bas gnas pa dag mthong nas/gus pa dang bcas pas de dag gi gan du song ngo //de nas de dag gus par sgrim pa dang bcas pas de la smras pa/
157a2('dul ba): btsun pa dge 'dun 'tsho byon pa le gso byin pa legaso//khyod da bzod ga las byon/des ji ltar gyur pa thams cad brjod pa dang /de nas de dag gi ngal sor bcug ste/lam
157a3('dul ba): gyi dub pa bsal nas/gtsug lagau khang du khridado//ji tsam na stan bzang po bshams pa dang /kha zas gsod pa'i spyi bungs bshams pa dag mthong nas/de dag gis
157a4('dul ba): de la smras pa/btsun pa dge 'dun 'tsho mi skye mas sam/mi sbrebs sam/des smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa dag skom bkros so//de dag gis smras pa/btsun pa dge 'dun
157a5('dul ba): 'tsho gsol cig/des smras pa/dge 'dun gyi nang du bza'o//de dag gis smras pa/btsun pa dge 'dun 'tsho khyod shul gyis mnyel ba lags kyi de gsol cig/slad kyis
157a6('dul ba): 'dir nyes dmigs 'byung bar 'gyuraro//des nyes dmigs mthong bas/zos nas mtha' gcig tu song ste 'dug/ji tsam na de dag drol bab ste/gaN+DI brdungs pa na rang rang gi
157a7('dul ba): lhung bzed thogs te gral rims bzhin du 'khod do//de dag 'khod pa dang de dag gi gtsug lag khang de 'bar rab tu 'bar kun tu rab tu 'bar zhing ma lce gcig tu gyur nas/sreg
157b1('dul ba): bar brtsam so//de nas de dag ji srid du dro ma yol gyi bar du me lce des bsregs nas/de dag lus tshig cing sdug bsngal gyi char bas nyen pas nyam thag pa'i skad 'byin to//ji tsam na dro
157b2('dul ba): yol ba dang gtsug lag khang de yang de kho na bzhin du phyir byung zhing /dge slong de dag kyang de kha na bzhin du spyod lam zhi bas gnaso//de nas tshe dang ldan pa dge 'dun 'tsho de dag gi gan du song
157b3('dul ba): ste dris pa/tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed su yin/las gang gis 'dir skyes/de dag gis smras pa/btsun pa dge 'dun 'tsho 'dzam bu'i glang pa'i mi rnams ni yid ches par dka' bas/khyed
157b4('dul ba): yod ches par mi 'gyuraro//des smras pa/kho bos mngon sum kho nor mthong na/ci'i phyir yid ches par mi 'gyur/de dag gis smras pa/btsun pa dge 'dun 'tsho bdag cag ni yod
157b5('dul ba): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi nyan thosu gyur te/ji tsam na bdag cag tshul khrims 'chal pa dang /sdig pa'i chos can du gyur nas/dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan pa
157b6('dul ba): rnams kyis bdag cag gtsug lag khang nas bskrad pa dang /bdag cag gtsug lag khang stong pa zhig tu 'khod do//ji tsam na dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan pa gcig cig rgyud na//
157b7('dul ba): dar phyin pa dang /de nas bdag cag la blo skyes pa 'di gcig pus bdag cag gi yan sbyong bar 'gyur gyis/'dug pa rag go snyam pa dang /de de nyid du 'dug/ji tsam ni de'i zhar
158a1('dul ba): gyis yang dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan pa mang po dag lhags nas/de dag gis bdug cag de nas bskrad//de nas bdag cag mi bzod pa skyes pa dag gis shing dang
158a2('dul ba): rtswa dang lci ba skam po dag bcer te/gtsug lag khang la me btang nas/der dge slong bslab pa 'dod pa mang po dgra bsregs pas/las de'i rnam par smon pas bdag cag nyi tshe ba'i
158a3('dul ba): sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi nang du skyes te/bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos pa dag sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ba gang lags pa de lta bu'i gnas kyang mchis
158a4('dul ba): bar 'gyuraro//btsun pa dge 'dun 'tsho de'i slad du 'dzam bu'i gling du gshegs nas tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams la/tshe dang ldan pa dag 'di lta ste/dpe rtson 'od srung
158a5('dul ba): gi dge sbyong ltar tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa dag la sdang ba'i sems ma skyed cig/sdug bsngal gyi tshogs de lta bu'i skal ba can du 'gyur bar mi byed cig/ces don 'di rgyu
158a6('dul ba): cher brjod na legaso//des de ltar bya'o zhes khas blangs te song ngo //ji tsam na sems can rtsig pa 'dra ba dag dang /ka ba 'dra ba dag dang /shing ljon pa 'dra ba dag dang /lo
158a7('dul ba): ma 'dra ba dag dang /me tog 'dra ba dog dang /'bras bu 'dra ba dag dang /thag pa 'dra ba dag dang /phyags ma 'dra ba dag dang /phor ba 'dra ba dag dang /gtun 'dra
158b1('dul ba): bdag dang /phru ba 'dra ba dag dang /rkang pa chad /chu rgyus kyis bzung ba dag 'dod pa yang mthong ngo //tshe dang ldan pa dge 'dun 'tsho yang mthar gyis ljongasu sang ba dang ji tsam nu ngasti garma/
158b2('dul ba): shig na drang srong lnga brgya tsam 'khod de/de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa dge 'dun 'tsho thag ring po kho na nas 'ong ba mthong //de nas de dag gis gros bye bar brtsams pa/shes ldan
158b3('dul ba): dag nyon cig/shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong 'di dag ni smra ba mang ba yin pas/'di la sus kyang tshig sbyin par mi bya'o zhes de dag gis khrimasu bya ba bcas te 'khod do//tshe dang ldan
158b4('dul ba): dge 'dun 'tsho yang spyod lam zhi bas de dag gi gan du song ste/bsti gnas brnya bar brtsams pa ni/'gas kyang tshig ma ster to//de nas drang srong bsod nams 'dod pa gcig
158b5('dul ba): cig gis smras pa/khyod la ci'i phyir bsti gnas mi brnyan te/'di ltar khyed la nyes pa yod//khyed ni smra ba mang ba yin//de lta mod kyis dam tshig gis brnya bar bya ste/gal
158b6('dul ba): te chung zad kyang mi sman nganano//tshe dang ldan pa dge 'dun 'chos smras pa/drang srong de bzhin du byas mi smra'o//de na drang srong gcig cig ljongs rgyur song ba'i de'i spyil bu stong par 'dug

159a1('dul ba): dag gis de mthong nas/de dag gis smras pa/shes ldan dag shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong 'di dag ni gtsang sbra byed pa yin//tshe dang ldan pa dge 'dun 'tsho skyil dur
159a2('dul ba): phyi rol du rkang pa gnyis bkrus te/spyil bur zhugs nas skyil mo krung bcas te/lus drang por bskyong nas dran pa phyogs par bzhag ste 'dug/de nas bisti gnas de na lho mo zhig
159a3('dul ba): 'dug pa gang yin pa de mtshan mo thun dong po la/tshe dang ljon pa dge 'dun 'tsho ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/des smras pa/'phags pa dge 'dun 'tsho chos bstan du gsol/
159a4('dul ba): des smras pa/lha mo khyod bde bar gyur cig/kho bos khrim su bya bas bsti gnas rnyed pa khyod kyis ma mthong ngam/ci kho bo skud par 'dod dam/des bsams pa/rab tu
159a5('dul ba): byung ba 'di ngal gyis 'di ltar gung thun la 'ong bar bya'o snyam nas/de gung thun la 'ongs te smras pa/'phags pa dge 'dun 'tsho chos bstan du gsol/des smras pa/sring ma
159a6('dul ba): khyokhyed kha rog mi sdod pas/kho bo nges par bskrad par 'dod dam/des bsams pa/rab tu byung ba 'di da dung ga nyid kyis myos kyis thun tha ma la 'ong bar bya'o snyam nas/
159a7('dul ba): thun tha ma la 'ongs te smras pa/'phags pa dge 'dun 'tsho ci'i slad du gzims/mtshan mo dgung sangs kyis sa zhengs la chos bstan du gsol/des smras pa/sring
159b1('dul ba): mo khyod kyis kho bo rnam pa thams cad du bskradado//des smras pa/'phags pa mtshan mo'i dgung spangs pas/gal te kho bo bskrad na yang cir 'gyur/bzhud do 'tshal 'di ltar bcom
159b2('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis 'jigs pa dang /'dzeg su rung ba bzod par bya'o zhes bka' ma stsal tam/tshe dang ldan pa dge 'dun 'tshos bsams pa/sring mo 'di zer ba ni bden te/gal te
159b3('dul ba): kho bo bskrad na 'gro la rag gis/'di ltar 'di dag ni bram ze yin pas bram ze dang yang dag par ldan pa'i tshogasu bcad par brjod par bya'o snyam nas/des bram ze'i sde tshan 'di skad
159b4('dul ba): ces som nyi ma rgal gcer bu'i spyod pa dang /ral po rdza ba dang sna tshogs zas dang ni//thang la nyal dang rdul dang dri ma dang //rtsog bu'i spong bas mi dag 'byung mi 'gyur//'byung
159b5('dul ba): po kun la 'tshe ba rnam spangs te//chos spyod zhi dul yang dag sdom pa dang //tshangs spyod ldan pa rgyan gyis brgyan gyur kyang //de nyid bram ze dge sbyong dge slong yin//zhes kha
159b6('dul ba): don bya bar brtsamaso//de dag gis de thos nas de dag gis bsems pa/bram ze dang yang dag por ldan pa'i tshig su bcad pa zer ro//snyam nas gcig nye bar 'ong ngo //de
159b7('dul ba): bzhin du gnyis pa dang /gsum pa nas de dag thams cad kyi bar du nye bar lhags pa dang /lha mo des ci nas kyang de dag gcig ni cig mi mthong ba de ltar byin gyis brlabs//
160a1('dul ba): na tu da na ga na rlung tu ga rgyu mjug na gags pas pa gad/na sun na

160a3('dul ba): 'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas pa /gcig pu dben par song ste nang du yang dag gzhag pa na/sems la sems kyis yongasu rtog pa 'di lta bu byung
160a4('dul ba): ste/kye ma 'jig rten 'di sdug bsngal bar gyur te/'di lta ste skye bar 'gyur/rga bar 'gyur/'chi bar 'gyur/nyams par 'gyur/'byung bar 'gyur yang /'anangan kyang
160a5('dul ba): sems can 'di dag gis ni shi bis bla ma yid bzhin du nges pa 'byung ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mi nis snyam nus pa 'di snyam du sems te/gang yo na rga shi 'brung
160a6('dul ba): zhing /rkyen gang gis rgyu shrI 'byung snyam du tshul bzhin yid la byed ba na/'di ltar skye ba yang narga sh+lo 'byung ning skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi 'byung snyam du yang dag pa ji lta ba 'ini
160a7('dul ba): mngon par rtogs par gyur to//nga 'di snyam du sems te/gang yod na skye ba 'byung zhing rkyen gang gis skye ba 'byung snyam du/nga tshul bzhin yid la byed pa na/'di ltar
160b1('dul ba): srid pa yod na skye ba 'byung zhing /srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba 'byung ngo snyam du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mngon par rtogs par gyur to//nga 'di snyam du sems te/gang yod na srid pa

160b4('dul ba): tshor ba yod na sred pa 'byung zhing /tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa 'byung ngo snyam du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin mngon par rtogs par gyur to//nga 'di snyam du sems te/gang yod na

161b1('dul ba): bsngal ba dang /yid mi bde ba dang /'khrug pa rnams 'byung ste/de ltar na sdug bsngal gyi phung po 'ba' shig pa 'byung bar 'gyur snyamo//nga 'di snyam du sems te/gang med na rga shi ma
161b2('dul ba): 'byung zhing /gang 'gags pas rga shi 'gag snyam du nga tshul bzhin yod la byed pa ni/'di ltar skye ba med na rga shi mo 'byung zhing /skye ba 'gags pas rga shi 'gag go snyam du yang dag/

162a1('dul ba): nga 'di snyam du sems te/gang med na sred pa mi 'byung zhing gang 'gags pas sred pa 'gag snyam du nga tshul bzhin yid la byed pa na/'di ltar tshor ba med na
162a2('dul ba): sred pa mi 'byung zhing /tshor ba 'gag pas sred pa 'gag go snyam du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mngon par rtogs par gyur to//nga 'di snyam du sems te/gang med na tshor ba mi

162a4('dul ba): dag pa ji lta ba bzhin mngon par rtogs par gyur to//nga 'di snyam du sems te/gang med na reg pa mi 'byung zhing /gang 'gags pas reg pa 'gag snyam du nga tshul bzhin yid la byed

162b6('dul ba): zhing /ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed rnams 'gago snyam du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin mngon par rtogs par gyur te/'di lta ste/ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed rnams
162b7('dul ba): 'gags pas rnam par shes pa 'gag/'du byed rnams 'gags pas rnam par shes pa 'gag/rnam par shes pa 'gags pas ming dang gzugs 'gag/ming dang gzugs

163a3('dul ba): ste sngags 'den pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /yid mi bde ba dang /'khrugs pa rnams 'gag ste/de ltar na sdug bsngal gyi phung po 'ba' zhig pa 'di 'gag par 'gyur
163a4('dul ba): snyam mo////'dul lha gzhi/bam po bcu pa//dge slong dag nga 'di snyam du sems te/ngas sngon gyi lam dang /sngon gyi bgrod pa dang /
163a5('dul ba): sngon gyi lam srol/sngon gyi drang srong rnams gshegs shing rje su 'dongs pa rnyed do snya mo//'di lta ste/dper na mi zhig dgon pa nags mchog tu 'khyam zhing 'gro ba ni/
163a6('dul ba): snron gyi lam dang /sngon gyi bgrod pa dang /sngon gyi lam srel/sngon gyi mi rnams dong zhing rje su 'dong ba zhig rnyed nas/de de'i rjesu song ba dang /sngon gyi grong khyer dang
163a7('dul ba): sngon gyi rgyal po'i pho brang kun dga' ra ba phun sum chags pa/tshil phun sum tshogs pa dang /rdzing bu phun sum tshogs pa dang /bzang ba nags dang ldan pa/dga'
163b1('dul ba): par 'gyur ba zhig mthong zhing /mthong nas kyang de 'di snyam du sems te/bdag rgyal po'i gan du song ste brjod par bya'o snyam nas/des rgyal po'i gan du song ste lha mkhyen par mdze
163b2('dul ba): cig/'di ni bdag dgon pa nags mchog gcig tu 'khyam zhing mchi ba na/sngon gyi shul dang /sngon gyi bgrod pa dang /sngon gyi shul sral/sngon gyi mi rnams mchis shing rje su
163b3('dul ba): mchi ba zhig rnyed nas/bdag de'i rje su ma mchis pa dang /sngon gyi grong khyer dang /sngon gyi rgyal po'i pho brang kun dga' ra ba phun sum tshogs pa/tshal phun sum tshogs pa/rdzing
163b4('dul ba): bu phun sum tshogs pa/bzang ba nags dang ldan pa/dga' bar gyur pa zhig mthong ste/lhas de grong khyer bgyid du gsol la/de rgyal po'i pho brang bgyid du skyel cig dang /
163b5('dul ba): dus gzhan na de rgyal po'i pho brang 'byor pa rgyas pa bde ba lo legam pa/skye bo dang mi mang pos gang bar 'gyur ro zhes zer ba de bzhin du/dge slong dag ngas kyang sngon gyi lam dang /
163b6('dul ba): sngon gyi bgrod pa dang /sngon gyi lom srol/sngon gyi drang srong rnams gshogs shing rje su 'dang ba rnyedado//dge slong dag sngon gyi lam dang /sngon gyi bgrod pa dang /sngon gyi lam
163b7('dul ba): srel/sngon gyi drang srong rnams gshegs shing rje su 'dod pa de gang zhe na/'di lta ste/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'di lta ste/yang dag pa'i lta ba dang /yang dag par
164a1('dul ba): rtogs pa dang /yang dag pa'i ngagu dang /yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang /yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang /yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang /yang dag pa'i dran du dang /
164a2('dul ba): yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin te/dge slong dag 'di ni sngon gyi lam dang /sngon gyi bgrod pa dang /sngon gyi lam srol/sngon gyi drang srong rnams gshegs shing rje su 'dong pa yin no//
164a3('dul ba): dus der song cing der son pa na/rga shi mthong zhing rga shi kun 'byung ba dang /rga shi 'gog pa dang /rga shi 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mthong //skye ba dang /srid pa dang /
164a4('dul ba): len pa dang /sred pa dang /tshor ba dang /reg pa dang /skye mched drug dang /ming dang gzugs dang /rnam par shes pa dang /'du byed rnam sa mthong zhing /'du byed
164a5('dul ba): rnams kun 'byung ba dang /'du byed rnams 'gog pa dang /'du byed rnams 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mthong ste/ngas rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon par rdzogs par byang
164a6('dul ba): chub nas/dge slong rnams dang /dge sbyong ma rnams dang /dge bsnyen rnams dang /dge bsnyen ma rnams da n+te/gzhan yang mu stegs can dang /dge sbyong dang /bram ze
164a7('dul ba): dadeng /spyod pa can dang /kun tu rgyu sna tshogs dag la brjod do//de la dge slong gis kyang yang dag par sgrub pa na sgrub par byed pa yin zhing rigs pa dang ldan pa/chos dang
164b1('dul ba): ldan pa/dge ba sgrub par byed//dge slong ma dang /dge bsnyen dang /dge bsnyen mas kyang yang dag par sgrub pa na/sgrub par byed pa yin zhing /rigs pa dang ldan pa/chos dang ldan
164b2('dul ba): pa dge ba sgrub par byed de/de ltar tshangs par spyod pa 'di ni rgya che ba/skye bo mang po la phan pa/yang dag par gyur pa/lha dang mi'i bar dag la yang dag par rab tu bstan pa yino zhes
164b3('dul ba): ston cing /de nas mjug tu/'byung po gang dag 'dir ni lcags gyur cing //sa 'am 'on te bar snang 'khod pa dang //skye dgu rnams la rtag tu byams byed cing //nyin dang mtshan
164b4('dul ba): du chos kyang spyod gyur cig/ces bsngos pa dang /de dag thams cad kyis bden pa mngon par rtogs ma thag tu phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob ste/rdzu 'phrul yang mngon par bsgrub so//
164b5('dul ba): de nas de dag thams cad kyis btsun pa dge 'dun 'tsho legs par gsungaso//legs par gsungaso//zhes mgroni gcig tu sgra phyungango //de nas lha mo des rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba
164b6('dul ba): de brtul ba dang /gcig gis cig mthong bar gyur to//de dag gis gcig gis cig mthong nas smras pa/kye khyod kyang 'ongs sam/khyod kyang 'ongs sam/kho bos 'ongs//
164b7('dul ba): legaso de dag gis 'byor pa rnyed cing snyed pa snyed nas smras pa/btsun pa dge 'dun 'tsho bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang /bsnyen par rdzogs
165a1('dul ba): pa dge slong gi dngos po gnang na/bdag cag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par dgyi'o//des 'dzum pa sngon du btang ste smras pa/tshe dang /
165a2('dul ba): ldan pa dag khyod spobs pa rgya chen po zhum pa med pa dge ba dang ldan pa legaso legaso//bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang phan yon lnga yang dag par rje su mthong ba'i mkhas pas rab
165a3('dul ba): tu 'byung ba la mos par bya ba kho nar rigs te/lnga gang zhe na/bdag gis rang gi don ma 'dres pa rjesu thob par 'gyuraro zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes mthong ba'i mkhas pas rab
165a4('dul ba): tu 'byung ba la mos par bya ba kho nar rigs pa dang /bdag gang dag gi bran dang mngag gzhug pa dang /bsko ba dang /rang dbang med pa dang /dga' dgur 'gror med pa yin pa de
165a5('dul ba): dag gis mchod par bya ba dang /bstod par bya bar 'gyur ro zhes bya bar yang dag par rjesu mthong ba'i mkhas pas rab tu 'byung ba la mos par bya ba kho nar rigs pa dang /grub
165a6('dul ba): pa dang /bde ba'i bla ni med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar yang dag par rje su mthong ba'i mkhas pas rab tu 'byung ba la mos par bya ba kho nar rigs pa
165a7('dul ba): dang /grub pa dang /bde ba blo na med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa la nyams na yang lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyuraro zhes bya bar yang dag par rje su mthong ba'i mkhas pas
165b1('dul ba): rab tu 'byung ba la mos par bya ba kho nar rigs pa dang /rab tu byung ba ni sangs rgyas rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos dam pa yang dag par song ba/yang dag par zhugs pa/
165b2('dul ba): skyes bu dam pa rnams kyi rnam grangs du mas bsngagaso//zhes yang dag par rje su mthong ba'i mkhas pas rab tu byung ba la mos par bya ba kho nar rigaso zhes gsungs kyis rab tu phyung shig/
165b3('dul ba): de'i phyir ci bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar rab tu 'byung ngam 'on te kho bo las/de dag gis smras pa/bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngaro//tshe dang ldan pa dge 'dun 'tshos smras pa/gal
165b4('dul ba): te de lta na tshur sheg/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dong ngo //de dag gis smras pa/btsun pa dge 'dun 'tsho ci bdag cag gau rdzu 'phrul gyis bzhud dam/'on te khyod kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis//
165b5('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa dge 'dun 'chos thos nas nyam ngo bar gyur te/des bsams pa/bdag gi mthus 'di dag gis yon tan gyi tshogs 'di lta bu thob na/bdag ni gzings lta bur gyur
165b6('dul ba): pa lta snyam nas/de bzhin nyams shing gyur te smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa dag kho bo la bya ba cung zhig yod kyis re shig yud tsam zhig sdod cig ces de shing ljon pa zhig gi drung du brten nas//
165b7('dul ba): skyil mo krung bcas te/lus drang por bsrangs nas/dran pa phyogs par bzhag ste 'dug/bcom ldan 'das kyis mang du thos pa la phan yon lnga yod/lnga gang zhe na/phung po la
166a1('dul ba): mkhas pa dang //khams la mkhas pa dang /skye mched la mkhas pa dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas pa dang /de'i gdam ngag dang rjesu bstan pa
166a2('dul ba): gzhan la rag ma las pa yin no zhes gsungs pas/des brtson 'grus brtsams pas/'khor ba'i 'khor lo cha lnga pa g.yo ba dang mi g.yo ba 'di nyid rig ste/'du byed kyi rnam pa
166a3('dul ba): thams cad nyams pa dang ltung ba dang rnam par 'thor ba dang /rnam par 'jig pa'i chos nyid kyis zil gyis mnan nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas/rigs kyi bu dag gang
166a4('dul ba): gi phyir sgra dang kha spu dang khrigs te/gos ngur smrig dag bgos nas yang dag pa kho nar dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung bar byed pa/tshangs par spyod pa'i mtha' dran
166a5('dul ba): med pa de/tshe de nyid la rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon sum du byas te/bsgrubs nas bdag gi skye ba zad do//tshangs par spyod pa spyad do//bya ba bya'o//srid pa 'di las
166a6('dul ba): gzhan mi sheso zhes go bar byed cing dgra bcom pa khams gsum po las 'dod chags dang bral ba/bong ba dang gser du mnyam pa/na mkha' dang log mo thil du mtshungs pa'i sos
166a7('dul ba): dang ldan pa/tsan dan dang sto'ur mnyam pa/rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs dral bar gyur cing /rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/srid pa
166b1('dul ba): dang /'dod pa'i rnyed pa dang /bkur sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa/dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod par bya ba dang /rjod par bya ba dang /mngon du smra bar bya bar gyur/
166b2('dul ba): to//des de dag la smras pa/shes ldan dag kho bo'i chos gos kyi grwa nas zung shig dang /kho bo'i rdzu 'phrul gyis 'dong bar bya'o//de dag de'i chos gos kyi grwa nas 'jus pa dang /
166b3('dul ba): de nas tshe dang ldan pa dge 'dun 'tshos ngang pa'i rgyal po 'dab ma brkyang ba ltar rdzu 'phrul gyis steng gi na mkha' la song ngo //ji tsam na tshong pa lnga brgya po de dag rdzas mkhosu 'bebs par rnyed pa
166b4('dul ba): na/de dag gis de mthong nas//de dag gis smras pa/'phags pa dge 'dun 'tsho khyod byon tam//byon pa legaso//kho bo 'ong so//gang du bzhud/des smras pa/rigs kyi bu
166b5('dul ba): lnga brgya po de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang /bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'dod pas/bcom ldan 'das
166b6('dul ba): kyi spyan sngar 'gro'o//de dag gis smras pa/'phags pa dge 'dun 'tsho bdag cag kyang rab tu 'byung gis/bobs la bdag cag rdzas 'khosu 'bebs kyi bar du re shig gzhesu gsol/
166b7('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa dge 'dun 'chos babs pa dang /de dag gis rdzas 'kho su phab bo//de nas des rigs kyi bu stong po de dag khrid nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ngo //de'i tshe bcom
167a1('dul ba): ldan 'das dge slong gi 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i gung la bzhugs te/chos ston par mdzad//bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa dge 'dun 'tsho skyes dang chas rta
167a2('dul ba): thag ring po kho na nas 'ong ba gzigaso//gzigs nas kyang dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag khyed kyis dge slong dge 'dun 'tsho thag ring po nas 'ong po mthong ngam/
167a3('dul ba): btsun pa mthong ngo //dge slong dag dge slong dge 'dun 'tsho 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa la skyes dang bcas shing 'ong ste/de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyes ni 'di ltar gdul ba las
167a4('dul ba): gzhan pa lta bu med do//de nas tshe dang ldan pa dge 'dun 'tsho bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/
167a5('dul ba): phyogs gcig tu 'dug/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa dge 'dun 'tshos 'di skad ces gsol te//btsun pa rigs kyi bu stong po 'di dag legs
167a6('dul ba): par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang /bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos por 'tshal na/bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse ba'i slad du 'di dag rab tu dbyung
167a7('dul ba): du gsol/bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad du gsol/bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la dge slong shog ces bya bas rab tu phyung zhing /dge slong dag tshur shog tshangs par spyad
167b1('dul ba): ba spyod cig ces bka' stsal pa dang /de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi bka'i mjug kho nar skra byi ba dang snam sbyar gyon par gyur te/skra dang kha spu zhag bdun skyes pa tsam dang /lag na lhung
167b2('dul ba): bzod dang bya ma bum thogs pa dang /dge slong bsnyen par rdzogs nas lo brgya lon pa'i spyod lam lta bur gonas par gyur to//yang smras pa/de bzhon gshegs pas tshur shog
167b3('dul ba): bka' stsal pas/skra byi snam sbyar gyon pa'i lus ldan zhing //mod la dbang po rab zhi gnas gyur te//sangs rgyas dgongs pas lus gzugs bkab par gyur/de nas bcom
167b4('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis de dag lo gdams ngag stsal nas/de dag gis brtson pa dang 'bad pa dang brtsal bas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du byas te/dgra
167b5('dul ba): bcom pa khams gsum pa las 'dod chags dang bral ba/phong ba dang gser du mnyam pa/nam mkha' dang lag mthil du mtshungs pa'i sems dang ldan pa/tsan dan dang ste'ur mnyam
167b6('dul ba): pa/rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs dral bar gyur cing /rig pa dang /mngon par shes pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/srid pa dang 'dod pa'i rnyed pa dang bkur sti la rgyab
167b7('dul ba): kyis phyogs pa/dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod par bya ba dang /rjed par bya ba dang /mngon du smra bar bya bar gyur to//de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan
168a1('dul ba): 'das la tshe dang ldan pa dge 'dun 'tshos zhus pa/btsun pa 'di na bdag gis sems can rtsig pa 'dra ba dag dang /ka ba 'dra ba dang /shing ljon pa 'dra ba dag
168a2('dul ba): dang /lo ma 'dra ba dag dang me tog 'dra ba dag dang /'bras bu 'dra ba dag dang /thag pa 'dra ba dag dang /phyags ma 'dra ba dag dang /phor pa 'dra ba dgra dang //tun 'dra ba dag dang //
168a3('dul ba): phru ba 'dra ba dag dang rked pa chad pa chu rgyus kyis gzung ba mchis pa mthong na/btsun pa de dag gis las ci zhig bgyis na/las de'i rnam par smin pas de 'dra ba dag tu gyur/bcom
168a4('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge 'dun 'tsho sems can de dag nyid kyis las tshogs rnyed pa/rkyen yongasu bsgyur ba/'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa/gdon mi za bar 'byung
168a5('dul ba): bar 'gyur ba dag byas shing bsags pas/de dag nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur/dge 'dun 'tsho las byas shing bsags
168a6('dul ba): pa dag ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/chu'i khams la mi 'gyur/me'i khams la mi 'gyur/rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur/'di ltar las dge ba dang
168a7('dul ba): mi dge ba'i las byas shing bsags pa dag ni zin pa'i phung po dang khams dang /skye mched dag la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/las rnams bskal pa brgyar yang ni//chud mi
168b1('dul ba): za ba'ang tshogs dang dus//rnyed nas lus can rnams la ni//'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid//dge 'dun 'tsho sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/bskal pa bzang po 'di la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi
168b2('dul ba): khri thub pa na/ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabasu ldan pa/bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen po/skyes bu
168b3('dul ba): 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/de ba ra na se na drang srong smra ba ri dgas kyi
168b4('dul ba): nags na nye bar brten cing bzhugs pa na/de dag de'i nyan thosu gyur to//dge 'dun 'tshe khyod kyis sems can rtsig pa 'dra ba gang dag mthong ba de dag ni dge slong dag tu gyur pa na//
168b5('dul ba): de dag gis dge 'dun gyi rtsig pa mchil mas ma rung bar byas pas/las de'i rnam par smin pas rtsig pa 'dra ba dag tu gyur to//khyod kyis sems can ka ba 'dra ba gang dag mthong ba des
168b6('dul ba): kyang /dge slong dag tu gyur pa na/de dag gis dge 'dun gyi ka ba snabs kyis ma rungs par byas pas/las de'i rnam par smin pas ka ba 'dra ba dag tu gyur to//khyod kyis sems
168b7('dul ba): can shing ldan pa 'dra ba dag dang /lo ma 'dra ba dag dang /me tog 'dra ba dag dang /'bras bu 'dra ba gang dag mthong ba de dag kyang dge slong dag tu gyur pa na/de dag gis dge 'dun
169a1('dul ba): gyi shing ljon pa dang /lo ma dang /me tog dang /'bras bu dag gang zag gi longs spyod du spyad pas/las de'i rnam par smin pas shing ljon pa 'dra ba dag dang /
169a2('dul ba): lo ma 'dra ba dag dang /me tog 'dra ba dag dang /'bras bu 'dra ba dag tu gyur to//khyod kyis sems can thog po 'dra ba dag dang phyags ma 'dra ba dag mthong ba de dag kyang dge slong dag
169a3('dul ba): tu gyur pa na/de dag gis dge 'dun gyi thag pa dang phyogs ma gang zag go longs spyod du spyad pas/las de'i rnam par smin pas thag pa 'dre ba dag dang phyugs ma 'dra ba dag tu gyur
169a4('dul ba): to/khyod kyis sems can por ba 'dra ba gang dag mthong ba de dag ni/dge tshul skem gyi gtsang sbyor du gyur pa na/de dag por ba 'khrud par byed po'i tshe/dge slong blo bu
169a5('dul ba): du 'ongs pa dag lhags nas/de dag gis dge tshul de dag la dris pa/dge tshul dag cing dge 'dun la skom 'byung bar 'gyur ram/dge tshul de dag ser snas dkris te smras pa/
169a6('dul ba): kho bo cag gi bor pa bkrus pa mthong ngam/skom 'thungs zin te//de dag gis bsams pa/dus yol ba blta snyam nas ra ba med par gyur te/bzhin gyur cing nyams te dong bas//
169a7('dul ba): las de'i rnam par smin pas phor pa 'dra ba dag tu gyur to//khyod kyis sems can gtun 'dra ba gang dag mthong ba de dag kyang dge slong dag tu gyur pa na/de dag la lhung bzed
169b1('dul ba): kyi las dag byung nas/de na dge tshul dgra bcom pa gcig dam bzhag par bskos te/de la de dag gis smras pa/dge tshul kho bo cag la gtun du 'bru mar gyi tshig ma nyung zhig
169b2('dul ba): brdungs te byin cig/des smras pa/gnas brtan dag bdag brel gyis re shig yud tsam zhig bzhes shig dang /slad kyis gsolo//de dag ma bzod pa skyes nas kun nas dkris
169b3('dul ba): pab drag pos smras pa/dge tshul gal te kho bo cig gtun la reg tu rung na kho bo cag gis khyod nyid gtun du bcug te bsrung bar yod bya na/'bru mar tshigs ma nyung zhig lta ci smos/
169b4('dul ba): dge tshul des bsams pa/'di dag kun nas dkris pa drag pos dkris pas/gal te bdag gis 'di dag la lan btab na/lhag par yang rab tu 'khrug par 'gyu ro snyam nas/
169b5('dul ba): des cang mi smra bar bsdad nas/gang gi tshe de dag kun nas dkris pa dang bral ba de'i tshe na/gang du song ste smras pa/gnas brtan dag khyed kyis bdag su lags mkhyen tam/
169b6('dul ba): de dag gis smras pa/shes te khyod ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la rab tu byung ba'i dge tshul yino//kho bo cog kyang dge slong yin//gnas brtan dag
169b7('dul ba): gal te de ltar lags kyi kyang 'di ltar bdag gis ni rab tu byung bas bgyi ba gang lags pa de bgyis//ci zhig byas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon
170a1('dul ba): sum du bgyis//khyed ni 'ching ba mtha' dag gis bcings pa lags la/bdag ni 'ching ba thams cad las nges par grol ba lags na/khyod kyis ngag
170a2('dul ba): gi las rtsub po brjod kyis sdig pa sdig pa las shogs shig dang /de lta na las srabs pa nyid dang /yong su zad pa dang /yongasu mthar thug par 'gyuraro//de dag gis sdig pa
170a3('dul ba): sdig pa las bshags kyang /las de'i rnam par smin pas gtun 'dra ba dag tu gyur to//khyod kyis sems can phrub 'dra ba gang dag mthong ba de dag ni dge slong rnams la rim gre byed
170a4('dul ba): pa'i lha 'brang su gyur te/de dag sman skol bar byed pa na/dge slong rnams kyis mi snyan par smra ba dang /de dag sems rab tu khros pas phru ba de dag gcig pas/las de'i
170a5('dul ba): rnam par smin pas phru ba 'dra ba dag tu gyur to//khyod kyi sems can rked pa chad pa chu rgyus kyis gzung ba gang dag 'dod pa mthong ba de dag kyang dge slong rnyed pa stongs pa dag tu gyur pa na//
170a6('dul ba): de dag ser snas zil gyis non pas rnyed pa bsgyur te/dbyar gyi rnyed pa gang yin pa de ni dgun gyi bsgyur/dgun gyi gang yin pa de ni dbyar gyi bsgyur bas/las de'i rnam par
170a7('dul ba): smin pas rked pa chad pa chu rgyus kyis bzung ba dag tu gyur to//dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/
170b1('dul ba): btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa dge 'dun 'tshos las ci zhig bgyis na/las de'i rnam par smin pas phyug pa nor mang ba longs spyod che ba'i khyim du skyes shing dgra bcom pa nyid mngon yul du bgyis
170b2('dul ba): pa dang /gdul ba'i don chen po bgyis par gyur/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dge 'dun 'tsho nyid kyis las tsho gas rnyed pa/rkyen yongasu bsgyur ba/'od ba
170b3('dul ba): bzhin du nye bar gnas pa/gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba dag byas shing bsags pas/dge slong dge 'dun 'tsho nyid kyis las byas shing bsogs pa de chog gzhan su
170b4('dul ba): zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur/dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa dag ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/chu'i khams la mi 'gyur/me'i
170b5('dul ba): khams la mi 'gyur/rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur gyi/'di ltar las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa dag ni zin pa'i phung po dang /khams dang skye mched dag la rnam par
170b6('dul ba): smin par 'gyur te/las rnams bskal pa brgyar yang ni//chud mi za ba' tshogs dang dus//rnyed nas lus can rnams la ni//'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid//dge slong dag
170b7('dul ba): sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa
171a1('dul ba): dang zhabasu ldan pa/bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo bsgyur ba/bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom
171a2('dul ba): ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/de ba ra na se na drang srong smra ba ri dgos kyi nags na nye bar brten cing bzhugaso//de'i bstan pa la 'di rab tu byung nas zhal ta byed
171a3('dul ba): par gyur cing /de la lhan cig gnas pa lnga brgya yod par gyur to//ri brags na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs de yang phal cher de la mngon par dad par gyur to//de nas de'i tshe
171a4('dul ba): ji srid par tshangs par spyod pa spyad na/yon tan gyi tshogs 'ga' yid ma thob bo//de dus gzhan zhig nang par gyur nas/de la rtsa ba dang /sdong bu dang /lo ma dang /me
171a5('dul ba): tog dang /'bras bu'i sman dag gis bsnyen bkur byas kyang /nad de nye bar zhi bar ma gyur cing /nyams dmas nas de'i 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe smon lam 'di skad ces bdag gis
171a6('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon gnas/bla na med pa 'od srung la tshe ji srid par tshangs par spyod pa spyad na
171a7('dul ba): yon tan gyi tshogs 'ga' yang ma thob ste/bdag gis tshe ji srid par tshangs par spyod pa spyad pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
171b1('dul ba): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma la bram ze'i khye'u khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/skye dgu tshe lo brgya thub pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
171b2('dul ba): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabasu ldan pa/bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul po kha lo bsgyur ba/bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/
171b3('dul ba): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa de'i bstan pa la bdag rab tu byung nas/nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon
171b4('dul ba): du byed par gyur cig ces gdab par brtsam so//de nas de'i lhan cig gnas pa dag lhags te/dris pa mkhan pos yon tan gyi tshogs cung zad rnyed pa mchis sam/des smras pa medo///
171b5('dul ba): de dag gis dris pa/smon lam ji skad btab/des smras pa/'di dang 'di skad ceso//de dag gis smras pa/bdag cag kyang dge ba'i bshes gnyen mkhan po le rten nas/bcom
171b6('dul ba): ldan 'das de nyid kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas/dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du byed par gyur cig/de nas ri brags na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs
171b7('dul ba): des 'phags pa de na'o zhes thos nas/de dag de'i gan du song ste dris pa/'phags pa yon tan gyi tshogs chung zad rnyed pa mchis sam/des smras pa medo//de dag gis smras pa/
172a1('dul ba): smyon lam ji skad btag/des smras pa/'di dang 'din ces//de dag gis smras pa/dag cag kyang dge pa'i bshes gnyen 'phags pa la gon nas
172a2('dul ba): ldan 'das de nyid kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas/dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du byed par gyur cig/dge slong dag de la de'i tshe/de'i dus
172a3('dul ba): na dge slong zhal ta byed par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni/dge slong dge 'dun 'tsho 'di nyid yin no//de'i lhan cig gnas po lnga brgya po gang dag yin pa de dag ni drang srong lnga brgya po 'a
172a4('dul ba): dag nyid yin no//ri brags na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs gang dag yin pa de dag ni chung ba lnga brgya po 'di dag yin//'dis der chos dang ldan pas zhal ta byas pa gang yin pa las der
172a5('dul ba): rnam par smin pas byug pa nor mang ba longs spyod che ba'i khyim du skyes//'tsho ba'i dus kyi tshe smon lam btab pa/des ni nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas/dgra bcom pa nyid
172a6('dul ba): mngon du byas shing /gdul ba'i don chen po byis par gyur to//dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa yin la/las
172a7('dul ba): gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi rnam par smin pa yong gcig tu dkar ba yin/las 'drin ma rnams kyi rnam par smin pa yang 'dren ma yin no//dge slong dag de lta bas na/las
172b1('dul ba): gcig tu gnag pa rnams spangs te/las gcig tu dkar ba rnams la bstsal bar bya ste/dge slong dag khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o//dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas/the tshom
172b2('dul ba): thams cad gcod pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/btsun pa klu gzhon nu sprul pas gang du dad pa thob par gyur/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag
172b3('dul ba): bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabasu ldan pa/bde bar gshe
172b4('dul ba): pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo bsgyur ba/bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/sangs rgyas 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/de dge slong nyi khri'i
172b5('dul ba): 'khor dang /bai ra na se na drang srong smra ba ri dgas kyi nags na nye bar brten cing bzhugaso//de nyan thos rnams la dge slong dag dgon pa dang /shing drung dang khyim gyis stong pa dang /ri'i
172b6('dul ba): sul dang /ri phug dang /rtswa spyil dang /bla gab med pa dang /dur khrod dang nags khrod dang /ri drung dang /bas mtha' gnas mal 'di dag tu bsam gtan gyis shig/dge slong
172b7('dul ba): dag bag yod par bsgrubs la phyos 'gyod par mi 'gyur bar gyis shig/'di ni nga'i gdams ngag dang rje su bstan pa yin no zhes chos ston par mdzad//bcom ldan 'das kyis dge
173a1('dul ba): slong rnams la de skad ces bka' stsal nas/dge slong rnams dgon pa dang shing drung dang /khyim gyis stong pa dang /ri phug dang /rtsa spyil dang /bla gab med pa dang
173a2('dul ba): dur khrod dang /nags khrod dang /ri drung dang /bas mtha'i gnas mal dag tu zhugaso//kha cig nir rab kyi bang ro ma la bsam gtan byed/kha cig ni gsor gyi ri bdun po dag na/kha
173a3('dul ba): tsocig ni mtsho chen po mdos pa na/kha cig ni rdzing bu dal gyis 'bab pa na/kha cig ni rnal 'byor pa'i skye bo dang /rje su 'thun pa'i grong dang /grong brdal dang /yul dang yul
173a4('dul ba): 'khor dang /rgyal po'i pho brang gi phyogs de dang de dag na bsam gtan byed//ji tsam na klu gzhon nu skyes nas ring po ma lon pa zhig mdab chags kyi rgyal po mdab bzangs kyis ri rab tu
173a5('dul ba): bang rim gyi steng du drangs pa dang /ji tsam na des dge slong spyod lam zhi bas/bsam gtan dang /klog pa dang /rnal 'byor la rjesu btsun pa dag mthong //mthong nas kyang de'i sems
173a6('dul ba): mngon par dad par gyur to//de sems dad pa skyes nas/'phags pa bdag nyid chen po 'di dag ni sdug bsngal gyi bye brag 'di lta bu las grol ba yin no snyam du sems bskyed par byed cing //
173a7('dul ba): de de dag la sems mngon par dad par byas nas dus la bab pa dang /las drug la brtson pa'i bram ze'i khyim zhig tu skyes nas/ji tsam na bsrings bskyed de chen por gyur to//de
173b1('dul ba): dus gzhan zhig na/bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi gsung rab la rab tu byung nas/des brtson pa dang /'bad pa dang /brtsal bas nyon mongs
173b2('dul ba): pa thams cad spangs pas/dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du byas te/dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa las 'dod chags dang dal ba/bong ba dang /gser du mnyam pa/na mkha'
173b3('dul ba): dang lag mthil du mtshungs pa'i sems dang ldan pa/tsan dan dang ste'ur mnyam pa/rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs drul bar gyur cing rig pa dang /mngon par shes pa dang /so so yang
173b4('dul ba): dag par rig pa thob pa/srid pa dang /'dod pa'i rnyed pa dang /bkur bsti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa/dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod par bya ba dang /rjed
173b5('dul ba): par bya ba dang /mngon du smra bar byas par gyur to//des bsams pa/bdag gi las shi 'phos gang du skyes/las gang gis snyam na/des dud 'gro nas shi 'phos shing mi
173b6('dul ba): rnams kyi nang du skyes pa dang /nyan thos chen po rnams la sems mngon par dad par byas pas skyes par mthong //des phra ma la bsams te/bdag gi pha ma ga la 'dug snyam na/klu'i
173b7('dul ba): gnas na 'dug por mthong //ci byed snyam na klu'i skye gnas na ngu zhing 'dug par mthong nas/ngos rdzu 'phrul gyis der song ste/dri bar bsam pa/yab yum ci'i slad du bshums//
174a1('dul ba): sa sa smras pa/ gags na rgyun 'a mam rnanas gas rgyam ma thun sa dun
174a2('dul ba): ma nag/des ng+yas so/ngasu ma dan bdag nyid lag ste/ga ba nas sa byu rgyan pa'i bram pa khyim du ste/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
174a3('dul ba): rgyas khyod srung gi bstan pa la rin tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad skyengs pas dgra ba com pa nyid mngon du bgyiso//'phags pa de 'o ba rgyun chags par gyur padi/bdag
174a4('dul ba): gas da sa ngas nas na/dgra bcom pa snan mtshar dang ming du byung la gsun/da kyis yin tan rgya chag sa de lta bu sas
174a5('dul ba): thog/'phags pa khyod ni bsod snyoms bzhed pa lags la/bdag cag ni bsod nams 'tshal ba la gus kyis/khyod 'di nyid du gdugs re re zhing gshegs te/zhal zas
174a6('dul ba): kyi bya ba mdzod la bzung cig/dem+b+ha dang du blangs nas des rtag par bu'i gan su 'dud rtsi zos shing ldog par byed//de lhan cig gnas pa'i dag tshul de la dge slong rnams kyum smras
174a7('dul ba): po/dge tshul khyod kyim khan pa 'di gang du zos shing 'ang /des smras pa/mau tshal to//de dag gis smras paM/klu'i gnasu lha'i bdud rtsi zas shing zas shing 'ong /
174b1('dul ba): ci'i phyir ma /des smras pa/don rdzu phrul tshe zlum thun pa lagasangs/des mtshan/bla ga dza ltar mdzes/de dog gos smras pa/gang gi cha 'od rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gru
174b2('dul ba): de'i tshe na /khyod kyis 'di'i chos gos kyi grwa nas zung shig/des smras pa/mi ltung ngam/bzhin bzangs gal te de'i chos kyi grwa la ri'i rgyal po ri rab btags na de yang mi ltung na khyod
174b3('dul ba): lta ci smos/de dag gis de spro bar byas nas/gnas gang du de rdzu 'phrul gyis mi snang bar byed pa der song ste bsdad pa dang de yang mi snang bar byed nas/des kyang chos gos kyi grwa nas
174b4('dul ba): bzung ste/de gnyis steng gi na mkha' la dong ste/ji tsam na klu rnams kyis mthong nas de gnyis kyi phyir stan gnyis bshams shing dkyil 'khor yang gnyis byas//des bsams
174b5('dul ba): pa/ci'i phyir stan bshams pa dang /dkyil 'khor gzhan 'di byas snyam nas/des rgyab tu blta bar brtsams pa dang /ji tsam na dge tshul de mthong nas des smras pa/
174b6('dul ba): bu khyod kyang 'ongs sam/mkhan po mchi so//leg so klu rnams kyis bsams pa/'phags pa 'di ni rdzu 'phrul che ba/mthu che ba yin pas/lha'i bdud rtsi zhu bar nus na/'phags
174b7('dul ba): pa 'dis ni zhu bar mi nus kyis/'di la kha zas tha mal po sbyin par bya'o snyam nas/de rnams kyis gcig le ni lha'i bdud rtsi byin no//dge tshul la ni kha zas tha ma las byin//
175a1('dul ba): dge tshul de de'i lhung bzed thogs pa yin pas/des mkhan po la lhung bzed blang ba dang /des 'bras can gyi gzegs ma gcig chags nas/dge tshul des
175a2('dul ba): de khar bcug ste myangs na/lha'i bdud rtsi yin pas/des bsams pa/klu rnams ni ser sna can yin te/lhan cig tu 'khod pa gnyis la/gcig la ni lha'i bdud rtsi
175a3('dul ba): byin la/gcig la ni kha zas tha mal pa byin no snyam//de nas de mi bzod pa skyes pas/bdag gis bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon gnas bla na
175a4('dul ba): med pa 'od srung gi spyan sngar chings par spyod pa spyad pa gang yin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bo 'dis bdag klu'i gnas 'di nas nyams par byas te/'di nyid du skye bar gyur cig ces smon lam
175a5('dul ba): log pa btab bo//las shin tu chen po yongasu rdzogs pa dag ni lus rje ba la/mi ltos pas tshe 'di nyid la de'i lag pa gnyis nas chu 'dzag par gyur cing /klu de yang klad pa'i
175a6('dul ba): nad kyis btab par gyur nas/des 'phras te smras pa/'phags pa dge tshul 'dis sems mi bzang ba bskyed kyis 'di zlog shig/des dge tshul de la 'di skad ces smras//
175a7('dul ba): bu 'di dag la sems mi bzang ba bskyed pa zlog shog/des tshig su bcad pa smras pa/sems 'di thag ring gyur pa ste//'di ltar 'di na gnas bzhin du//bdag gi lag
175b1('dul ba): na chu 'dzags pas//bzlog par bgyi ba mi nuso//des klu de gnas de nas nyams yar byas nas de nyid du skyes te/dge slong dag klu gzhon nu sprul pas dang po der dad pa thob par gyur to//
175b2('dul ba): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/rgyal byed kyi tshel mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra bo na bzhug so//ji tsam ni mu stegs can zhig rgyal byed kyi tshal du phyin pa
175b3('dul ba): dang /des de na stan bzang po bshams pa dang /bza' ba dang btung ba bsod pa'i spyi bungs bshams pa mthong nas des bsams pa/zang zing gi longs spyod ni shAkya'i bu'i dge
175b4('dul ba): skyosbyong 'di dag gi bzang la/chos kyi longs spyod ni bdag cag gi bzang bas/de'i phyir 'di dag gi nang du rab tu byung ba zang zing gi longs spyod ni 'dir bya zhing chos kyi longs spyod ni der
175b5('dul ba): byibyo'o snyam nas/de dge slong gi gan du song ste smras pa/'phags pa bdag rab tu 'byung bar 'chi'o//des de rab tu phyung zhing bsnyen por rdzogs par byas//mu stegs can rnams
175b6('dul ba): kyi gso sbyong ni bcu bzhi pa yin la/dge slong rnams kyi gso sbyong ni bco lnga pa yin pas/de tshes bcu bzhi la na mu stegs can rnams kyi gso sbyong nyamasu myong bar byed/chos
175b7('dul ba): bco lnga lo ni dge slong rnams kyi'o//ji tsam na dus gzhan zhig no zhag bri bar gyur na/dge slong rnams kyi gso sbyong bcu bzhi pa la bab pa dang /de la the tshom skyes te/ci dang
176a1('dul ba): 'gro bar bya ma/'on te 'di nyid du gso sbyong nyam su myong bar bya snyam pa las/de la blo skyes pa shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong 'di dag ni/des pa 'grogs na bde ba yin la/
176a2('dul ba): bdag gi tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams ni ngang tshul ngan pa yin pas/gal te ma song na bdag gi tshul shing yang phyung bar 'gyur/spang la khri'u yang 'asgyur bar 'gyur/smo
176a3('dul ba): phor yang khams phub par 'gyur/khar ba yang bar 'gyur tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyi nang nas kyang phyung bar 'gyur snyam nas/de mu stegs can rnams kyi nang du so //
176a4('dul ba): ji tsam na dge skos rgan pa'i mtha' logasu 'greng ste/dge slong rnams la bsngos pa na/de mi snang bas des dri bar brtsams pa/tshe dang ldan pa dag dge slong ming 'di zhes bya ba zhig
176a5('dul ba): yiding 'ongs sam/de'i 'dun pa yang 'ongs sam/de dag gis smras pa ma 'ongaso//bcom ldan 'das kyis phyogs bzhir bltas nas/gso sbyong bya'o zhes bka' stsal pas/
176a6('dul ba): dge slong de dag gis phyogs bzhir bltas te gso sbyong byas//de'i 'og tu phyi de nyin par dge slong de 'ongs pa dang /dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa khyed gang nas 'ongs/
176a7('dul ba): des smras pa/tshangaso pa mtshungs pa dag gi gno nas so//khyod kyi tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa dag su yin mu stegs can dag yin te/kho bo zang zing gi longs spyod ni khyod
176b1('dul ba): cag gi gan du byud la/chos kyi yongs spyod ni de dag gi gan du byed//zhes thong ba'iskabs do/bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol ba dang /de nas bcom ldan
176b2('dul ba): 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal po/dge slong dag gang zag 'di ni mu stegs can zhugs pa yin te/dge slong gang zag mu stegs can zhugs pa ni/chos 'dul ba 'di
176b3('dul ba): la mi skye ba'i chos can yin pas/dge slong dag khyod kyis gang zag mu stegs can zhugs pa chos 'dul ba 'di la bsnyil bar bya'o//'ga' zhig gi gan du rab tu 'byung bar
176b4('dul ba): 'dod po 'ongs na/des de la mu stegs can zhugs pa ma yin nam zhes dri bar bya'o//ma dris par rab tu 'byin par byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyuraro//sangs rgyas bcom
176b5('dul ba): ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis nus pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gang zag mu stegaso can zhugs pa chos 'dul ba 'di las brnyil bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal
176b6('dul ba): nas/btsun pa ji tsam gyis na gang zag mu stegs can zhugs pa bsnyil bar bgyi ba lags/nye bar 'khor gang chu cha nas rgyal mtshan 'di mtshan 'di 'chang zhing lta ba de la
176b7('dul ba): dga' bas/der skya reng 'char bar byed na/de de tsam gyis na gang zag mu stegs can zhugs pa bsnyil bar bya ba yino//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/
177a1('dul ba): rgyal byed kyi tshol mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhug so//mnyan yod na khyim bdag cig 'dug pa des/rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas
177a2('dul ba): de dang de lhan cig rtse bar byed/dga' bar byed/dga' dgur spyod par byed/rtse bar byed/dga' bar byed/dga' dgur spyod par byed pa de'i bu byung nas/des chung ma
177a3('dul ba): la smras pa/bzang mo'u bu cag gi bu lon 'khor bar byed pa/nor spyod pa btsam pos/kho bo zong thogs te yul gzhan du 'gro bor bya'o//des smras pa/rje'i sras de
177a4('dul ba): bzhin mdzod cig/de zong thogs te yul gzhan du song ba dang /de nyid du tshul ma yin pas/sdug bsngal bar gyur to//dus kyang bu de nyid du'i stobs dang lag mthus bstod
177a5('dul ba): cing gsos te bskyed do//de dus gzhan zhig na/ne'u ldangs dang /lhan cig khyim zhig gi drung du song ba na/khyim de'i steng na bu mo zhig 'dug pa des/steng du me
177a6('dul ba): tog gi chun po 'phongs pa dang /des bu mo de mthong ngo //ne'u lhungs des smras pa/grags po khyod kyis khyi mo der brda ma byas sam/des smras pa/de yin te/
177a7('dul ba): khebs brda byas//des smras pa/grogs pa khyim 'di ni yang ba yin gyis ma 'jug shig/tshul mo yin pas sdug bsngal por gyur te re zhes des nyin thog zag tu
177b1('dul ba): 'byin du bcug ste/ma'i gan du khrid nas smras pa/ma khyod kyi bu 'dis che ge mo zhig tu brda byas pa/kho bos nyin thog thag tu bsrungs kyis mtshan mo srungs shig/khyim de ni
177b2('dul ba): yong ba yin gyis 'jug tu ma gzug zhig/chul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar gyur ta ra/des smras pa/bu khyod kyis khyim la bsnyad pa/khyod kyis legs pa /
177b3('dul ba): des khye'u de khyim gyi nang du mal btsas te/gyo mo gnyis dang /chu dang se dag bzhag nas khyim der bcug ste/bdag nyid sgro khri bcas pas nya lo//des smras pa ma sgro phye shig/
177b4('dul ba): bu ci'i phyir tsor 'groro//des smras pa/bu 'di nyid du kho mos gyo mo gzhag gis der ci zhig/des yud tsam zhig bsdad smras pa/ma sgo phye shig/bu ci'i phyir bshang
177b5('dul ba): du 'gro'o//des smras pa/bu 'di nyid du kho mas gyo mo dang chu dang /sa gzhag gis 'di nyid du bshang ba byos shig/des yang yud tsam zhig bsded smras pa/
177b6('dul ba): ma sgo phye shig/des smras pa/bu khyod gang du 'gro 'dod pa kho mos mi shes sam/ci kho mos sgo dbye bar mi nuso//ma kho bos khyod gsod//des smras
177b7('dul ba): pa/bu kho mo shi ba ni blo'o//kho mo bu shi ba la lta ni mi phod do//'dod pa sten pas ni sdig pa'i las mi bya ba ci yang med pas/snying rje med pa'i sems dang ldan pa
178a1('dul ba): /'jig na pas rgyu / gro sa rgyug nas cad du sa sgyu /sus kAsmanas stong bdangan
178a2('dul ba): sdig pa'i las byas pa 'dar bas/su mo ngas de la smras pa/'i skyes 'dzin myi yang ma mchis te/bdag bu ma dang gnyi sto bas kyis bsnyungs shig/des bsams pa/
178a3('dul ba): dri'adi la smras po dga' bar 'gyur snyam nas des smras pa/bzang mi kho bos khyod kyi phyir ma gsang//des smras pa/cim ma 'am/'on te skyed ma ma/des smras pa/
178a4('dul ba): sgyi ma mno//des bsams pa/'di yon tan dag mngon par mi shes te/mo gsod par byed pas/gang gi tshe bdag la khro bskyed na/bdag la gnas sgrubs
178a5('dul ba): tse zhig 'byung bar 'gyur snyam nas/des smras pa/rje'i sras bdag steng gi khang thog tu 'jogs nas/slar mchis pa'i bar du ro shig yud tsam zhig bzhes shig/
