178a6('dul ba): des smras kyi/de bzhin gyis shig/den sbring gi khang theg tu 'jigan nas/chos rkun pacham rkun pa zhes sgra byung ba dang /de 'jigs shing sgra ga nas/sa
178a7('dul ba): rang gi khyim du song nas sgo drung du ral gri bzhig ste/chom rkun pa de ni 'di yin te/khe ba'i ma bsod nas bris so zhes sgra phyung nas/des do'i me'i rad bkur ste byas
178b1('dul ba): tI song ngo //sems can sdig pa ri las byas pas ni brtan pa mi rnyed pas/de mu stegs can gyi gnas dang /dka' thub kyi gnas de dang de dag tu song ste dris pa/shos ldan dag las
178b2('dul ba): ci zhig byas na/sdig pa'i las zad par 'gyur/de na kha cig na re/mer zhugs shig ces ze ro//kha cig na re dug zo shig ces ze ro//kha cig na re ga yang ser mchongs
178b3('dul ba): shig ces ze ro//kha cig na re thag pas 'gags te shi shig ces zer te/thams cad kyang shi ba'i thabs ston par byed kyi nges par 'byung ba'i thabs ston pa ni 'ga' yang mdo//
178b4('dul ba): de dus gzhan zhig na/rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ba dang /des de na dge slong zhig/gang gis sdig pa'i las byas po//dge ba yis ni 'gog byed//nyi zla sbyin nas byung ba ltar//
178b5('dul ba): 'jig rten 'dir ni de snang 'gyur//zhes kha don zer ba thos nas/des bsams pa/sdig pa'i las kyang dag go par nus kyi 'di dag gi gan du rab tu 'byung snyam nas/de dge
178b6('dul ba): slong gi gan du song ste smras pa/'phags pa bdag rab tu 'byung bar 'tshalo//des de rab tu phyung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs par byas nas/de shin tu brtson 'grus brtsams te klags par
178b7('dul ba): brtsams//des klog cing kha don byed pa na/sde snod gsum klags shing sde snod gsum dang ldan pa/rig pa deng grol ba'i spobs pa can du gyur to//de la dge slong dag gis smras
179a1('dul ba): pa/tshe dang ldan pa khyod brtson 'grus 'das ci zhig don du gnyer/des smras pa/sdig pa'i las zad par bya'o//khyod kyis sdig pa'i las ci byas ma pas/
179a2('dul ba): cim ma 'am/'on te skyed ma mo yin/des smras pa/bskyed ma mo yin no zhes zer ba'i skabs de/bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol ba dang /de nas bco
179a3('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag 'di ni gang zag ma bsad pa bsnyil bar 'os pa yin te/dge slong dag gang zag ma bsad pa ni/chos 'dul ba 'di
179a4('dul ba): la mi skye ba'i chos can yin pas/dge slong dag khyed kyis/gang zag ma bsad pa chos 'dul ba 'di las bsnyil bar bya'o//'ga' zhig gi gan du rab tu 'byung bar 'dod pa 'ongs
179a5('dul ba): na des do la ma bsad pa ma yin nam zhes dri bar bya'o//ma dris par rab tu 'byin par byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro//des bsams paci de 'bab par bya 'am/mtha'
179a6('dul ba): 'khob tu 'gro bar bya snyam nas/des mtha' 'khob tu song ste/khyim bdag cig rjesu 'jug par byaso//des mngon par dad pas/de'i phyir gtsug lag khang brtsig tu
179a7('dul ba): bcug ste/de phyogs dang yul tha dad pa na/'khod pa'i dge slong dag gnas shong de'i gdams ngag gis mang po dag gis dgra bcom po nyid mngon du byas//de dus
179b1('dul ba): gzhan zhig na na bar gyur nas/rtsa ba dang /sdong bu dang /lo ma dang /me tog dang /'bras bu'i sman dag gis rim gror byas na/nyams dmas pa nyid du gyur nas/de
179b2('dul ba): lhan cig gnas pa rnams la smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa dag kho bo'i phyir dge 'dun la bsro khang gyis shig/de rnams kyi de'i phyir bsro khang byaso//bsags pa kun gyi mtha' zad
179b3('dul ba): cing //mthon po rnams kyi mtha' ltung 'gyur//'phrad pa'i mtha' ni bral ba ste//gson pa'i mtha' ni 'chi ba yin/zhe bya ba yin pas/de shi zhing dus la bab nas/sems
179b4('dul ba): can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par skyes//de'i lhan cig gnas po dgra bcom pa zhig gis bdag gi mkhan po gang du skyos shes sems par zhugs nas/des lha rnams kyi
179b5('dul ba): nang du rnam par blta bar brtsams nas/ma mthong zhing /mi dang dud 'gro dang /yi dwags rnams kyi nang du rnam par bltas na/der yang ma mthong //sems can
179b6('dul ba): dmyal ba'i nang du rnam par blta bar brtsams na/sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par skyes par mthong nas/des bsams pa/mkhan po ni tshul khrims dang ldan
179b7('dul ba): ba mang du thos po/chos kyi 'khor sdud pa yin na/des las ci zhig byas na/des sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par skyes snyam nas/bsame na ma gas de ba
180a1('dul ba): yin par mthong ngo //de mnar med pa'i 'od zer dag gis phog pa dang /smras pa/kye ma bsro khang 'di me re tsha zhes smras pa dang /sems can dmyal ba'i
180a2('dul ba): srungs mas tho ba blangs te/mgor snun nas/skal chad khyod kyi bsro khang ga la yod/'di ltar 'di ni sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med pa yin no zhes smraso//de dge
180a3('dul ba): ba'i sems kyi dus la bab nas/rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skyeso//lha'i bu 'am lha'i bu mo'i chos nyid ni skyes nas ring po ma lon pa la sems gsum skye ste/
180a4('dul ba): gang nas shi 'phos pa dang /gang du skyes pa dang /las gang gis skyes pa'o//des sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi nang nas shi 'phos pa dang /rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lho rnams
180a5('dul ba): kyi nang du skyes pa dang /dge 'dun la bsro khang gi khrus byas pas skyes pa mthong ngo //de nas sngon sems can dmyal ba lha'i bu 'di snyam du sems/gang gi phyir bdag
180a6('dul ba): zhag lon par gnas te/bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang /bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir nye bar 'gro ba ni/bdag gi tshul dang 'thun pa ma yin gyis/bdag zhog ma lon
180a7('dul ba): par ma gnas pa kho nar bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang /bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir nye bar 'gro'o snyam//de nas sngon sems can dmyal ba lha'i bu rna cha gdub khor
180b1('dul ba): g.yo zhing dri ma med par thogs te/do shal dang se mo dos brgyan pa'i lus kyis/lha'i ud pa la dang /pad+ma dang /ku mu da dang /pad+ma dkar po dag gis thub bkang ste/
180b2('dul ba): dog shin tu 'das pas mtshan mo la bab pa dang /bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das la me tog dag gis mngon par gtor te/bcom ldan
180b3('dul ba): 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo ngos phyag 'tshal nas/mtha' gcig tu 'dug pa dang /'di ltar sngon sems can dmyal ba lha'i bu'i kha dog gi mthus/rgyal byed kyi tshil
180b4('dul ba): thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos khyab por gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon sems can dmyal ba lha'i bu'i bsams pa dang /bag la nyal ba dang /khams dang rang
180b5('dul ba): bzhin thugasu chud nas/gang thos nas sems can dmyal ba lha'i bus stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba/ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom
180b6('dul ba): ste/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas pa de lta bur 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yang dag par so sor rtogs par byed pa'i chos bstan par mdzad//des bden pa mthong
180b7('dul ba): nas/the tsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la gang mdzad pa 'di lta bu ni/bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/mas kyang mo bgyis/rgyal bas kyang ma bgyis/lha rnams kyis
181a1('dul ba): kyang ma bgyis/sngon gyi pha myos dag gis kyang ma bgyis/dge sbyong dang bram ze dag gis kyang ma bgyis/byams pa dang mdza' bshos dang /rtsa lag go tshogs
181a2('dul ba): kyis kyang ma bgyis te/khrag dang mchi me'i rgya mtsho ni skams/rus pa'i ri dag las ni bsgral/ngan song gi sgo dag ni bkum/mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo dag ni phye/sems can
181a3('dul ba): dmyal ba dang /dud 'gro dang /yi dgas dag nas ni rkang pa phyung /lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du gzhago zhes lan gsum ched du brjod pa ched du brjod//yang smras pa/khyod
181a4('dul ba): mthus rab drag nyes pa mang ldan pa'i//ngan song shul bkag bsod nams rab ldan pa'i//mtho ris 'gro ba phye zhing bdag gis ni//mya ngan 'das pa'i shul ni thob par gyur//
181a5('dul ba): shin tu rnam dag khyod brten bdag gis ni//de ring skyon bral dag pa'i mig thob cing //go 'phang zhi ba 'phags pa dgyes thob ste//sdug bsngal rgya mtsho pha rol rgal bar gyur//
181a6('dul ba): 'gro ba lha min mi dang lhas mchod pa//skye dang rga dang no 'chi brel ba po//srid pa stong du mthong bar rab dkon pa//thub pa de ring khyod mthong 'bras bu mchis//de nas gdud
181a7('dul ba): byas do shal rab 'phyang bas//zhabs la phyag 'tshal rengs pa skyes gyur nas//dgra thul g.yas nas yongasu bskor byas te//lha'i 'jig rten mngon phyogs mkha'
181b1('dul ba): la song //de nas ston sems can dmyal ba lha'i bu tshong pa khe spogs rnyed pa lta bu dang /zhing pa lo thog 'byor pa lta bu dang /dpa' bo g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba lta bu dang /nad pa
181b2('dul ba): nad thams cad las yongasu thar pa lta bur gyur te/cha lugs gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'ongs pa'i tshe lugs de nyid kyis rang gi gnasu song //de'i lhan cig gnas
181b3('dul ba): pa dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan dgra bcom pa zas kyi gral du 'dug ste/de'i lhan cig gnas po gzhan zhig dge 'dun la chu 'drim par byed//ji tsam na dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan
181b4('dul ba): des chu mkhar phor du blangs nas/sor mo'i rtse mor reg na/shin tu grang nas/des bsams pa/bdag cag ni chu shin tu drang mo 'di lta bu 'thung na/mkhan po ni sems
181b5('dul ba): can dmyal ba chen po mnar med pa na/zas khu bskol ba mthung snyam nas/des sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par rnam par blta ba brtsams na mi snang //dud 'gro
181b6('dul ba): dang yi dgas dang /mi dang sems can dmyal ba gzhan rnamasu yang rnam par bltas na/de rnams na yang mi snang nas lha rnams kyi bar gyi nang du rnam par blta bar brtsams na//
181b7('dul ba): rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams kyi nang du skyes to/lhar gyur pas/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bden pa mthong bar byas te/lha rnams kyi nang na 'dug pa mthong nas/
182a1('dul ba): 'dzum pa sngon du btang ste/bcom ldan 'das la dad pa thob nas/kye ma sangs rgyas/kye ma chos/kye ma dge 'dun/kye ma chos kyi legs par gsungs pa nyid//
182a2('dul ba): 'di ltar sdig pa byed pa log par ltung bar song ba de lta bu dag gis kyang /yon tan gyi tshogs 'di lta bu tho'o zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do//mkhan po gcig pa des de rangs
182a3('dul ba): shing mgu ba dang /mchog tu dga' bar mthong nas smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa khyod mkhan po dus la bab pas/bdag dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan du gyur to snyam nas rangs
182a4('dul ba): shing mgu ba dang mchog tu dga' bar gyur tam/des smras pa/tshe dang ldan po re shig khyod kyis dri ba'i lan gdab pa'i dus ma yin gyis/dge 'dun gyi nang du dris shig
182a5('dul ba): dang /der khyod kyis dri ba'i lan gdab pa'i dus la bab par 'gyur ro//ji tsam dus gzhan zhog na/dge slong gi dge 'dun tshogs shing 'khod pa na/dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan
182a6('dul ba): gyi mkhan po gcig pa de la dris pa/tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyis de'acha ci smras/des smras pa/khyod la kho bos mkhan po dus la bab pas bdag dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan du
182a7('dul ba): 'gyuraro snyam nas/rangs shing mgu ba dang /mchog tu dga' bar gyur tam zhes smraso//des skabs de dge 'dun gyi nang du de la rgya cher brjod pa dang /de yang yid
182b1('dul ba): sa shing dag rlung rnams kya /sa smras rgyas/mas/u g+sa nan/snyams kyi lags par gzusungs bcang /'das ga byung ba sog pa cu shA sa
182b2('dul ba): bde sna bu dag gis kyang /yon tan gyi tshogs de lta bu thob bzhes ched du brjed pa tshod du brjod//dzum bde na/bam po bcu gcig pa/
182b3('dul ba): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/rgyal byed tshal mgon med nas sbyin gyi kun dge' ra ba na bzhug so//mnyan yod na khyim bdag gcig 'dug pa des/rigs
182b4('dul ba): mnyam po las chung ma blangs nas/de de dang lhan cig rtsi bar byed dgu'i ba byed/dug 'dakur spyod par byed do//skye bar byang dga' bar byed/dga' dgyur spyod par byed pa
182b5('dul ba): bu byung nas/de dus gzhan zhig na/ne'u ljongs dang lhan tsog khyum lkoglo ga drung du sring pa ni/khyim do steng na bum+b+ha zhig 'dug pa des do steng du me tog gi rkun po 'phongs pa
182b6('dul ba): dang /des bu mod mthong ngo //nairu langs kyis smras pa/glogos po khyod kyis khyim der brda byos sam/des smras pa/de yin te khaM bas brda //des smras pa/
182b7('dul ba): dregs pa khyim 'di ni yang ba yin gyis/sa 'jug shig/tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar sbyor te re zhes/des nyin thog thag tu 'byin du bcug sde/nga'i shin du khyod
183a1('dul ba): nas smras pa/yab khyod kyi bu 'dis khyim che ge zhig tu brda byas pa/kho bos nyin thog thag tu bsrungs kyis/nga khyod kyis mtshan mo srungs shig/khyim
183a2('dul ba): de ni yang ba yin gyis 'jug tu ma gzhug shig/tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar gyur tA re/des smras pa/bu khyod kyis kho bo la bsnyad pa khyod kyis legs pa byas//
183a3('dul ba): des khye'u de khyim gyi nang du mal bcas te/gyo mo gnyis dang chu dang saM dag bzhag nas khyim der bcug ste/bdag nyid sgor khri bcas nas nyalo//des smras pa/yab
183a4('dul ba): sgo phye shig/bu ci'i phyir cir 'gro'o//des smras pa/bu 'di nyid du kho bos gyo mo bzhig gis der ci shig/des yud tsam zhig bsdu de smras pa/yab sgo phye shig
183a5('dul ba): bu tsa'i phyir bshang du 'go'o//des smras pa/bu 'di nyid du kho bos gyo mo dang chu dang sa bzhag gis 'di nyid du bshang ba byos shig/des yang yud tsam zhig bsdad smras
183a6('dul ba): ba/yob sgo phye shig/des smras pa/bu khyod gang du 'gro ba 'dod pa kho bos mi shes sam/ci kho bo sgo dbye bar mi nus//yab kho bos khyod gsado//des smras pa/
183a7('dul ba): bu kho bo shi ba ni bla'i/kho bo bu shi ba la lta ni mi phod do//'dod pa sten pas ni sdig pa mi bya ba ci yang med pas/snying rje med pa'i sems dang ldan pa 'jig rten pha rol
183b1('dul ba): btang ba des/ral gri shugs nas phyung ste/de'i mgo drung nas bcad nas des lce bsgyur to//des phags du nas song ba dang /sems can sdig pa'i las byas pa 'dar bas/
183b2('dul ba): bu mo des de la smras pa/rje'i sras 'di na su yang ma mchis te/bdag bu mo dang gnyisu bas kyis ma bsnyengs shig/des bsams pa/des 'di lo smras na dga' bar
183b3('dul ba): 'gyur snyam nas/des smras pa/bzang ma kha bos khyod kyi phyir phagasad//des smras pa/ci ba'am/'on te skyed pa/des smras pa/skyed pa'o//deb bsams pa
183b4('dul ba): 'di yon tan dag mngon par mi shes te/pha gsod par byed pos/gang gi tshe bdag mi khro ba skyes na/bdag la gnos skabs ci zhig 'byung bar 'gyur snyam nas/des smras
183b5('dul ba): pa/rje'i sras bdag steng gi khang thog tu 'dzegs nas slor mchi'i bar du/re shig bzhes shig/des smras pa/de bzhin gyis shig/de nas de steng gi khang thog tu 'dzi//
183b6('dul ba): nas/chom rkun pa chom rkun pa zhes sgra phyung ba dang /de 'jigs shing skrag nas bros te rang gi khyim du song nas/sgo drung ral gri bzhag ste/chom rkun pa de ni 'di yin te/
183b7('dul ba): kho bo'i phagasad nas bros zhes sgra phyung nas/nges pa'i ri de bkur sti byas te song //sems can sdig pa'i las byas pas ni/brtan po mi rnyed pas/da mu stegs can
184a1('dul ba): gyi gnas dang /dka' thub kyi nags de dang de dag tu song ste dris pa/shes ldan dag las ci zhig byas na des sdig pa'i las zang bar 'gyur/de na kha cig
184a2('dul ba): nanere mer zhugs shig ces zero//kha cig na raM dug ze shig ces zero//kha cig na re ga yang sar mtshungs shig ces zer ro//kha tsog na re chur mchongs shig ces rje ro//
184a3('dul ba): kha cig nar thag pas 'gags te sha cig ces zer te/thams cad kyang shi ba'i thabs ston par byed kyis/nges par 'byung ba'i thabs ston pa ni 'ga' yang medo//de dus
184a4('dul ba): gzhan zhig na rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ba dang /des de na dge slong zhig/gang gis sdig pa'i los byas pa//dge ba yis ni 'gog byed//nyi zla sbyin nas byung ba ltar//
184a5('dul ba): 'jig rten 'dir ni der snang 'gyur//zhes kha don zer ba thos nas/des bsams pa/sdig po'i las kyang dgag par nus kyis/'di dag gi nang du rab tu 'byung bar
184a6('dul ba): bya'o snyam nas/de dge slong gi gan du song nas smras pa/'phags pa bdag rab tu 'byung bar 'tsha'o//des de rab tu phyung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs par byas nas/des shin
184a7('dul ba): tu brtson 'grus brtsams te/klag par brtsams//des klog cing kha ton byed pa ni/sde snod gsum klags shing /sde snod gsum dang ldan pa/rig pa dang grol
184b1('dul ba): baba'i spobs pa can du gyur to//de la dge slong dag gis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa khyod brtson 'grus 'dis ci zhig don du gnyer/des smras pa/sdig pa'i las zad par bya'o//
184b2('dul ba): khyod kyis sdig pa'i las ci zhig byas/pha gsadado//ci pha'am/'on te sked pha yin/des smras pa/skad pa yin no zhes zer ba'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das l-i
184b3('dul ba): dge slong rnams kyis gsol ba dang /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag 'di ni gang zag pa gsad pa bsnyil bar 'os pa yin te/
184b4('dul ba): dge slong dag ga zag pa gsad pa ni chos 'dul ba 'di la mi skye ba'i chos can yin pas/dge slong dag khyod kyis gang zag pha gsad pa chos 'dul ba 'di las bsnyil bar bya'o//'ga'
184b5('dul ba): zhig gi gan du rab tu 'byung bar 'dod pa 'ongs na/des de la pha gsad pa ma yin nam zhes de bar bya'o//ma dris par rab tu 'byin par byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro//
184b6('dul ba): des bsams pa/tsAd 'bab par bya snyam 'am/mtha' 'khob cig tu 'gro ba bya snyam nas/des mtha' 'khob tu song ste/khyim bdag cig rjesu 'jug par byas//nges
184b7('dul ba): mngon par dad pas de'i phyir gtsug log khang brtsig tu bcug ste/der phyogs dang yul tha dad pa na 'khod pa'i dge slong dag gnas shing /de'i gdams ngag gi mang po
185a1('dul ba): dag gis dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du byas//de dus gzhan zhig nan par gyur nas/rtsa ba dang sdong bu dang /lo ma dang me tog dang /'bras bu'i sman
185a2('dul ba): dag gis rim gro byas na/nyams dmas pa nyid du gyur nas/des lhan cig gnas pa rnams la smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa dag kho bo'i phyir dge 'dun la bsro khang gyis shig/
185a3('dul ba): de rnams kyis de'i phyir bsro khang byaso//bsags pa kun gyi mtha' zad cing //mthon po rnams kyi mtha' ltung 'gyur//phrad pa'i mtha' ni 'bral ba ste//gson pa'i mtha'
185a4('dul ba): ni 'chi ba yin//zhes bya ba yin pas/de shi zhing dus la bab nas sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par skyeso//de'i lhan cig gnas pa dgra bcom pa zhig gis bdag
185a5('dul ba): gi mkhan po gang du skyes shes sems pa la zhugs nas/des lha rnams kyi nang du rnam par blta bar brtsams no/ma mthong zhing /mi dang dud 'gro dang /yi dgas
185a6('dul ba): rnams kyi nang du rnam par bltas na der yang ma mthong //sems can dmyal ba'i nang du rnam par blta bar brtsams na/sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par skyes
185a7('dul ba): par mthong nas/des bsams pa/mkhan po ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa/mang du thos pa/chos kyi 'khor sdud sdud pa yin no/des las ci zhig byas no//
185b1('dul ba): des sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par skyes snyam nas/des bsams pa na/pha gsad pa yin par mthong ngo //de mnar med pa'i 'od zer dag gis phog pa dang /smras
185b2('dul ba): pab/kye ma bsro khong 'di me re che zhes smras pa dang /sems can dmyal ba'i srung mas tho ba blangs te/mgor bsnun nas/skal chad khyod la bsro khang ga la yod/'di ltar 'di
185b3('dul ba): ni sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med pa yin no zhes smras//de dge ba'i sems kyis dus byas nas/rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skyeso//lha'i bu dang lha'i bu mo'i
185b4('dul ba): chos nyid ni skyes nos ring po ma lon pa la sems gsum skye ste/gang nas shi 'phos pa dang /gang du skyes pa dang las gang gis skyes pa'o//des sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi
185b5('dul ba): nang nas shi 'phos pa dang /rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams kyi nang du skyes pa dang /dge 'dun la bsro khang gi khrus byas pas skyes po mthong //de nas sngon sems can dmyal ba lha'i
185b6('dul ba): bu de 'di snyam du sems te/gang gi phyir bdag zhag lon par gnas te/bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang /bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir nye bar 'gro ba ni bdag gis tshul dang 'thun
185b7('dul ba): pa ma yin gyis/bdag zhag lon par ma gnas pa kho nar/bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang /bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'gro'o snyam mo//de nas sngon sems can dmyal ba
186a1('dul ba): lha'i bu rna ma ga dub 'khor gas zhing /drim med pa thogs te/rdo shAl dang /sa ma dos brgyan pa'i lus kyis/lha'i ud pa la dang /pad+ma dang /su
186a2('dul ba): sud dang /bad+ma dkar po dag gis thu bu bkang ste/kha dog shin tu 'das bsdu mtshan ma la bab pa dang /bcom ldan 'das gal ba der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan
186a3('dul ba): 'das la me tog gis mngon par gtor te/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/mtha' gcig tu 'dug pa dang /'di ltar sngon sems
186a4('dul ba): ban+na dmyal bsti'i du ba dag gi mnas rgyal byed kyim la thams cad snang ba rgya chen ngos khyab por gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sprin sems can dmyal ba
186a5('dul ba): lha'i bu'i bsams pa dang /bag la~M l-i dang /khams dang /ring bzhin thug su chud nas/gang thos nas sngon sems can dmyal ba lha'i bus stan de nyid lnga 'dug
186a6('dul ba): bzhin du/'jigs tshogs la lta ba ri'i rtsemo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas pa de ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa
186a7('dul ba): bzhi yang dag par so sor rtogs par byed pa'i chos bstan pa mdzod//des bden pa mthong nas/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la gang mdzad pa 'di lta bu ni/
186b1('dul ba): bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/mas kyang ma bgyis/rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/sngon gyi pha mes dag gis kyang ma bgyis/dge sbyong dang dam
186b2('dul ba): ze dag gis kyang ma bgyis/byams pa dang mdza' bshes dang /rtsa lag gi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis te/khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni skams/rus pa'i ri dag ni baMsgral/
186b3('dul ba): ngan song gi sgo dag ni bkum/mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo dag ni phye/sems can dmyal ba dang /dud 'gro dang /yi dgas dag nas ni rkang pa phyung /lha dang mi rnams kyi ning
186b4('dul ba): du bzhago zhes lan gsum ched du brjod pa che du brjod do//yang smras pa/khyod mthus rab drag nyes pa mang ldan pa'i//ngan song shul bkag bsod nams rab ldan pa'i//mtho
186b5('dul ba): ris 'gro ba phye zhing bdag gis ni//mya ngan 'das pa'i shul yang thob par 'gyur//shin tu rnam dag khyod brten bdag gis ni//de ring skyon bral dag pa'i mig thob cing //go
186b6('dul ba): 'phang zhi ba 'phags pa dgyes thob ste//sdug bsngal rgya mtsho'i pha rol rgal bar gyur//'gro ba lha min mi dang lhas mchod pa//skye dang rga dang ni 'chi bral ba po//srid pa stong du
186b7('dul ba): mthong bar rab dkon pa//thub pa de ring khyod mthong 'bras bu mchis//de nas gdung byas do shal rab 'phyang bas//zhabs la phyog 'tshal rangs pa skyes gyur nas//dgra thul
187a1('dul ba): g.yas nas yongasu bskor byas te//lha'i 'jig rten mngon phyogs mkha' la song //de nas sngon sems can dmyal ba lha'i bu tshong pa khe phogs rnyed pa lta bu dang /
187a2('dul ba): zhing ba lo tog 'byor pa lta bu dang /dpa' bo g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba lta bu dang /nad pa nad thams cad las yong su thar pa lta bur gyur te/cha lugs gang gis bcom ldan
187a3('dul ba): 'das kyi spyan sngar 'ongs pa'i cha lugs de nyid kyis rang gi gnasu song ngo //de'i lhan cig gnas pa dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan dgra bcom pa zas kyi gral du 'dug ste/de'i lhan cig
187a4('dul ba): gnas po gzhan zhig dge 'dun la chu 'drim par byed//ji tsam na dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan des mkhar phor du blugs te/sor mo'i rtse mos reg na/shin tu dgra nas des bsams
187a5('dul ba): pa/bdag cag ni chu shin tu drang mo 'di lta bu 'thung na/mkhan pa ni sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med pa na zangs khu bskol ba 'thung snyam nas/des sems can dmyal ba
187a6('dul ba): chen po mnar med par rnam par blta bar brtsoms na mi sna ngo //dud 'gro dang /yi dogs dang /mi dang sems can dmyal ba gzhan rnamasu yang rnam par bltas na/de rnams na
187a7('dul ba): yang mi snang nas lha rnams kyi nang du rnam par blta bar brtsams na/rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skyes te/ltar gyur pas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bden pa
187b1('dul ba): mthong bar byas te/lha rnams kyi nang na 'dug par mthong nas/'dzul pa sngon du btang ste/bcom ldan 'das la dad pa thob nas/kye ma sangs rgyas/kye mchos/kye ma dge 'dun//
187b2('dul ba): kye ma chos kyi legs par gsungs pa nyid/'di ltar sdig pa byed pa log par ltung song ba/de lta bu dag gis kyang yon tan gyi tshogs 'di lta bu thob bo zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod//
187b3('dul ba): mkhan po gcig pa des de rangs shing mgu ba dang /mchog tu dga' bar mthong nas smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa khyod mkhan po dus la bab pas bdag ni dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan du
187b4('dul ba): gyur to snyam nas/rangs shing mgu ba dang mchog tu dga' bar gyur tam/des smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa re shig khyod kyi dri ba'i lan gdab pa'i dus ma yin gyis/dge 'dun
187b5('dul ba): gyi nang du dris shig dang /der khyod kyi dri ba'i lan gdab pa'i dus la bab par 'gyur ro//ji tsam du gzhan zhig na dge slong gi dge 'dun tshogs shing 'khod pa na/dge 'dun
187b6('dul ba): gyi gnas brtan gyis mkhan po gcig pa de la dris pa/tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyis de'i tshe ci smras/des smras pa/khyod la kho bos khyod mkhan po dus la bab pas/bdag dge
187b7('dul ba): 'dun gyi gnas brtan du gyur to snyam nas/tshangs shing mgu ba dang mchog tu dga' bar gyur tam zhes smraso//des skabs de doge 'dun gyi nang du de la rgya cher brjod pa dang /
188a1('dul ba): da yang yi rangs shing dge 'dun rnams kyang kye ma sangs rgyas/kye mchos/kye ma dge 'dun/kye mchos kyis lags par gsungs pa nyid/'di ltar sdig
188a2('dul ba): pabyed pa/log par ltung bar song ba de lta bu dag gis kyang yon tan gyi tshogs de lta bu tho'o zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod//
188a3('dul ba): sdom la/dgra bcom gi sad dang dge 'dun dbyen//ngan sems kyis ni khrag byung dang //pham par 'gyur ba bzhi pa dang //gnas nas dbyung ba gsum yin//sangs
188a4('dul ba): rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhug so//gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis ltang brang gi tshal gseb tu ma ga d+ha'i
188a5('dul ba): rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po lo lha brgyad khri dang /ma gau d+hA'i bram ze dang khyim bdag 'bum phrag du ma dag dang lhan cig bden pa dag la bkod pa na/des rang gi
188a6('dul ba): yul du dril po skyugs pa byengad du bcug ste/de'i yul du sus kyang chom rkun mi bya'o//gang zhig byed pa ni ngas de yul med par bya zhing /sbyin pa ni nga nyid kyi mdzod dang ba ba
188a7('dul ba): nas sbyin par bya'o zhes bsgo'o//gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis ko se'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gzhon nu'i dpa'i mdo sde brdu lo ba de'i tshe na/des kyang dril bsgrags pa byed
188b1('dul ba): du bcug ste/nga'i yul du sus kyang chom rkun mi bya'o//gang zhig byed na de gsad pa'i gyod la basbyin cing skyen pa ni nga nyid kyi mdzod dang bang ba nas sbyin par bya'o zhes bsgo ba dang /da
188b2('dul ba): nas yul ma ga d+hA'i chom rkun pa dag gang yin pa dang /yul ko sa la'i chom rkun pa dag gang yin pa de dag sa 'tshams kyi bar du dong ste 'khod nas yul mo ga d+hA nas don 'thun 'ong ba
188b3('dul ba): gang yin pa de yang 'joms par byed//yul ko sa la nas don 'thun 'ong ba gang yin pa de yang 'joms par byedado//ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na don 'thun pa sel ba dang bcas
188b4('dul ba): pa yul ma ga d+hA nAs yul ko sa lor 'phags pa dang /gang gi tshes 'tshams kyi bar du phyin pa de'i tshe ded dpon des smras pa/shes ldan dag rgyal po gsal rgyal de ni gdug pa
188b5('dul ba): pha rol gnon pa yin pas bdag cag la sbyin du sbyin du 'jug nus pa yin na/bdag cag gis ci'i phyir bsel ba la gla sbyin par dbyen par bya/'di dag 'di nyid nas phyir bzlog
188b6('dul ba): go zhes de dag phyir bzlog ste/don 'thun de tsho gos nyung ngur chas pa dang /chom rkun pa de dag gis kyang bya ma btsugs to bsdad pa dang /des de mthong nas shes ldan don 'thun
188b7('dul ba): tshogs nyu dus 'ongs/ci'i phyir btang snyomasu 'khod ces smras pa dang /de nas chom rkun pa de dag gos der tsheng pa kha cig ni srog dang phra lo//kha cig ni zong bor te bros//
189a1('dul ba): dgra bcom pa dag ni ma bsams par shes pa dang mthong ba mi 'jug pas/dgra bcom pa don 'thun pa de dang 'gro ba zhig kyang srog dang phralo//de na don
189a2('dul ba): 'thun gang dag bros pa de dag mgo dang lus rdul gyis yogs te/klad pa'i skra yogs nas/ku co 'don cing ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi drung du phyin nas/thal mo
189a3('dul ba): sbyar te smras pa/lha khyud kyi yul du bdag cag tshong par mi rung bar rnam par gzhag/ci zhig byas/bdag cag tshom rkun pa dag gis bcom//phyogs gang du che ge
189a4('dul ba): me zhig tu'o//rgyal pos dmag dpon 'phags skyes po la bsgo ba/kun rdzas dang chom rkun po dag myur du khug shig/des dpung gi tshogs yan log bzhi pa bskon
189a5('dul ba): nas phyir byung ba dang /chom rkun pa de dag kyang go tsho phud nas brag yang su sa la'i dgon pa zhig na kun rdzas bgod cing 'khod pa las/dmag dpon 'phags skyes pos
189a6('dul ba): de dag phyogs bzhir bskor nas/dbus su dung dang rnga pa Ta ha'i sgra dag gis skrag par byas pa dang /de rnams las kha cig ni kun rdzas bor te bros//kha cig ni
189a7('dul ba): gas do//drug cu ni gson por gzung ste/des kun rdzas de yang khyer nas rgyal po'i drung du song ste smras pa/lha chom rkun pa de dag ni 'di dag lagaso//kun rdzas
189b1('dul ba): ni 'di dag lagaso//de nas rgyal pos de rnams la smras pa/shes ldan dag khyod kyis rgyal pos dril bsgrags pa byed du bcug ste/nga'i yul du sus kyang chom rkun mi bya'o//gang zhig
189b2('dul ba): byed na de gsad pa'i gyod la bskon cing sbyin pa ni nga nyid kyi mdzod dang bang ba nas sbyin no zhes ma thos sam/de dag gis smras pa/lha thoso//'o na ci'i phyir tshong pa dag bcom/lha 'a
189b3('dul ba): ngo ma mchiso//ci'i phyir srog dang bral/'jigs pa nye bar bstan pa'i slad du'o//khyod kyis 'jigs pa de 'dra ba nye bar bstan tam/nga sngon sum kyang ma mthong ba gang yin pa'i
189b4('dul ba): 'jigs pa de 'dra ba nye bar bstan par bya'o//de nas rgyal pos blon po rnams la bsgo ba/shes ldan dag de nga la 'di dag thams cad gsod cig/de dag gis lam po che dang srang dang
189b5('dul ba): lam gyi bzhi mdo dang sum mdo rnamasu rje su sgrogs shing gsad par khrid pa na/chom rkun pa zhig lam log par bros te rgyal byed kyi tshal du dge slong gi gan du song ste smras pa/'phags
189b6('dul ba): pa bdag rab tu 'byung bar 'tshalo//des rab tu phyung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs par byaso//chom rkun pa de dag kyang gas //bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag rang gi rgud pa dang /
189b7('dul ba): gzhan gyi rgud pa dang /rang gi 'byor pa dang /gzhan gyi 'byor pa la yang dang yang du so sor rtogs shing //de ci'i phyir zhe na/dge slong dag rang gi rgud pa dang /gzhan gyi rgu dpa
190a1('dul ba): ni kun tu skyo bar 'gyur ba'i gnas yin la rang gi 'byor pa dang /gzhan gyi 'byor ba yang kun tu skyo bar 'gyur ba'i gnas yin pa'i phyir ro//zhes gsungs
190a2('dul ba): pas/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig ni dge slong rnams dur khrod rgyur 'dong ba na/dge slong de yang de rnams dang lhan cig tu dur khrod rgyur song ba las/des chom rkun pa de dag gsad pa
190a3('dul ba): mthong nas/mchims brnangs te 'dug par gyur pa dang /dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa dag gsar bu rab tu byung ba yin yang bsams pa 'di 'dra bar bzang //
190a4('dul ba): des skad phyung ste du bar brtsams pa dang /dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa khyod ci'i phyir tshe ngas 'debs/des smras pa/'di ni bdag gi pa'o//'di ni bdag cag
190a5('dul ba): gis phu nu'o//'di ni bdag cag gi khu ba'o//'di ni zhang po'i de rnams kyis smras pa/'di rnams kyis dgra bcom pa srog dang bral na/khyod kyis kyang dgra bcom pa/srog
190a6('dul ba): dang phral lam/des smras pa/phralo zhes zer ba'i skabs de/bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong
190a7('dul ba): dag gang zag 'di ni dgra bcom pa gsad pa yin te/gang zag dgra bcom pa gsad pa ni chos 'dul ba 'di la mi skye ba'i chos can yin pas/dge slong dag khyed kyis ga
190b1('dul ba): zug dgra bcom pa gas dpa/chos 'dul ba 'di las bskyil bar bya'o//'ga' zhig gi gan du rab tu 'byung bar 'dod pa 'ongs na/des de la dgra bcom pa gsad pa ma yin nam zhes
190b2('dul ba): dri bar bya'o//ma dris par rab tu 'byin par byed/bsnyen par rdzogs par byed na 'gas tshangs can du 'gyur//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus
190b3('dul ba): ba/btsun pa gang gis sngon rab tu phyung ba ni/de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun pa ba gal te legs par gsungs pa'i ches 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang /bsnyen
190b4('dul ba): par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngas pa'i tshil na/rab tu 'byung bar bgyi 'am/rab tu 'byung bar mi bah+ni/nye bar 'khor rab tu dbyung bar mi bya'o//de lta bas na 'ga' zhig
190b5('dul ba): gan du rab tu 'byung bar 'dod pa 'ongs na/des na de la dge 'dun gyi dbyen byas pa ma yin nam zhes dri bar bya'o//ma dris par rab tu 'byin par byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyuraro//
190b6('dul ba): ngas rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa lte bar 'khor gyis zhus blo/btsun pa gang gis de bzhin go shegs pa la ngan sems kyis khrag gyur gal te legs par ga
190b7('dul ba): pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang /bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'tshal na/rab tu byung bar bgyi 'am/rab tu dbyung bar me gyi/nye bar la
191a1('dul ba): rab tu dbyung bar mi bya'o//de lta bas na 'ga' zhig gi gan du rab tu 'byung bar 'dod pa 'ongs na/des de la de bzhin gshegs pa la ngan sems kyis khrag phyung ba
191a2('dul ba): ma yin nam zhes dri bar bya'o//ma dris par rab tu 'byin par byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyuraro//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa
191a3('dul ba): btsun pa sngon gang rab tu 'byung ba na pham par gyur pa bzhi las ltung ba gang yang rung ba byung ba de/gal te legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung dang /bsnyen
191a4('dul ba): par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'tshal na/rab tu dbyung bar bgyi 'am/rab tu dbyung bar mi bgyi/nye bar 'khor rab tu dbyung bar mi bya'o da lta bas na 'ga' zhig gi
191a5('dul ba): gan du rab tu 'byung bar 'dod pa 'ongs na/des de la pham par 'gyur ba bzhi las ltung ba gang yang rung ba byung ba ma yin nam zhes dri bar bya'o//ma dris par rab tu 'byin par
191a6('dul ba): byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra bran bzhugs//de nas bcom
191a7('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag gal te gang zag ma mthong bas gnas nas phyung ba bebs pa zhig yang phyir 'ongs nas/tshe dang ldan pa
191b1('dul ba): dag ltung ba mthong gis bdag rab tu dbyung bar gsol zhes zer na rab tu dbyung ba bya'o//rab tu phyung nas tshe dang ldan pa dag ltung ba bshags par byas/bdag bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad/
191b2('dul ba): du gsol/zhes zer na bsten par rdzogs par bya'o//ji ste bsnyen par rdzogaso nas ltung ba ma mthong ngo zhes zer na/gal te dge 'dun tshogs pa yod na yang ma mthong bas gnas nas
191b3('dul ba): dbyung bar bya'o//gal te tshogs pa med la ji ste bsnyen par rdzogs na legs par bsnyen par rdzogs pa yin te/'di ltar gang zag gis legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la
191b4('dul ba): rab tu 'byung ba dang /bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po rnyed par dka' ba yin pa'i phyiraro//ma mthong bas gnas nas phyung ba ji lta ba bzhin du phyir mi 'chos pas gnas
191b5('dul ba): nas phyung ba dang /sdig pa can gyi lte ba'i rnam da mi gtong bas gnas nas phyung ba yang de bzhin no//sdom la/lag rdum dag dang rkang rdum dang //log sor zlum por 'jas pa
191b6('dul ba): dang //mchu med lus la rma mtshan can//rgan ches pa dang gzhon ches dang //theng po smad 'tshal zhar ba dang //lag sor rdum rgur mi'u thung dang //lba ba lkug pa 'on pa dang //
191b7('dul ba): rten 'phye dang na rkang bam dang //bud med kyis dub khur gyis dub//mi gang lam gyis dub rnams dang //ya za ma lug ta gam dang //de lta bu yi mi rnams ni//drang srong chen
192a1('dul ba): bos dgag pa mdzad//mdzes pa rab tu dbyung ba dang //yongs su dag pa bsnyen rdzogs par//rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis rang mkhyen te//bden pa'i mtshan
192a2('dul ba): gyis bka' stsal to//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan med na/rgyal byed kyi rgyal goni ri nas sbyin gyis ni dga' ban bzhugs//phyog sde dag gi kun tu spyod
192a3('dul ba): nu/gang rab tu byung ba dang /bsnyen par rdzogs par byas pa des ji srid du 'di dag ni gnas ngan len kun tu spyad pa dag yin no zhes bya bar mi shes pa de srid du de dag dang lhan
192a4('dul ba): cig gnas par byed la/gang gi tshe shes par gyur po de'i tshe dge slong rang bzhin du gnas pa dang /ston cig gnas par byed/ston pa'i bka' lung gis dus gsum
192a5('dul ba): 'gro ba'i phyir blta ba 'ba' zhig byed//de nas de dag gis glos bya bar brtsams pa/dga' bo nye dga' lhung bzed nag po can 'di dag ni bcas 'phros ma dang 'dra ste/bdag
192a6('dul ba): cag gis rab tu phyung ba rnams 'di dag gis 'phrog par byed kyis/dra ni lhung bzed nag po can rnams kyis dbrog par mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa de 'dra ba rab tu dbyung bar bya'o zhes
192a7('dul ba): gros byas//ji tsam du gzhan zhig na nye dga' kun tu 'khyam pas mi log rdum zhag mthong nas smras pa/bzhin bzang ci'i phyir rab tu mi 'byung /des smras pa/'phags
192b1('dul ba): pabadag lag pa ma tshang ba su zhig gis rab tu 'byin par bgyid/nye dgas smras pa/bzhin bzang bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa thugs rjes rab tu phye ba yin gyis/kho bos
192b2('dul ba): khyod rab tu dbyung bar bya'o//zhes des de rab tu phyung bsnyen par rdzogs par byas so//de nas zhag gnyis sam gsum zhig kun tu spyod pa'i chos rnams bslabs nas smras pa/bzhin
192b3('dul ba): bzang ri dgas kyis ri dgas mi sos mnyan yod rgya che la rang gi spyod yul dang /yab kyi spyod yul yin pas bsod snyoms rgyas la 'tsho bar gyis shig/des smras pa/mkhan po
192b4('dul ba): ji ltar bsod snyoms rgyu bar bgyi/des smras pa/khyod kyis de tsam mi shes sam/ngas khyod la bstan par bya'o zhes/des de'i sham thabs ni srid bus bcings/chos gos ni
192b5('dul ba): tshe mas gtur te bskon/dpung pa g.yon par ni lhung bzed kyi snod bzhag/dpung pa g.yas par ni khar bsol btagaso//de nas de mnyan yod na spyod yul du zhugs pa dang /
192b6('dul ba): bud med kyis brang brdungs nas smras pa/'phags pa sus khyod rab tu byung ba'i lag pa gnyis bcad/des smras pa/sring mo khyim pa nas kho bo'i log pa chad pa de rab tu phyung nas
192b7('dul ba): chad pa ma yin no//sus rab tu phyung /des smras pa/mkhan pa nye dgas so//de rnams kyis smras pa/gnas ngan len kun tu spyod pa de ma gtogs par gzhan su zhig
193a1('dul ba): 'di lta bu rab tu 'byin par byed ces zer ba'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/nyes dmigs gang
193a2('dul ba): cung zad ci byung ba de ni/dge slong dag lag rdum rab tu 'byin pa las gyur pa yin snyam nas bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag de lta bas na/dge slong gis lag rdum rab tu dbyung bar
193a3('dul ba): mi bya/bsnyen par rdzogs par mi bya'o//rab tu 'byin par byed/bsnyen par rdzogs par byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro//lag rdum ji lta ba de bzhin du/rkang rdum
193a4('dul ba): dang lag sor zlum por 'jas pa dang /mchu med pa dang /lus la rma mtshan can dang /rgan ches pa de dag de bzhin no//dge slong dag gzhon ches pa dang /rab tu 'byin par
193a5('dul ba): byed nas de dag gis dge 'dun gyi gnas mal bshang gcis mi rung bar byed nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/de dag kyang rab tu dbyung bar mi bya'o//theng
193a6('dul ba): pr-i dag rab tu 'byin par byed nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/de dag kyang rab tu dbyung bar mi bya'o//smad 'tshal dang /zhar ba dang /lag sor rdumo po dang /
193a7('dul ba): rgur ba dang /me'u zung dang /lba ba can dang /lkug pa dang /'on pa dang /rten 'phye dang /rkang pam dag rab tu 'byin par byed nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
193b1('dul ba): sprul pa/de lta bu dag kyang rab tu dbyung bar mi bya'o//rab tu 'byin par byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur//dge slong dag bud med kyis dub pa dang /khur gyis dub pa dang /lam
193b2('dul ba): gyis dub pa dang /ya za ma lug dang /tA gom pa dag rab tu 'byin por byed nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/de lta bu dag kyang rab tu dbyung bar m-i bya'o//rab tu
193b3('dul ba): 'byin par byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur//bsdu bar bya ba'i slob so//rab tu dbyung ba'i gzhi rdzog so///gso sbyong gi gzhi'i smyo sdom la/mu
193b4('dul ba): stogs can dang ka pi na//gnas dang rgyal po sbyar ba mdo//sdom la mu stegs can dang gsol ba dang //gnad pa dang ni 'dug pa dang //bob col spong dang zhal ta dang //
193b5('dul ba): byad dang dge slong gnas rnams//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal ka lan da ka'i gnas na bzhug so//de'i tshe na rgyal po'i khab kyi dge bsnyen rab tu
193b6('dul ba): myong po dag nang par nang par zhing bcom ldan 'das la lta ba dang /bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'gro bar btsun par gyur to//de nas rgyal po'i khab kyi dge bsnyen rab tu mang po dag
193b7('dul ba): 'di snyam du sems te/da ltar bcom ldan 'das kyang nang du yang dag 'jog por mdzod la/dge slong yid du 'thad pa rnams kyang nang du yang dge 'jog par byed pas
194a1('dul ba): bdag cag re shig bcom ldan 'das la lta ba dang /bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'dong bsdus kyis/bdag cag gzhan mu stegs can kun tu rgyu dag gi kun dga'
194a2('dul ba): ra ba ga lnga ba der dong ngo snyam//de nas rgyal po'i khab kyi dge bsnyen rab tu mang po dag gzhan mu stegs can kun tu rgyu dag gis/kun dga' ra ba ga la ba der dang ste/phyin nas
194a3('dul ba): gzhan mu stegs can kun tu rgyu dag dang /lhan cig mngon du yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba dang /yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba'i gtam sna tshogs byas te/mtha'
194a4('dul ba): gcig tu 'khod do//de nas mu stegs can zhig gis mu stegs can dag la 'di skad ces smraso//shes ldan dag bdag cag 'ba' shig la 'dug pa dang bya ba dang /gso
194a5('dul ba): sbyong yod dam/'on te shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong dag la yang yod/de nas mu stegs can zhig gis mu stegs can dag la 'di skad ces smraso//shes ldan dag bdag cag
194a6('dul ba): 'ol shig la 'dug pa dang bya ba dang /gso sbyong yod kyi shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong dag la ni medo//de nas rgyal po'i khab kyi dge bsnyen rab tu mang po dag gzhan mu stegs can
194a7('dul ba): kun tu rgyu dag gis smras pa la mngon par bstod par yang mi byed/phyir zlog par yang mi byed cing /mngon par bstod par yang ma byas/phyir zlog par yang ma byas
194b1('dul ba): par stan drug las langs nas/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/mtha' gcig tu 'khod do///
194b2('dul ba): mtha' gcig tu 'khod nas/rgyal po'i khab kyi dge bsnyen rab tu mang po dag gis gzhan mu stegs can kun tu rgyu dag dang lhan cig par skabasu gtam ci brjod pa de thams cad bcom
194b3('dul ba): ldan 'das la rgyas par gsol nas/'di skad ces kyang gsol to//kye ma bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse ba'i slad du bdag cag gi la yang mchis pa dang /bgyi ba dang /
194b4('dul ba): gso sbyong bca' bar gsol/bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po'i khab kyi dge bsnyen rab tu mang po dag la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo //de nas rgyal po'i khab kyi dge bsnyen rab tu
194b5('dul ba): mang po dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bar gnang ba rigs nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la mngon par bstod pa dang rje su yi rang bar byas nas/bcom
194b6('dul ba): ldan 'das kyi spyan mnga' nas dong ngo //de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/de lta bas na dge slong rnams kyis deng phyin chad 'dug pa dang bya ba dang /gso
194b7('dul ba): sbyong la ton bya bar rje su gnang ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams kyis deng phyin chad 'dug pa dang bya ba dang /gso sbyong la ton bye bar rje su gnango zhes bka' stsal nas/
195a1('dul ba): de dag gis 'dug pa ji lta bu yin pa dang /bya ba ji lta bu yin pa dang /gso sbyong ji lta bu yin pa mi shes pa'i skabs de/bcom ldan 'das la dge
195a2('dul ba): slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag khyed chu ro shog/'dug pa ni rnal 'byor te/lus 'di nyid rkang pa'i mthil
195a3('dul ba): yan chad klad pa'i skra man chad la pags pa la thug gi bar du ji ltar gnas pa dang /ji ltar byas pa bzhin du mi gtsang ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gang ste/lus 'di la skra
195a4('dul ba): dang /kha spu dang /sen mo dang /so dang /rdul dang /dri ma dang /pags pa dang /sha dang /rus pa dang /rgyus pa dang /rtse dang /mkhal ma

195a7('dul ba): rgyas dang /gcin dag kyang yod do snyam du so sor rtogs shig/bcom ldan 'das kyis rnal 'byor bsgom par bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas/dge slong dag spyod yul du
195b1('dul ba): zhugs na yang rnal 'byor bsgom par byed pa dang /de dag glang po che 'khrul pa dang /rta 'khrul pa dang /rkang rtad pa 'khrul pa dang /lhan cig drad nas 'gyel pa dang /buH/
195b2('dul ba): par gyur nas/ma dong pha rnams 'phags pa dag mi mthong ngam/ci zhes co 'dri bar byed pa dang /de dag rnal 'byor bsgomo zhes zer ba'i skabs de/bcom ldan 'das la dge slong
195b3('dul ba): rnams kyis gsol ba dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/spyod yul du zhugs pas/rnal 'byor bsgom par mi bya'o//de dag bsgo khang du rnal 'byor bsgom par
195b4('dul ba): byed pa na yur nas/ma dad pa rnams 'phags pa dag ci khyod 'du bar nyal ba'i brtul zhugs can yin nam zhes co 'dri bar byed pa'i skabs/bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams
195b5('dul ba): kyis gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/sgo khang du rnal 'byor bsgom par mi bya'o//de dag kham su sgom par byed pa na nyes dmigs de nyid du gyur nas/
195b6('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kham su rnal 'byor bsgom par mi bya'o//dri dag gnas khang du sgom par byed na/bsam gtan dag gi tsher ma ni sgra yin paso/sems
195b7('dul ba): rtse gcig pa nyid kyang mi thob pa'i skabs de/bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/gnas khang du rnal 'byor
196a1('dul ba): bsgom par mi bya'o//de dag dgon par dong ste/sgom par byed pa na/chom rkun pa rnams dang /g.yon can rnams dang /seng ge rnams dang /stag/
196a2('dul ba): rnams dang /gung rnams dang /gzig rnams kyi bgrod par gyur pa'i skabs de/bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis
196a3('dul ba): bka' stsal pa dang /dgon par rnal 'byor bsgom par mi bya'o//de dag glong dang nye bar lhags nas sgom par byed pa na/ma dad pa rnams 'phags pa dag ci khyed cag 'ga'
196a4('dul ba): shi ba dang ldan par ma gyur tam/zhes ci 'dri bar byed pa'i skabs de/bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
196a5('dul ba): phyogs der yal ga dag gam/seg dag gam/re lde dag gis bskor bar bya'o//de dag gis phyogs de yal ga dag gam/seg dag gam/re lde dag gis
196a6('dul ba): bskor ba dang /ma dad pa rnams 'phags pa dag ci 'di rgyal mo ga gon gyis ro ba 'am/la pug gau ra ba 'am/zhes co 'dri bar byed pa'i skabs de/bcom ldan 'das
196a7('dul ba): la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/phyogs de rtsigs pa dag gam/'obs dag gis bskor bar bya'o//de dag gis
196b1('dul ba): phyogs de rtsigs pa dag gam/'obs dag gis bskor ba dang /ma dad pa rnams 'phags pa dag ci 'di ma du lung ga'i ra ba 'am/'on te bal po sa Sh+Ta ra ba yin/de rnams kyis
196b2('dul ba): smyos pa/rnal 'byor bsgom pa'o zhes zer ba'i skabs de/bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/de lta bas na spong khang
196b3('dul ba): brtsig par gnang ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyis spong khang rtsig par bya'o//zhes bka' stsal nas/de dag gis spong khang rnams ji lta bu yin par mi shes pa'i skabs de/bcom
196b4('dul ba): ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal po/spyong khang ni gnyis te/chung ngu dang chen po'o//chung ngu ni gnas khang gnyis kyi
196b5('dul ba): bar du srang gtod pa'o//chen po ni gnas khang bcu 'am/bcu gnyis kyi bar du srung gtod pa'o//dge slong dag gis gnas khang byas nas sbyang byed pa bzhin du sgro 'dod par mi
196b6('dul ba): byed nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/sgra 'dod par bya'o//dge slong dag sgo glegs mi 'jud nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bko' stsol pa/sgo glags gzhug
196b7('dul ba): por bya'o//dbye dka' nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal po/lag zungs gdags par bya'o//yang mig sgra 'khrol nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
197a1('dul ba): 'og tu kau ba'i dum bu gzhug par bya'o//gcad dka' nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/gnam gzer dang /'khor gtan bzhugs par

197a3('dul ba): stag dang /gung rnams kyis bgrod par gyur nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsol pa/mthon por gtod pa na snang ba mi gsal nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis
197a4('dul ba): bka' stsal pa/mthon por gdod par mi bye bar sum gnyis dor bar bya zhing /sum gnyis bor ba nas sum char gdod par bya'o//de dag gong gi sum gnyis bor
197a5('dul ba): te/'og gi sum char 'don nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'og tu sum cha bor bar gdod par bya'o//dge slong dag phyi yangs shing nang rub par byed
197a6('dul ba): nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/skar khung rgya mtsho'i rnam pa lta bu gdod par bya ste/phyi rub la nong yangs par bya'o//khra dang mchil ba dang /phu ron
197a7('dul ba): dag 'jug nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/skar khung dra ba tsan du bya'o//sbrang bu d+he ma shu ka dang /tre lo ta dag 'jug nas/bcom ldan 'das
197b1('dul ba): kyis bka' stsal pa/sgo grogs gzhugs par bya'o//rlung gis 'byed nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/phred gtan gzhug par bya'o//gcad dka' nas/
197b2('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa gnam gzer dang /'khor gtan gzhug par bya'o//dbye dka' nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dbyug gu skam
197b3('dul ba): kha byas te/phred gtan dang /gnam gzer dang /'khor gtan dag gis ni gcad par bya'o//dbyu gu skam kha ni dbye bar bya'o//der stan dgos par gyur nas/
197b4('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/sa'i steg bu dag bya'o//'khrad par gyur nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal po/khri'u bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis
197b5('dul ba): khri'u bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas/de dag gis khe'u ci 'dra ba mi shes nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kho ra khor yug tu khru bzhis 'khor ba'i khri'u bya
197b6('dul ba): zhing /de thags mas bla bar bya'o//de dag gi thags ma du yod mi shes na/bcom ldan 'das kyis dka' stsal pa/thags ma ni lnga ste/mun dza'i dang /shra na'i
197b7('dul ba): dang /gras ma'i dang /ras mo'i dang /spa phra me'i'o//de dag 'khrang bar gyur nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/stan nang tshangs can dag gding bar
198a1('dul ba): bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis stan nang tshangs can dag gding bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas/de dag gi stan nang tshangs can ci 'dra ba mi shes nas/
198a2('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/srid du khru bzhi pa zheng du khru do yod pa nyis ltab tu byas te/drub par bya'o//de'i nang du shing bal gyis dgrang bar bya'o//
198a3('dul ba): de dag gis shing bal du yod mo shes nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shong bal dag ni lnga ste/a rka'i shing bal dang /ka sha'i shing bal dang /
198a4('dul ba): er kha'i shing bal dang /smra ba'i shing ngal dang /shul ma le'i shing bal yin no//gzhan yang lnga ste/ngal dang /sha na'i shing bal dang /ras bal dang /
198a5('dul ba): ras ma dang /lo ma'i tshogs dag gis bkang ba dag yin//shing bal thams cad phyogs gcig tu 'chugs nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/mdo mdor
198a6('dul ba): srubs bya rog rkang gi gzungs gdab par bya'o//'khod pa na yur nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/gdos bu gdags par bya'o//ji ltar gdags mi shes
198a7('dul ba): nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/skud pas btags te rna ba la gdags par bya'o//'on kyang yur nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dbyu gus
198b1('dul ba): gzugs par bya'o//dge slong dag dbyugu smyu gu'i bcad 'phro lta bus 'dzugs pa na/rma byung nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/bre'i bcad 'phro lta bur bya'o//'on
198b2('dul ba): kyang snang nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ras ma dag gis dkris nas dal bus khad kyis khad kyis gzugs par bya'o//'on kyang yur nas/bcom ldan 'das
198b3('dul ba): kyis bka' stsal pa/pho long 'phang bar bya'o//dge slong dag gis mun khung du 'phangs pa na/des 'khyam nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/tha gus btags te 'phang
198b4('dul ba): bar bya zhing /de nas yang phyir drang bar byo'o//'on kyang yur nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/mdun du mar me gzhag par bya'o//'on kyang yur nas/bcom
198b5('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal po/rkang pa gcig brkyang bar bya'o//'on kyang yur nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rkang pa ya gtsog kyang brkyang bar bya'o//'on kyang
198b6('dul ba): yur nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/langs te bcag par bya'o//dge slong dag 'chags na 'thom nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'phreng thag la
198b7('dul ba): 'ju bar bya'o//lag pas chang rgyud byed nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/sbu bu bskon la skud pas btags pa la 'jus te/bcag par bya'o//mchil lham
199a1('dul ba): dang bcas pa 'chags par byed pa na sgra 'byung na/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/mchil lham gyis gcag par mi bya'o//rdul gyis rkang pa
199a2('dul ba): gnyis ma rungs nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/par thang gding bar bya'o//snabs par gyur nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong
199a3('dul ba): ngag ngas sbyong ba pa'i kun tu spyod pa'i chos dag bca' bar bya ste/dge slong spong ba pas zhig gsumi zhing gsum zhing rkang pa gnyis bsku bar bya'o//dge slong spong ba pas kun
199a4('dul ba): tu spyad pa'i chos ji ltar bcos pa dag yang dag par blangs te 'jug par mi byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyuraro//de dag der mi shong nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal

199a6('dul ba): bka' stsal pa/kha khyer gyis bskor bar bya'o//de 'khrul nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/lcags kyi gzer bu dag gis gdab par bya'o//'on kyang mi shong
199a7('dul ba): nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/phyi rol tu spong khang chen po bya'o//de dag sgo spyod dag tu byed pa na/de dag phan tshun snang nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis
199b1('dul ba): bka' sprul pa/sgo snol mar gdod par bya'o//skr-i khang bya'o//phug kyang bya'o//de dag don yur nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/skra rlung du snam bu'am/rus
199b2('dul ba): sbyangs te nyal bar bya zhing /'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o//de dag de nas song zhing yang byis 'ongs nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong spong ba'i zhal ta byed
199b3('dul ba): po bsko bar bya ste/dge slong spong ba'i zhal ta byed pa chos lnga dang ldan pa ni ma bskos po yang bsko bar mi bya la/bskos pa yang dbyung bar bya ste/lnga gang zhe na/'dun pas
199b4('dul ba): 'gro ba dang /zhe sdang gis 'gro ba dang /gauti mug gis 'gro ba dang /'jigs pas 'gro ba dang /spong ba la tron byas pa dang /ma byas pa mi shes pa ste/dge slong spong
199b5('dul ba): ba pa'i zhal ta byed pa/chos lnga po de dag dang ldan pa ni ma bskos pa yang bsko bar mi bya la bskos pa yang dbyung bar bya'o//dge slong spong ba'i zhal ta byed pa chos lnga dag dang
199b6('dul ba): ldan pa ni/mi bskos pa yang bsko bar bya la/bskos pa yang dbyung bar mi bya ste/lnga gang zhe na/bdun pos mi 'gro ba dang /zhe sdang gis mi 'gro ba dang /gti
199b7('dul ba): mug gis mi 'gro ba dang /'jigs pas mi 'gro ba dang /spong po la tron byis pa dang /ma byas pa shes pa ste/dge slong spong ba'i zhal ta byed pa/chos lnga po de
200a1('dul ba): dag dang ldan pa ni/ma bskos pa yang bsko bar bya la/bsgos pa yang dbyung bar mi bya'o//'di ltar bsko bar bya ste/je dang por spro bar bya ste/
200a2('dul ba): ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod dge 'dun gyi spong ba zhal ta byung par spro 'am zhes dri bar bya'o//gal te spron des spro zhes brjod par bya'o//de'i 'og tu des gnas mal bshom pa
200a3('dul ba): byas nas/gaN+DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag por bsgo ba nas dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing 'thun par gyur la/dge slong cig gis
200a4('dul ba): gau sol ba byas te las bya'o//dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi spong ba'o zhal ta bgyid par spro na/gal
200a5('dul ba): te dge 'dun thams cad kyi dus la bab cing bzod na/dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /dge 'dun gyi dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi spong ba'i
200a6('dul ba): zhal ta bgyid par bsko ste/dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi spong ba'i zhal ta bgyi do//'di ni gsol ba'o//las ni 'di ltar bya ste/dge 'dun btsun
200a7('dul ba): pa rnams gsan du gsol/dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi spong ba'i zhal ta bgyid par spro ste/de'i slad du dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di ni/dge
200b1('dul ba): 'dun gyi sbyong ba'i zhal te bgyid par bsko zhing /dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi spong ba'i zhal ta bgyid na/tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong ming 'di zhes
200b2('dul ba): dgyi ba 'di ni/dge 'dun gyi spong ba'i zhal ta bgyid par bsgo zhing /dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi spong ba'i zhal ta bgyid par bzod pa de dag ni cang
200b3('dul ba): ma gsung shig/gang dag mi bzed pa de dag ni gsungs shig/dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/dge 'dun gyi dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di/dge 'dun
200b4('dul ba): gyi spong ba'i zhal ta bgyid par bskos shing /dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di/dge 'dun gyi spong ba'i zhal ta bgyid de/'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin
200b5('dul ba): to//dge slong dag ngas dge slong spong ba'i zhal ta byed pa'i kun tu spyod pa'i chos rnams bca' bar bya ste/dge slong spong ba'i zhal ta byed pas/spong khang du chag chag gdab
200b6('dul ba): par bya'o//phyag dang bya'o//lci bu sar pa'i byug pas slu bar bya'o//stan bsham par bya'o//bshang bya'i sa dang /gtso bo'i sa byi dor bya'o//chag chag gdab
200b7('dul ba): par bya'o//phyag dar bya'o//lci ba sar pa'i byug pas bsku bar bya'o//lo mo'i chung bu gzhag par bya'o//khong rdog dang sa dang tshug zhag par bya'o//de dag re re'i
201a1('dul ba): gan du song ste/'bod par byed nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/re re nas bod par mi bya bar gaN+DI brdung bar bya'o//de gaN+DI rgyu tshor
201a2('dul ba): rdungs pa dang /rdzi tsam ni spyod yul gyi grong mi rnams tshim kun pa ma'ongs sam/zhe sdangs nas/de rnams go bsgos to/lhags nas/'phags pa dog ci chom
201a3('dul ba): rkun pa dag mchis sam/de rnams kyis smras pa/shes ldan dag chom rkun ma dag me lhags te/'di ltar spyong ba la tron byed do//de rnams kyis smras pa/'phags
201a4('dul ba): ba dag rnam par 'tshe ba la tron mdzad kyi/'di na spong ba ga la mchis zhes zer ba'i skabs de/bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis
201a5('dul ba): bka' stsal pa/gaN+DI rgya cher brdung bar mi bya ste/'di ltar gaN+DI ni lnga ste/dge 'dun bsdu ba'i gaN+DI ne/las kyi gaN+DI dang /shi ba'i gaN+DI dang /spong ba'i gr-id+d+hi dang /
201a6('dul ba): gnod pa byung ba'i gaN+DI'o//de la dge 'dun bsdu ba'i gaN+DI ni rgyud gsum dang /tog gsum pa'o//las kyi gaN+DI ni rgyud gcig dang /tog gsumo//shi bi gAr+t+ti ni byi
201a7('dul ba): ba'o//spong ba'i gaur+t+ti ni khar silo//gnod pa byung ba'i gaN+DI na rje tsam gyis chog pa'o//de dag dus gting la thig zin gyi pa pe byed nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bkor
201b1('dul ba): sprul pa/gting la thug pa na ci bder mi bya bar dus shes par byas nas/ci bder byas te/dge 'dun las tshal ma 'thob pa gang yin pa de dag kyang khungs byas nas dge 'dun
201b2('dul ba): gyi nang du 'du khom pa dang /bsod snyoms pa gang dag yin pa de dag kyang rkang lag gnyis bkrus nas/grong du bsod snyoms la 'jug khom par bya'o//de dag kho na bzhin du
201b3('dul ba): ci bder byed nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/de kho na bzhin du ci bdor mi bya bar/rgyud chags gsum pa gdon par bya'o//de dag ha cang mang du 'don par byed
201b4('dul ba): nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/he cang mang du gdon par mi bya'o//de dag hA cang nyu ngur 'don par byed nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ha tsong
201b5('dul ba): nyu dur gdon par mi bya ste/'di ltar ran par gdon par bya'o//de dag yon bshad par mi byed nas/bcomo ldan 'das kyis bka' sprul pa/yon bshad par bya'o//
201b6('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis yon bshad par bya'o zhes bka' stsalo nas/de dag gis sus yon po shad par bya ba mi shes nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge
201b7('dul ba): 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis yon bshad por bya'o//de dag yon bshad pa ha cang mang du byed nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/yon bshad pa ha cang mang du mi
202a1('dul ba): bya'o//de dag yon bshad pa ha cang nyung ngur byed nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/yon bshud pa ha cang nyung ngur mi bya ste/'dra
202a2('dul ba): lhur yon bshad pa ran par bya'o//dge slong spong ba'i zhal ta byed pa thams cad kyi 'jug tu 'dug cing /thams cad kyi mdun du 'gyes par byed nas/bcom ldan 'das
202a3('dul ba): kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong spong ba'i zhal ta byed pa thams cad kyi 'jug tu 'gyes par bya zhing /thams cad kyi mdun du 'du bar bya'o//gal te rkyen de lta bu byung nas/
202a4('dul ba): des phyogs dben par sde mig smras te/tshe dang ljon pa kho bos phyogs ga ge mo zhig tu sde mig sbas kyis phye la zhugs shig ces brjod par bya'o//dge slong spong nga'i zhal
202a5('dul ba): byed pas kun tu spyad pa'i chos ji lngar bcas pa yang dag par blangs te/mi 'jug na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur//de ni 'dug pa zhes bya'o////
202a6('dul ba): bya ba gang zhe na/dge 'dun gyi gsol pa dang /gsol ba dang gnyis dang /gsol ba dang bzhi'i las gang yin pa 'di ni bya ba zhes bya'o//gso sbyong gang zhe na/
202a7('dul ba): dge slong dag ngas so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gang yin pa ste/de khyed kyis dang phyin chad zla ba phyed phyed cing gdon par bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis zla ba phyed phyed cing
202b1('dul ba): so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon par bya'o//zhes bka' stsal nas/de dag gis sus gdon par bya ba mi shes nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge
202b2('dul ba): 'dun gyis gnas brtan gyis zla ba phyed phyed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don par bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis/zla ba phyed phyed cing so sor
202b3('dul ba): thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon par bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas/dge slong dag de'i gnas khang du 'du bar byed pa na de dag der mi shong ba'i skabs de/bcom ldan 'das la dge
202b4('dul ba): slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/gnas khang du gdon par mi bya'o//de dag khyam su 'don par byed na/der yang mi shong nas/
202b5('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge 'dun gyis gso sbyong gi gnas la blo 'thun par bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong gi gnas la blo 'thun
202b6('dul ba): par bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas/de dag gis gang la blo 'thun por bya ba mi shes nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/gnas thasas cad grub pa'am/byas
202b7('dul ba): pa'amo/zin pa nang 'tshems dang /phyi rol nye 'khor 'dam gang dang bcas pa 'di dge 'dun gis skyong gi gnasu 'dod pa gang yin pa de la blo 'thun par bya'o//'di ltar
203a1('dul ba): blo 'thun par bya ste/gnas mal bA sham+ba pa byas nas gaN+DI brdungs te/dris pa'i tshig gi dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas/dge 'dun
203a2('dul ba): thams cad 'dug cing 'thun par gyur pa la/dge slong cig gis gsol ba phyi sa te/las bya'o//dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsun du gsol/gnas thams
203a3('dul ba): cad grub pa'am/bgyis pa'am/lags pa nang mtshams dang /phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gong dang bcas pa 'di dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong gi gan su bzhed na/gal te
203a4('dul ba): dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na/dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /dge 'dun gyis gnas thams cad grub pa'am/bgyis pa 'am/lag pa
203a5('dul ba): nang mchims dang /phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas pa 'di la/dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong gi gnasu blo 'thun par bgyi'o//'di ni gsol ba'o//las ni 'di
203a6('dul ba): ltar bya ste/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/gnas thams cad grub pa'am/bgyis pa 'am/legs pa nang mtshams dang /phyi rol nye 'khor
203a7('dul ba): 'dom gang dang bcas pa 'di dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong gnasu bzhed/de'i slad du dge 'dun gyi gnas thams cad grub pa'am/bgyis pa'am/log pa nang mtshams
203b1('dul ba): dang /phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas pa 'di la/dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong gi gnasu blo 'thun par bgyi na tshe dang ldan pa gang dag gnas thams cad grub pa'am/bgyis
203b2('dul ba): pa'am/lag pa nang mtshams dang /phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas po di la/dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong gi gnasu blo 'thun par bgyi bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma srungs
203b3('dul ba): shig/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig/dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/dge 'dun gyis gnas thams cad grub pa'am/bgyis pa'am/lag pa
203b4('dul ba): nang mtshams dang /phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas pa 'di la/dge 'dun gyis gso sbyong gi gnasu blo 'thun par bgyis lags te/'di ltar cang mi gsung bas//
203b5('dul ba): de de bzhin du 'dzin to//gang du dge 'dun gyis gso sbyong gi gnasu blo 'thun par byas pa der/dge slong rnams kyis 'dug la/gso sbyong dang dgag dbye dang /gsol
203b6('dul ba): ba dang /gsol ba dang gnyis dang /gsol ba dang bzhi las bya'o//me mthun par byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyuraro///'dul
203b7('dul ba): ba gzhi/bam po bcu gnyis pa//sdom la/kab pi na dang chos gos dang //dgrol dang mtshams chung mtshams tshen dang /gnang dang bskyang bskyed dgrol ba dang //
204a1('dul ba): ga ma smra smra nga// nanalas dang gdun smra/ na ga du u/sa sa
204a2('dul ba): dbad galan da/gas na ni da lda pa sa thig d+hin/rgya'i dkri na sa can ma dug nags skyong gcig pa gan kyi
204a3('dul ba): pas dge 'dun dung 'thun par 'ju//de nas dge slong rab tu mang po dge geso sbyong lnga pa de nyid/gas skyong gi gen smra dug cing 'thun por gyur nas/shes
204a4('dul ba): dang ldan pa bram the klub pan la sbed dzod //de nas tshe dang ldan pa bram tho ka ba pon 'di snyam du sems te/deng dge 'dun gyi gas sbyong bcwa lnga pa yin la/bdag
204a5('dul ba): dge slong ba pi na'i gso sbyong myed bco lnga pa yin na/ci dge 'dren gyi gros sbyong gi gan su 'gru bIr bya'am/'on te dge 'dun gyi gas skyong gi gan su 'gro bar mid+d+ha/
204a6('dul ba): ts+tshe dge 'dun dang rgyun cig gis d+hU nyam myong bar bye ma/na te dge duni dang na cig gas spyo/mas myong ba ma/ dge 'dun gyi dag dung dge na
204a7('dul ba): gyi byed pa dag tu 'gro bar bya'am/'on to dge 'dun gyi bya ba dag dong sbyin cig dge 'dun gyi byed pa dag tu 'gro bar ma bya/ci dge 'dun de sbyin cig dge 'dun gyi skye
204b1('dul ba): dag dang /dge 'dun gyi byed pa dag nyam su myong bar bya'am/'on te dge 'dun dang lhan cig dge 'dun gyi bya ba dag dang /dge 'dun gyi byed pa dag nyam su myong bar mi bya/bcom
204b2('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis kyang rtag tu dag pa snying po ste//rtag tu dag pa gso sbyong yin//gtsang ma'i las ni dag gyur pa//de yi brtul zhugs 'grub par 'gyur//zhes bka' stsal
204b3('dul ba): pas/bdag ni dag cing mchog tu dga' ba dang ldan no snyamo//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/tshe dang ldan pa bram ze ka pi na'o sems kyis yongasu rtog pa thugasu chud nas//
204b4('dul ba): 'od ma'i tshal nas mi snang bar mdzad de/sde can ma'i phug tu tshe dang ldan pa bram ze kab pi na'i mdun du bzhugs te/'di skad ces bka' stsal to//kab pi ni khyod gcig
204b5('dul ba): pubu dben par song ste/nang du yang dag 'jig pa na/'di snyam du dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong gi bcu lnga pa yin la/bdag dge slong kab pi ni'i gso sbyong yang bco lnga pa yin na//
204b6('dul ba): ci dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong gi gnasu 'gro bar bya 'am/'on te dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong gi gan su 'gro bar mi bya/ci dge 'dun dang lhan cig gso sbyong nyam su myong bar bya 'am/
204b7('dul ba): 'on te dge 'dun dang lhan cig gso sbyong nyamasu myong bar mi bya/ci dge 'dun gyi bya ba dag dang /dge 'dun gyi byed pa dag tu 'gro bar bya'am/'on te dge 'dun
205a1('dul ba): gyi bya ba dag dang /dge 'dun gyi byed pa dag tu 'gro bar mi bya/ci dge 'dun dang lhan cig dge 'dun gyi bya ba dag dang /dge 'dun gyi byed pa
205a2('dul ba): dag nyam su myong bar bya ba'am/'on te dge 'dun dang lhan cig dge 'dun gyi bya bo dag dang /dge 'dun gyi byed pa dag nyam su myong bar mi bya/bcom ldan 'das kyis
205a3('dul ba): kyang /rtag tu dag po snying po ste/rtag tu dag pa gso sbyong yin//gtsang ma'i las ni dag gyur pa//de yi brtul zhugs 'grub par 'gyur//zhes bka' stsal pas//
205a4('dul ba): bdag ni dag cing mchog tu dag pa dang ldan no//snyam du sems kyi yongasu rtog pa ma byung ngam/btsun pa byung //kab pi na khyod re shig dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong gi gnasu mi
205a5('dul ba): 'gro na/gzhan su zhig 'gro na/gzhan su zhig 'gro bar 'gyur/khyod dge 'dun dang lhan cig gso sbyong nyamasu myang bar mi byed na/gzhan su zhig nyimasu myong bar
205a6('dul ba): byed par 'gyur/khyed dge 'dun gyi bya ba dag dang /dge 'dun gyi byed pa dag tu mi 'gro na/gzhan su zhig 'gro bar 'gyur/khyod dge 'dun dang lhan cig dge 'dun
205a7('dul ba): gyi bya ba dang /dge 'dun gyi byed pa dag nyam su myong bar mi byed na/gzhan su zhig nyes su myong bar byed/ka ba pi na de lta bas no//khyed dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong gi gnas
205b1('dul ba): su mi 'gro bar ma byed par song shig/kab pa ni khyod dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong nyam su ma myong bar ma byed par nyam su myong bar byas shig/kab bi na khyod dge 'dun gyi bya ba dang /
205b2('dul ba): dge 'dun gyi byed pa dag tu mi 'gro bar mi byed par song shig/kab bo na khyod dge 'dun dang lhan cig dge 'dun gyi bya bo dag dang /dge 'dun gyi byed pa dag nyim su ma myong
205b3('dul ba): bar ma byed par nyam su myong bar gyis shig//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa bram ze kab pi ni khyed naso/gso sbyong gi gnas ga la bar gshegs te/byon
205b4('dul ba): nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugaso//bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag de lta bas
205b5('dul ba): na/dge slong dag gis gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyis sdom pas mtshams chen po bcad pa rje su gnang ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyi gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom
205b6('dul ba): pas mtshams chen po bcad par bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas/dge slong rnams kyis ji ltar gcad par bya ba mi shes nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rje dang
205b7('dul ba): por dge slong gnas pa dang /gnyug mar gnas pa rnams kyis mtshams chen po phyogs bzhi'i mtshan ma brtan po/shar phyogasu ni pha bong gi mtshan ma'am/rtsig pa'i
206a1('dul ba): mtshan ma 'am/ka ba'i mtshan ma 'am/shing ljon pa'i mtshan ma 'am/ra ba'i mtshan ma 'am/bya skyibs kyi mtshan ma 'am/lam pa chang mtshan ma'am//
206a2('dul ba): khron pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma brtan po gzugs par bya'o//lho phyogs dang /nub phyogs dang /byang phyogasu pha bong gi mtshan ma 'am/rtsig pa'i mtshan ma 'am/
206a3('dul ba): ka ba'i mtshan ma 'am/shing ljon pa'i mtshan ma 'amau/ra ba'i mtshan ma 'am/byi skyibs kyi mtshan ma 'am/lam po che'i mtshan ma 'am/khron pa la sogs pa'i
206a4('dul ba): mtshan ma brtan po gzugs par bya'o//de'i 'og tu gnas mal bsham par byas nas/gaN+DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas/
206a5('dul ba): dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing 'thun par gyur la/dge slong gnas pa dang /gnyug mar gnas pa rnams kyi mtshams chen po'i phyogs bzhi'i mtshan ma brtan por shar phyogs//
206a6('dul ba): ni pha bong gi mtshan ma 'am/rtsig pa'i mtshan ma 'am/ka ba'i mtshan ma 'am/shing ljon pa'i mtshan ma 'am/ra ba'i mtshan ma 'am/bya skyibs kyi mtshan ma 'am//
206a7('dul ba): lam po che'i mtshan ma 'am/khron pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma brtan po brjod par bya'o//lho phyogs dang /nub phyogs dang /byang phyogasu yang pho bong gi mtshan ma 'am/
206b1('dul ba): rtsig pa'i mtshan ma'am/ka ba'i mtshan ma 'am/shing ljon pa'i mtshan ma 'am/ra ba'i mtshan ma 'am/byA skyibs kyi mtshan ma 'am/lam pa che'i mtshan ma 'am/khron pa la
206b2('dul ba): sogs pa'i mtshan ma brtan po brjod par bya'o//de 'og tu dge slong cig gis gsol ba byas te/las bya'o//dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/'di lta ste gnas
206b3('dul ba): 'di na dge slong gnas pa dang /gnyug mar gnas pa rnams kyis mtshams chen po'i phyogs bzhi'i mtshan ma brtan po brjod pa/shar phyogasu ni phra bong gi mtshan ma 'am//
206b4('dul ba): rtsig pa'i mtshan ma brtan po lags/lho phyog su ni ka ba'i mtshan ma 'am/shing ljon pa'i mtshan ma brtan po lags/nub phyogasu nor ba'i mtshan ma 'am/bya skyibs
206b5('dul ba): kyi mtshan ma brtan po lags/byang phyogasu ni lam po che'i mtshan ma 'am/khron pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma brtan po lags na gol te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na/
206b6('dul ba): dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /dge 'dun gyis mtshan ma 'di rnams kyi nang du gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas 'di lta ste/gnas bsdu ba dang /dge slong
206b7('dul ba): rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du/dge 'dun gyis grong dang /grong gi nyi 'khor ma gtogs par dgon pa la thug pa dang /gnas mal la thug
207a1('dul ba): ba'i bar du mtshoms chen po gcod do//'di ni gsol ba'o//las ni 'di ltar bya ste/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/'di lta ste/
207a2('dul ba): gnas 'di na dge slong gnas pa dang /gnyug mar gnas pa rnams kyi mtshams chen po'i phyogs bzhi'i mtshan ma brtan po brjod pa/shar phyogasu ni pha bong gi mtshan ma
207a3('dul ba): 'am/rtsig pa'i mtshan ma brtan po lags/lho phyogasu ni ka ba'i mtshan ma 'am/shing ljon pa'i mtshan ma brtan po lags/nub phyogasuM ni ra ba'i mtshan ma 'am/bya
207a4('dul ba): skyibs kyi mtshan ma brtan po lags/byang phyogasu ni lam po che'i mtshan ma 'am/khron pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma brtan po lags te/de'i slad du dge 'dun gyi mtshan
207a5('dul ba): mo 'di rnams kyi nang du/gso sbyong gcig po'i gnas kyi sdom pas 'di lta ste/gnas bsdu ba dang /dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du/
207a6('dul ba): grong dang grong gi nye 'khor ma gtogs par dgon pa la thug pa dang /gnas mal la thug pa'i bar du mtshams chen po gcod na/tshe dang ldan pa gang dag mtshan ma
207a7('dul ba): rnams kyi ning du gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas 'di lta ste/gnas bsdu ba dang /dge slong rnams bde ba reg par gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du/grong dang
207b1('dul ba): grong gi nye 'khor ma gtogs par dgon pa la thug pa dang /gnas mal la thug pa'i bar du mtshams chen po gcad par bzod pa de dag ni cang ma srungs shig/gang dag mo
207b2('dul ba): bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig/dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/dge 'dun gyi mtshon ma 'di rnams kyi nang du gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas 'di lta ste/
207b3('dul ba): gnas bsdu ba dang /dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du/grong dang grong gi nye 'khor ma gtogs par dgon pa la thug pa dang /gnas mal la
207b4('dul ba): thug pa'i bar du mtshams chen po bcad lags te/'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to//dge 'dun gyi nang du mtshams chen po bcad pa der dge slong rnams kyis
207b5('dul ba): 'dug ste/gso sbyong bya zhing dgag dbye dang //gsol ba dang /gsol ba dang gnyis dang /gsol ba dang bzhi'i las bya'o//mi mthun par byed na 'gal tshabs can du
207b6('dul ba): 'gyur//dge slong rnams chos gos gsum thogs te/nyin mo spyod du 'dod pa ni/skyo bar gyur pa'i skyabs de/bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa
207b7('dul ba): dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/mtshams chen po'i nang du dge slong thams cad kyi chos gos dag dang mi 'bral ba'i gnang ba sbyin par bya'o//'di ltar sbyin
208a1('dul ba): par byaste/gnas mal bya sham+b+ha ba byas nas/ga jus te/dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par ba nas/dge 'dun thams/
208a2('dul ba): cad 'dug cing 'thun par gyur pa la dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te/yis bya'o//dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsal/'di lta ste gnas 'dir dge
208a3('dul ba): bdun 'thun pas gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas mtshams chen po bcad pa las/gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na/dge 'dun gyis gnang bar
208a4('dul ba): mdzod cig dang /dge 'dun gyis 'di lta ste/gnas bsgru ba dang /dge slong rnams bde ba la rog par gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du/mtshams chen po'i nang du dge
208a5('dul ba): slong thams cad kyi chos gos dag dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba gsol to//'di ni gsol ba'o//las ni 'di ltar bya ste/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du
208a6('dul ba): gsol/'di lta ste/gnas 'dor dge 'dun 'thun pas gas skyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas mtshams chen po bcad de/de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis 'di lta ste/
208a7('dul ba): gnas bsdu ba dang /dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas por bgyi ba'i slad du/mtshams chen po'i nang du dge slong thams cad kyis chos gos dag dang 'bral
208b1('dul ba): bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnar ba stsol na/tshe dang ldan pa gang dag 'di lta ste/gnas bsdu ba dang /dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du/mtshams
208b2('dul ba): chen po'i nang du dge slong thams cad chos gos dag dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba bskul bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma srungs shig/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni bsrungs
208b3('dul ba): shig/dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/dge 'dun gyis mtshams chen po'i nang du dge slong thams cad kyi chos gos dag dang 'bal bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba stsal
208b4('dul ba): lags te/'di ltar rung mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to//dge 'dun gyis gang du mtshams chen po'i nang du dge slong rnams kyi chos gos dag dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur
208b5('dul ba): ba'i gnang ba byin pa dang /dge slong rnams stod g.yogs dang smad g.yogs dang bcas pas 'dong bar bya ste/'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o//dge slong dag la bzhi'i tshogs
208b6('dul ba): kyis las bya ba dag byung zhing /lnga'i tshogs kyis las bya ba dag dang /bcu'i tshogs kyis las bya ba dag byung nas/de dag dge 'dun thams cad sdud par byed pa na
208b7('dul ba): dge slong rnams kyi dge ba'i phyogs yongasu nyams par gyur pa'i skabs de/bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
209a1('dul ba): ba/mtshams bu chung bcad cing dkyil 'khor bar blo 'thun par bya'o//'di ltar bcad par bya ste/je dang por mtshams chen po dgrol bar bya'o//
209a2('dul ba): 'di ltar dgrol bar bya ste/gnas mal bsham pa byas nas/gaN+DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis/dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas/dge 'dun thams
209a3('dul ba): cad 'dug cing 'thun par gyur pa la dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te/los bya'o//dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/'di lta ste gnas 'dir dge
209a4('dul ba): 'dun 'thun pas gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas mtsham sa chen po bcad pa/gal te dge 'dun gyis dus la bab cing bzod na/dge 'dun gyi gnang bar mdzad
209a5('dul ba): cig dang /dge 'dun gyis mtshams chen po gzhig cing dgrol bar mdzad//'di ni gsol ba'o//las ni 'di ltar bya ste/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/
209a6('dul ba): 'di lta ste/gnas 'dir dge 'dun 'thun pas gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas mtshams chen po bcadade/de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis mtshams chen po gzhog cing
209a7('dul ba): dgrol bar mdzad na/tshe dang ldan pa gang dag mtshams chen po gzhig cing dgrol ba mjed par bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs
209b1('dul ba): shig/'di ni las brjod pa dang po ste/de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas/dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/dge 'dun gyis mtshams chen po gzhig cing bkrol/
209b2('dul ba): lags te/'di ltar cing mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to//de'i 'og tu dge slong gnas pa dang /gnyug mar gnas pa rnams kyi mtshams bu chung gi phyogs bzhi'i mtshan
209b3('dul ba): ma brtan po/shar phyogasu ni seng ldeng gi phur pa btab pa 'am/srad pu bres pa 'am/rdo bzhag pa 'am/srol btod pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma brtan po gzugs par bya'o//
209b4('dul ba): lho phyogs dang /nub phyogs dang /byang phyogasu yang seng ldeng gi phur bu btab pa 'am/srad bu bres pa 'am/srol gtod pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma brtan po gzugs
209b5('dul ba): par bya'o//de'i 'og tu gnas mal bsham par byas nas/gaN+DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis/dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas/dge 'dun thams cad
209b6('dul ba): 'dug cing 'thun par gyur pa la/dge slong gnas pa dang /gnyug mar gnas pa rnams kyis mtshams bu chung gi phyogs bzhi'i mtshan ma brtan po/shar phyogasu ni seng
209b7('dul ba): ldeng gi phur pa btab pa 'am/srad bu bres pa 'am/rdo bzhag pa 'am/srol gtod pa la sogs pa'i mtshan mo brtan po brjod par bya'o//lho phyogs dang /nub phyogs
210a1('dul ba): dang /byang phyogasu yang song ldong gi phur pa btab pa 'am/srad bu bros pa 'am/rdo bzhag pa'am/srol gtod pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma
210a2('dul ba): brtan po brjod par bya'o//de'i 'og tu dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o//dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/'di lta ste gnas 'di na dge slong
210a3('dul ba): gnas pa dang gnyug mar gnas pa rnams kyis mtshams bu chung gi phyogs bzhi'i mtshon ma brtan po brjod pa/shar phyogasu ni seng ldeng gi phur pa btab pa lags/lho
210a4('dul ba): phyogasu ni srad bu bres pa legs/nub phyogasu rdo bzhag pa lags/byang phyogasu ni sol gtod pa brtan po lags na/gal te dge 'dun gyis dus la bab cing bzod na/
210a5('dul ba): dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /dge 'dun gyis mtshan ma 'di rnams kyi nang du 'di lta ste/gnas bsdu ba dang /dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par
210a6('dul ba): bgyi ba'i slad du/mtshams bu chung gcod cing dkyil 'khor bar blo 'thun par mdzad//'di ni gsol ba'o//las ni 'di ltar bya ste/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan
210a7('dul ba): du gsol/'di lta ste gnas 'di na dge slong gnas pa dang /gnyug mar gnas pa rnams kyis mtshamasu bu chung gi phyogs bzhi'i mtshan ma brtan po brjod pa/shar
210b1('dul ba): phyogasu ni sang ldeng gau phur ba btab pa lags/oM phyog su ni srad bu bres pa lags/nub phyogasun rdo bzhag pa lags/byang phyogasu ni srol gtod pa brtan po lags te/de'i slang/
210b2('dul ba): dge 'dun gyis mtshan ma 'di rnams kyi nang du 'di lta ste/gnas bsdu ba dang /dge slong rnams bde ba la rig par gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du mtshams bu chung bcad cing dkyil
