345b5('dul ba): tshegs dang /rta pa'i tshigs dang /shing rta pa'i tshogs dang /dpung bu chung gi tshogs dang /kun dga' ra ba'i sgo'i bar du lhags te/sbar thabasu bskur bar sgrogs shig/
345b6('dul ba): shes ldan dag shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams zung zhig/song shig/chings shig/spyugs shig/nga'i glang po che'i 'tsho ba dang /rta rje dang /shing rta'i srung ba dang /so phag skyed pa
345b7('dul ba): dang /rgyal mtshan thegs pa dang /'phen rings 'dzin pa/so sor rgyal po'i bya ba dang /rgyal po'i byed pa rnams byed par 'gyur zhes zer la/de la dgag dbye byed pa'i dge slong
346a1('dul ba): 'di snyam du sems te/deng dge 'dun gyi dgag dbye bco lnga pa yin la/rgyal po dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa go bskyon pa glang po che'i tshogs dang /

346a3('dul ba): sras kyi dge sbyong nas zung zhig/sod cig/chings shig/skyugs shig/bdag cag gi glang po che 'tsho ba dang /rta rje dang /shing rta srung ba dang /so phog skyed pa dang /

346a5('dul ba): lan gsum bzlas pas dgag dbye byas na/gzhi des bdag gi srog gi bar chad dang /dge sbyong gi tshul gyi bar chad dang /tshangs par spyod pa'i bar chad du 'gyur bas ma la

346b1('dul ba): yul bcom ste/kun dga' ra ba'i sgor lhags nas/ba lang 'am/ma he 'am/rwa dag bsad de khrag gis yan lag dag byugs nas/dge slong dag la pho nya btang ste/'phags pa
346b2('dul ba): rnams byung shig/'dir bdag cag 'khod dgoso zhes zer la/de la dgag dbye byed pa'i dge slong 'di snyam du sems te/dang dge 'dun gyi dgag dbye bco lnga pa yin la/chom
346b3('dul ba): rkun pa 'di dag kyang grong bcom pa'am/grong khyer bcom pa 'am/yul btsom ste/kun dga' ra ba'i sgor lhags nas/ba lang ngam/ma he 'am/ra dge bas de/khrag gis
346b4('dul ba): yan lag dag byugs nas/dge slong rnams la pho nya dag btang ste/'phags pa rnams byung zhig/'dir bdag cag rnams 'khod dgos zhes zer te/gal te bdag gis dgag
346b5('dul ba): dbye lan gsum bzlas pas dgag dbye byas nas/gzhi des bdag gi srog gi bar chad dang /dge sbyong gi tshul gyi bar chad dang /tshangs par spyod pa'i bar chad du 'gyur bas/ma la
346b6('dul ba): bdog gis dgag dbye lan cig bzlas pos dgag dbye bya'o snyam nas/de dgag dbye lan cig bzlas pas dgag dbye byed na/don de la dgog dbye lan cig bzlas pa yin//
346b7('dul ba): don gzhan la dgag dbye lan cig bzlas pa ni/'di ltar yang dgag dbye bco lnga pa de nyid la/rgan zhugs mi shes pa rmongs pa mi gsal ba/mi mkhas pa gzhan zhig gis
347a1('dul ba): spyod yul lam/spyod yul gyis lam khar rigs kyi bud med dam/rigs kyi na chung la gshes sam/kha ngan smras sam/reg pas mi rnams khros te//
347a2('dul ba): kun dga' ra ba'i sgor lhogs nas/spar thob su bskur ba sgrogs shig/shes ldan dag shAkya'i sras kyi dge slong rnams zung zhig/sod cig/chings shig/spyugs shig/rgyal
347a3('dul ba): po'i glang po che 'tsho ba dang /rta rdzi dang /shing rta srung ba dang /so phag skyed pa dang /rgyal mtshan thogs pa dang /'phan rings 'dzin pa so sor rgyal po'i bya ba dang /rgyal po'i
347a4('dul ba): byed pa rnams byed par 'gyur ro//zhes byer la/de la dgag dbye byed pa'i dge slong 'di snyam du sems te/deng dge 'dun gyi dgag dbye bco lnga po yin lo/rgan zhugs mi shes
347a5('dul ba): po rmongs pa mi gsal/mi mkhas pa/gzhan zhig gis spyod yul ma spyod yul gyi lam khar rigs kyi bud med dam/rigs kyi na chung la gshes sam kha ngan smras sam/reg
347a6('dul ba): pas mi rnams khros te/kun dga' ra ba'i sgor lhags nas/spar thabasu bskur ba sgrogs shing shes ldan dag shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams zung zhig/song cig/chings shig/
347a7('dul ba): spyugs shig/rgyal po'i glang po che 'tsho ba dang /rta rdzi dang /shing rta srung ba dang /sa phag skyed pa dang /rgyal mtshan thogs pa dang /'phan rings 'dzin pa so sor rgyal po'i bya
347b1('dul ba): bdang /rgyal po'i byed pa rnams byed par 'gyur ro zhes zer te/gal te bdag gis dgag dbye lan gsum bzlas pas dgag dbye byas na gzhi des bdag gi srog gi bar chad dang /dag
347b2('dul ba): skyong gi tshul gyi bar chad dang /tshongs par spyod pa'i bar chad du 'gyur bar ma la bdag gis dgag dbye lan cig bzlas pas dog go dbye bya'o snyam nas/de dgag dbye lan cig bzlas
347b3('dul ba): bos dgag dbye byed na/don de la dgag dbye lan cig bzlas pa yin no//don gzhan la dgag dbye lan cig bzlas pa ni 'di ltar yong mi ma yin pa gnas pa'i phyogs shig tu gtsug
347b4('dul ba): lag khang brtsegs la/rgan zhugs mi shes pa rmongs pa/mi gsal ba/mi mkhas pa/gzhan zhig gis mi rung ba'i phyogasu bshang ba dang /gci ba dang /mchil ma dang /
347b5('dul ba): snabs dang /skyugs pa dang /'khru ba bor ba dang /mi gtsang bas sprugs pa'i gnas mal gzhug pas mi ma yin pa rnams khros nas spyod yul dang /spyod yul gyi lam ka dang /
347b6('dul ba): 'chag pa dang /khyams dang /sgo khang rnamasu 'dug nas kyang /dge slong rnams la 'bab par byed//de la dgag dbye byed pa'i dge slong 'dra snyam du sems te/deng dge 'dun gyi
347b7('dul ba): dgag dbye bco lnga po de yin la/gtsug lag khang 'di yang mi ma yin pa rnams gnas pa'i phyogs shig tu brtsigs pa/rgan zhugs mi shes pa rmongs pa mi gsal ga mi mkhas
348a1('dul ba): pa gzhan zhig gis mi rung ba'i phyogasu bshang pa dang /gtso ba dang /mchil ma dang /snabs dang /skyugs pa dang /'khru ba bor ba dang /mi gtsang bas
348a2('dul ba): sbags pa'i gnas mal gzhag pas mi ma yin pa rnams khros nas spyod yul lam/spyod yul gyi lam 'am/'chag so 'am/khyams sam/sgo khang rnamasu 'dug ste/
348a3('dul ba): dge slong dag la 'bab par byed kyis ji ste bdag gis dgag dbye la ni gsum bzlas pa so dgag dbye byas na/gzhi des bdag gi srog gi bar chad dang /dge sbyong gi tshul
348a4('dul ba): gyi bar chad dang /tshangs par spyod pa'i bar chad du 'gyur gyis/ma la bdag gis dgag dbye lan cig bzlas pas dgag dbye bya'o snyam nas/de lan cig bzlas pa'i dgag
348a5('dul ba): dbyes dgag dbye byed na/don de la dgag dbye lan cig bzlas pa yino//don gzhan la dgag dbye lan cig bzlas pa ni/'di ltar yang gdug pa gnas pa'i phyogs shig
348a6('dul ba): tu gtsug lag khong brtsegs la/de la rgan zhugs mi shes pa/rmongs pa/mi gsal ba mi mkhas pa gzhan zhig gis mi rung ba'i sa phyogasu gshang ba dang /gtso ba dang /
348a7('dul ba): mchil ma dang /snabs dang /skyugs pa dang /'khru ba dag bor zhing /mi gtsang bas sbags pa'i gnas mal bzhag pas gdugs pa khros te spyod yul lam spyod yul gyi
348b1('dul ba): lam 'am/'chug sa 'am/khyams sam/sgro khang rnamasu 'dug nas kyang dge slong rnams la 'bab par byed/nyal khri dag kyang sbyar bar byed//de na dgag dbye byed pa'i dge slong 'di snyam
348b2('dul ba): du sems te/deng dge 'dun gyi dgag dbye bco lnga pa yin la/gtsug lag khang 'di yang gdug pa gnas pa'i phyogs shig tu brtsigs la/rgan zhugs ma shes pa rmongs pa mi
348b3('dul ba): gsal ba mi mkhas pa gzhan zhig gos mi rung ba'i phyogasu gshang ba dang /gci ba dang /mtshal ma dang /snangs dang /skyugs pa dang /'khru ba dag bor zhing /mi gtsang byas
348b4('dul ba): sbags pa'i gnas mal bzhag pas gdug pa khros nas spyod yul lam/spyod yul gyi lam 'am/'chag sa 'am/khyams sam/sgo khang rnamasu 'dug nas/dge slong
348b5('dul ba): dag la 'bab par byed/nyal khri drag sbyar bar byed kyis/gol te bdag gis dgog dbye lan gsum bzlas pas dgag dbye byas na/gzhi des srog gi bar chad dang /dge sbyong gi tshul
348b6('dul ba): gyi bar chad dang /tshongs par spyod pa'i bo chad du 'gyur gyis/ma la bdag gis dgog dbye lan cig bzlas pas dgag dbye bya'o snyam nas de dgag dbye lan cig bzlas pas dgag
348b7('dul ba): dbye byed na/don de la dgago dbye lan cig bzlas pa yin//don gzhan la dgag dbye lon cig bzlas pa ni/'di ltar yong klu gnas pa'i phyogs shig tu gtsug lag khang
349a1('dul ba): brtsigs la/de na rgan zhugs mi shes pa rmongs pa mi gsal ba mi mkhas pa gzhan zhig gis mi rung ba'i phyogasu bshang ba dang /gci ba dang /mchil
349a2('dul ba): ma dang /rna bas dang /skyugs pa dang /'khru ba dag bor zhing /mi gtsang bas sbags pa'i gnas mal bzhag pas/klu khros te spyod yul lam spyod yul gyi lam 'am/
349a3('dul ba): khyams sam/sgo khang dag tu 'dug nas/dge slong rnams la 'bab par byed/nyal khri dag kyang sbyar bar byed//de na dgeg dbye byed pa'i dge slong 'di snyam du sems te/
349a4('dul ba): dong dge 'dun gyi dgag dbye bco lnga pa yin na/gtsug lag khang 'di yang klu gnas pa'i phyogs shig tu brtsegs la/rgan zhugs mi shes pa/rmongs pa/mi gsal ba
349a5('dul ba): mi mkhas pa gzhan zhig gis mi rung ba'i phyogasu gshang ba dang /gci ba dang /mchil mo dang /snabs dang /skyugs pa dang /'khru ba dag bor la myi gtsang bas sbags
349a6('dul ba): pa'i gnas mal bzhag pas klu khros te/spyod yul lam skyod yul gyi lam 'am/'chag sa 'am/khyams sam/sgo khang rnamasu 'dug nas/dge slong rnams la 'bab
349a7('dul ba): par byed/nyal khri dag kyang sbyar bar byed/gal te bdag gis dgag dbye lan gsum bzlas pas dgog dbye byed na/gzhi des srog gi bar chad dang /dge sbyong gi tshul
349b1('dul ba): gyi bar chad dang /tshangs par spyod pa'i bar chad du 'gyur gyis/ma la bdag gis dgag dbye lan cig bzlas pas dgrag dbye bya'o snyam nus/dgag dbye lan cig bzlas pas dgag
349b2('dul ba): dbye byed na/don de la dgag dbye lan cig bzlas pa yin no//don gzhan la dgag dbye lan cig bzlas pa ni/'di ltar yang nags khrod zhig tu gtsug lag khang brtsigs pa dang
349b3('dul ba): mi shor bas grong dang grong khyer dang /rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rnams kyang sreg cing 'ong ste/spyod yul dang /spyod yul gyi lam ka yang tshig/'chag sa dang /khyams dang /sgo
349b4('dul ba): khang yang tshig/gtsug lag khang dang /gtsug lag khang gi nye 'khor yang tshig la thugs ni/de na dge slong dgag dbye byed pa 'di snyam du sems te/deng dge 'dun gyi dgag dbye
349b5('dul ba): bco lnga pa yin na/gtsug lag khang 'di yang nags khrod zhig tu brtsigs te/me shor bas grong dang /grong khyer dang /rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rnams kyang sreg cing 'ong ste/spyod
349b6('dul ba): yul dang /spyod yul gyi lam ka yang tshig/'chag sa dang /khyams dang /sgo khang rnams kyang tshig/gtsug lag khang dang gtsug lag khang gi nye 'khor tshig la thug pas gos
349b7('dul ba): te bdag gis dgag dbye lan gsum bzlas pas dgag dbye byas ni gzhi de ba dag srog gi bar chad dang /dge sbyong gi tshul gyi bar chad dang /tshangs par spyod pa'i bar chad du 'gyur
350a1('dul ba): gyis ma la bdag gis dgag dbye lan cig bzlas pas dgag dbye bya'o snyam nas de dgag dbye lan cig bzlas pas dgag dbye byed na/don de la dgag dbye
350a2('dul ba): lan gcig bzlas pa yin no////'dul ba gzhi//bam po bcu dgu po//don gzhan lo dgag dbye lan cig bzlas pa ni/'di ltar yang gshong zhig tu
350a3('dul ba): gtsug lag khang brtsigs pa dang /ri gzar po'i khar char mo che bab pas/grong dang grong khyer dang /yul 'khor dang /rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor yang ded cing 'ong ste/spyod
350a4('dul ba): yul dang spyod yul gyi lam dang /'chag sa dang /khyams dang /sgo khang yang ded la thug/gtsug lag khang yang gshor bar gyur pa dang /de na dgag dbye byed pa'i dge
350a5('dul ba): slong 'di snyam du sems te/deng dge 'dun gyi dgag dpe bco lnga pa yin na/gtsug lag khang 'di yang gshong zhig tu brtsigs te/ri ga zar po'i khar char mo tsho bab pas/
350a6('dul ba): grong dang /grong khyer dang /yul 'khor dang /rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor yang ded cing 'ong ste/spyod yul dang spyod yul gyi lam dang /'chag sa dang /khyams dang /sgo khang
350a7('dul ba): yang ded la thug/gtsug lag khang yang gshor bar gyur pas/gal te bdag gis dag go dpya lan gsum bzlas pas/dgag dbye byas na gzhi des bdagi srog bar chad
350b1('dul ba): dpe/dge sbyong gi tshul gyi bar chad dang /tshangs par spyod pa'i bar chad du 'gyur gyis/ma la bdag gis dgag dbye lan cig bzlas pas dgag dbye bya'o snyam nas/de dgrag dbye
350b2('dul ba): lan cig bzlas pas dgag dbye byed na/don de la dgog dbye lan cig bzlas pa yin//don gang gi phyir dgag dbye lan gnyis bzlas pa yin+da na ni/gang la dgag dbye lan
350b3('dul ba): gsum bzlas pa'i skabs med par gyur na//don de la dgag dbye lan gnyis bzlas pa yin//don gang la dgag dbye lan gsum bzlas pa yin zhe na/rnal du gnas pa'i gang+gA
350b4('dul ba): skabs na'o//don gang la tshogs kyi dgag dbye bya zhe na/'di ltar yang dgon pa 'khrugs pa dag gi 'jigs pa byung nas yul mi rnams kyang de dang de dag tu bros//de nas dge
350b5('dul ba): slong rnams kyang gtur bu dag tu chos gos thum po byas te/thogs nas phan tshun bltas te/tshe dang ldan pa dag deng dge 'dun gyi dgag dbye bco lnga pa yin mod kyi gang gi tshe dge
350b6('dul ba): 'dun 'thun pa rnyed pa de'i tshe dgag dbye bya'o zhes brjod nas 'dod par bya ste/don de la tshigs kyi dgag dbye zhes bya'o//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor
350b7('dul ba): gyis zhus pa btsun pa 'di ltar yang dge slong rnams kyis 'di lta bu'i khrim su bca' ba dag bgyis nas/dbyar gnas te tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag cag gi nang du su yang rung //
351a1('dul ba): dbyar gyi nang log su nye du dag 'ong na/dgag dbye sbyin par bya'o zhes mchi na/btsun pa dgag dbye stsal bar bgyi 'am/mi stsal bar bgyi/nye bar 'khor
351a2('dul ba): byin cig/ji ste dngos po bzhag la gang zag ma lags na/dgog dbye stsal bar dgyi 'am/mi skul bar bgyi/nye bar 'khor ma byin par de la tshig 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan
351a3('dul ba): po bdag cag don 'di la 'dus shing 'thun par gyur pa ni ma yin na/tshe dang ldan pa ci'i phyir dngos po bzhag ste gang zag ma yin/'on kyang bdag nyid shin tu rnam par dag par bya
351a4('dul ba): ba'i phyir dgag dbye byos shig ces/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal gyi/gal te 'dod na ni 'dug la dgag dbye bya'o zhes smros shig/gal te gang zag bzhag la dngos
351a5('dul ba): po ma lags na/dgog dbye skal bar bgyi 'am/mi stsal bar bgyi/nye bar 'khor ma sbyin par de la tshig 'di skad ces/tshe dang ldan pa bdag cag don 'di la 'dus shing 'thun
351a6('dul ba): par gyur pa ni ma yin na/tshe dang ldan pa ci'i phyir gang zag gzhag ste dngos po ma yin 'on kyang bdag nyid shin tu rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir/dgag dbye byos shig ces bcom
351a7('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal gyis/gal te 'dod na ni 'dug la dgag dbye bya'o zhes smros shig/gal te dngos po dang gang zag bzhag ste stsal bar bgyi 'am/mi stsal bar bgyi//
351b1('dul ba): nye bar 'khor ma sbyin par tshe dang ldan pa bdag cag don 'di la 'dus shing 'thun par gyur pa ni ma yin na/tshe dang ldan pa ci'i phyir gang zag dang dngos po bzhag ste ma yin 'on kyang bdag
351b2('dul ba): nyid shin tu rnam por dag par bya ba'i phyir/dgag dbye byos shig ces bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal kyis/gal te 'dod na 'dug la dgag dbye bya'o zhes smros shig/gal te/
351b3('dul ba): dngos po dang gang zag ma bzhag na/dogag dbye sbal bar bgyi 'am/mi stsal bar bgyi/nye bar 'khor byin cig/sdom la/rgyal pos dge slong bzung ba dang /dran par bya ba bcu po
351b4('dul ba): dang //ltung bas bdun po bya ba dang //gleng po yis ni bdun pa'o//'di ltar yang dgag dbye bco lnga pa de nyid la dge slong rgyal po 'am/chom rkun nam/g.yon can nam/bsod pa 'am/
351b5('dul ba): phyir rgol ba 'am/phas kyis dgra bro bzung bar gyur na/de la dge slong dag gis pho nya btong bar bya ste/dge slong 'di bdag cag gi tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa yin gyis 'di thong
351b6('dul ba): shig ces springs shig/gal te btang na legs/ji ste ma btang na pho nya gnyis pa btang bar bya ste/dge slong 'di bdag cag rnams dang lhan cig tu bgyi ba cung zhig mchis kyis 'di
351b7('dul ba): thong zhig ces springs shig/gal te btang na legs/ji ste ma btang na dge slong dkyil 'khor gyi nang du zhugs pa la dkag dbye bya'o//de'i 'og tu phyi de nyin par nas dge slong de
352a1('dul ba): thar bar bya ba'i phyir brtson par bya'o//gal te brtson par byas na legs/ji ste brtson par ma byas na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyuraro//'di ltar yang dgag dbye bcwa
352a2('dul ba): lnga pa de nyid la dge slong gis ltung ba dran na/dge slong des ltung ba de dge slong gi mdun du chos bzhin du gyis la de'i 'og tu dgag dbye bya'o//dgag dbye ni 'di ltar bya ste/ngas
352a3('dul ba): dgag dbye'i bar chad du 'gyur ba mi smras shes bya bar snga gso sbyong gi gzhir ji skad bstan pa bzhin bcu tshan rgyas par bya'o//'di ltar yang dgag dbye bco lnga pa de nyid la/
352a4('dul ba): dge slong gis ltung ba shes la ji ste/phas pha mo pa byung ba shes na/bskad la dgag dbye bya'o//gal te dge 'dun lkog ma byung bar shes na/byin gyis brlabs la dgag dbye
352a5('dul ba): bya'o//gal te ltung byed dang so sor bshags pa dang /nyes byas dag byung bar shes na/bshegs nas dgag dbye bya'o//'di ltar yang dgag dbye bco lnga pa de nyid la dngos po mo
352a6('dul ba): nges par gyur nas/kha cig ni lhag ma med par 'du shes la/kha cig ni lhag ma dang bcas par 'du shes na de la gang dag lhag ma med par 'du shes pa de dag gis ni bskrad
352a7('dul ba): nas dgag dbye bya'o//gang dag lhag ma dang bcas par 'du shes pa de dag gis byin gyis rlob tu bcug nas dgag dbye bya'o//'di ltar yang dgag dbye bco lnga pa de nyid la
352b1('dul ba): ltung ba ma nges te/de la kha cig ni bshags par bya'o zhes zer/kha cig ni bsdam par bya'o zhes zer na/de la gang dag bshags par bya'o zhes zer ba de dag gis ni 'chag su bcug/
352b2('dul ba): nas dgag dbye bya'o//gang dag bsdam par bya'o zhes zer ba de dag gis ni bsdam par byed du bcug nas dgag dbye bya'o//'di ltar yang dgag dbye bco lnga pa de nyid la/dge slong gis
352b3('dul ba): dge slong la gleng bar byed la/gal te gleng pa po lus dang ngag ma bsdams par gyur na/de lta bu'i gleng ba po la bsgo zhong rab tu bsgo nas dgag dbye bya'o//gal te gleng ba po lus kyis
352b4('dul ba): bsdam la/ngag gis ma yin par gyur na/de lta bu'i gleng ba po la yang /bsgo zhing rab tu bsgo nas/dgag dbye bya'o//gal te gleng ba po dag gi bsdam lo lus kyis ma yin par
352b5('dul ba): gyur na/de lta bu'i gleng ba po la yang bsgo shing /rab tu sgo nas dgag dbye bya'o//gal te gleng ba po lus dang dag gis bsdams par gyur la/mdo sde mi 'dzin 'dul ba mi 'dzin ma mo
352b6('dul ba): mi 'dzin pa yin na/de lta bu'i gleng ba po brda sprad cing /yang dag par brdo sprad nas dgag dbye bya'o//gal te gleng ba po lus dang ngag gis bsdams la mdo sde 'dzin pa dang /'dul ba
352b7('dul ba): 'dzin pa dang /ma mo 'dzin par gyur la mdo sde la gsal ba ma yin/'dul ba la mkhas pa ma yin/ma mo la gsal ba ma yin na/de lta bu'i gleng ba po la yang brda sprad cing yang
353a1('dul ba): dag par brda sprad nas dgag dbye bya'o//gal te gleng pa po lus dang /ngag gis bsdams shing mdo sde 'dzin pa 'dul ba 'dzin pa/ma mo 'dzin pa/mdo sdel
353a2('dul ba): gsal ba/'dul ba la gsal ba/ma mo la gsal po yin la/mdo sde la mi bzo/'dul ba la mi bzo/ma mo la mi bzo ba yin//de lta bu'i gleng ba po yang brda sprad cing
353a3('dul ba): yang dag par brda sprad nas dgag dbye bya'o//gal te gleng ba po lus dang ngag gis bsdams shing /mdo sde 'dzin pa/'dul ba 'dzin paM/ma mo 'dzin pa/mdo sde la gsal ba/
353a4('dul ba): 'dul ba la gsal ba/ma ma la gsal ba/mdo sde la bzo ba/'dul ba la bzo ba/ma mo la bzo ba yin la/mdo sde la mi mkhas pa/'dul ba la mi mkhas pa/ma mo la
353a5('dul ba): mi mkhas pa yin na/de lta bu'i gleng ba po la yang brda sprad cing yang dag par brda sprad nas/dgag dbye bya'o//gal te gleng ba po lus dang ngag gis bsdams shing mdo sde 'dzin pa/
353a6('dul ba): 'dul ba 'dzin pa/ma mo 'dzin pa/mdo sde la gsal ba/'dul ba la gsal ba/ma mo la gsal ba/mdo sde la bzo ba/'dul ba la bzo ba/ma mo la bzo ba/mdo sde la
353a7('dul ba): mkhas pa/'dul ba la mkhas pa/ma me la mkhas pa yin na/gal te ched du bsams te/dge 'dun gyi nang du chos ma yin pa la chos dang /chos la chos ma yin pa dang //
353b1('dul ba): 'dul ba ma yin pa la 'dul ba dang /'dul ba la 'dul ba ma yin par ston pa yan na/de lta bu'i gleng ba po la yang brda sprad cing yang dag par brda sprad nas/dgag dbye bya'o//gal te
353b2('dul ba): gleng ba po lus dang ngag gis bsdams pa yin la mdo ste 'dzin pa/'dul ba 'dzin pa/ma ma 'dzin pa/mdo sde la gsal ba/'dul ba la gsal ba/ma mo la gsol pa/mdos
353b3('dul ba): la bzo ba/'dul ba la bzo ba/ma mo la bzo ba/mdo sde la mkhas pa/'dul ba la mkhas pa/ma mo mkhas pa yin na/gal te ched du bsams pa ma yin par dge 'dun gyi
353b4('dul ba): nang du chos ma yin pa la chos dang chos la chos ma yin pa dang /'dul ba ma yin pa la 'dul ba dang /'dul ba la 'dul ba ma yin no zhes ston pa de la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste/
353b5('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa gleng ba po gang gis smra/phas pham pas sam/dge 'dun gyi lhag mas sam/ltung byed kyis sam/so sor bshags pas sam/nyes byas kyis sam/mtshan mi byas
353b6('dul ba): pas sam/nyin mo byas pas sam/lam du byas pas sam/lam grol bar byas pas sam/'gro ba'i 'am/'greng ba'i 'am/'dug pa'i 'am/nyal ba'i 'am/gal te pham pas
353b7('dul ba): yin gyi dge 'dun lhag mas ma yin/so sor bshags pas ma yin/nyeso byas kyis ma yin nam/gal te dge 'dun lhag mas yin gyi/phas pham pas ma yin/ltung byed
354a1('dul ba): kyis ma yin/so sor bshags pas ma yin/nyes byas kyis mya yin nam/gal te ltung byed kyis yin gyi/phas pham pas ma yin/dge 'dun lhag mas ma
354a2('dul ba): yin/so sor gshegs pas ma yin/nyes byas kyis ma yin nam/gal te so sor gshegs pas yon gyis/phas pham pas ma yin/dge 'dun lhag mus ma yin/
354a3('dul ba): ltung byed kyis ma yin/nyes byas kyis ma yin nam/gal te nyes byas kyis yin gyi/phas pham pas ma yin/dge 'dun lhag mas ma yin/ltung byed kyis ma yin/
354a4('dul ba): so sor bshags pas ma yin nam/gal te phas pham pa dang po yin gyis/gnyis pas ma yin/gsum pas ma yin/bzhi pas ma yin na me/gal te gnyis pas
354a5('dul ba): yin gyis/dang pos ma yin/gsum pas ma yin/bzhi pas ma yin nam/gal te gsum pas yin gyi/dang pos ma yin/gnyis pas ma yin/bzhi pas ma yin nam/
354a6('dul ba): gal te bzhi pas yin gyi/dang pos ma yin/gnyis pas ma yin/gsum pas ma yin nam/gal te dge 'dun lhag ma dang pos yin gyis/gnyis pas ma yin zhes bya
354a7('dul ba): ba nas/bcu gsum pa'i bar gyis ma yin nam/gal te bcu gsum pa'i bar gyis yin/dang pos ma yin/gnyis pas ma yin gsum pas ma yin pa nas/bcu
354b1('dul ba): gnyis pa'i bar gyis ma yin pa 'am/gal te ltung byed dang pos yin gyi/gnyis pas ma yin/gsum pasnga ma yin pa nas/dgu bcu pa'i bar gyis ma yin pa 'am/gal te dgu
354b2('dul ba): bcu pas yin gyis/dang pos ma yin/gnyis pas ma yin pa nas/brgyad cu rtsa dgu pa'i bar gyis ma yin pa'am/gal te so sor bshags pa dang pos yin gyis/gnyis
354b3('dul ba): pas ma yin/gsum pas ma yin/bzhi pas ma yin nam/gal te gnyis pas yin gyis/dang pos ma yin/gsum pas ma yin/bzhi bra ma yin pa nas/gal te gsum
354b4('dul ba): pas yin gyis/dang pos ma yin/gnyis pas ma yin/bzhi pas ma yin nam/gal te bzhi pas yin gyis/dang pos ma yin/gnyis pas ma yin/gsum pas ma yin
354b5('dul ba): pa 'am/gal te nyes byas dang pos yin gyi/gnyis pas ma yin/gsum pas ma yin nam/tha ma'i bar gyis ma yin nam/gal te tha mas yin gyi dang pos ma yin/gnyis
354b6('dul ba): pAs ma yin pa nas/tha ltag gi bar gyi ma yin nam/gal te nub mo byas pas yin gyi/nyin par byas pas ma yin nam/gal te nyon par byas pas yin gyi/mtshan ma byas pas
354b7('dul ba): yin nam/gal te lam gol ba na byas pas yin gyi/lam du byas pas ma yin nam/gal te lam du byas pas yin gyi/lam gol bar byas pas ma yin nam/gal te
355a1('dul ba): 'gro ba'i yin gyi/'dug pa'i ma yin/'greng ba'i ma yin/nyal ba'i ma yin nam/gal te 'dug pa'i ma yin gyi/'gro ba'i ma yin/'grang ba'i ma yin//
355a2('dul ba): nyal ba'i ma yin nam/gal te nyal ba'i yin gyis/'gro ba'i ma yin/'greng ba'i ma yin/'dug pa'i ma yin nam/gal te 'greng ba yin gyis/nyal ba'i ma yin/'dug
355a3('dul ba): pa'i ma yin zhes/gal te glong ba po la de ltar legs par shin tu yang dag par rmas/yang dag par bstan/yang dag par brtags pa na/gnas nas gan su sbed pa ni
355a4('dul ba): gleng ba po ma yin/glengs pa ma yin no//gal te gleng ba po de ltar laDa par shin tu yang dag par rmas/yang dag par bstan/yang dag par brtags pa na gnas nas gnas
355a5('dul ba): su sbed par mi byed na/de ni gleng ba po yin/glengs pa yin no//gal te gleng ba po gnas nas gnasu mi sbed na/glengs pa yin pas 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste/tshe dang
355a6('dul ba): ldan pa de'i tshe lus kyi 'du byed dang /ngag gi 'du byed dang /yid kyi 'du byed gang dag yin pa smros shig/gal te phas pham pa yin par shes na/bskrad pa dgag dbye bya'o///
355a7('dul ba): gal te dge 'dun gyi lhag ma yin par shes na/byin gyis darlabs la dgag dbye bya'o//gal te ltung byed dang /so sor bshags pa dang /nyes byas yin paraM shes
355b1('dul ba): na bshags la dgag dbye bya'o//sdom la/mang po sgra dang bzhug pa dang //bya dang rnam pa lnga pa dang //'dod pas rnam gsum bya ba dang //yongasu dag la dgag dbye bya'o//'di ltar yang
355b2('dul ba): dgag dbye bco lnga pa de nyid la/gnyug mar gnas pa'i dge slong lnga 'am/lhag pa dag 'dug cing 'thun par gyur pa la/de dag 'di snyam du sems te dge slong mi 'ongs pa dag yod//
355b3('dul ba): de dag ma 'ongs te med kyang bdag cag gis gsol ba byas te/dgag dbye byar rung ngo snyam nas/rtag pas don du gnyer ba rtog pa'i yo byad can de dag gis gsol ba byas te/
355b4('dul ba): dgag dbye byed na de'i 'og tu gnyug mar gnas pa'i dge slong nyung zad cig 'ongs na de dag gis yang gsol ba byas te/dgrag dbye bya'o//dge slong snga ma rtogs pa'i nyor sngogs
355b5('dul ba): can dag la ni 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro//sngar gso sbyong gi gzhi las sdom gyi tshigasu bcad pa ji skad gsungs pa de bzhin du brjod par bya'o//khyad par gcig yod pa ni der
355b6('dul ba): gnyug mar gnas pa'i dge slong bzhi 'am/lhag pa zhig 'dug cing 'thun par gyur la zhes smos pa 'di ni lnga 'am/lhag pa zhes brjod par bya ba yin//sdom la/dbyar gnas
355b7('dul ba): par ni dam bcas pa'i//'thab grol dge slong shes nas kyang //bshes pa'i tshig gis bsu bya dang //nges pa'i zla ba bzhi po dang //nad po dang ni dngos po ste//yang dag bsdoms
356a1('dul ba): pa'i tshogs yin no//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/btsun pa 'di ltar yang dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa'i
356a2('dul ba): dge slong rnams kyis dge slong 'thab krol bgyid pa 'tshang 'bru bar bgyid pa rtsod par bgyid pa 'gyed par bgyid pa/rtsod pa'i gzhi bgyid pa dag mchi'o zhes thos te/de dag ngo
356a3('dul ba): tsha ma mchis pas tho btsam pa nyid du bdag cag la gleng bar bgyi/dran par bgyid do snyam na de rnams kyis de dag la ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/nye bar 'khor dge slong rnams kyis
356a4('dul ba): gso sbyong gi las gnyis sam gsum 'das par byas nas/dgag dbye bya'o//gal te de ltar grub na legs gal te ma grub na dge slong rnams kyis gnod pa'i tshad kyi dkyil
356a5('dul ba): 'khor gnyis sam/gsum khas blang bar bya'o//gal te de ltar grub na legs/gal te ma grub na dge slong de rnams kyis bshes pa'i tshig gis bsu bar bya/lhung bzed
356a6('dul ba): dang chos gos blang bar bya ste/lhung bzed dang /chos gos dag gis mgu zhing rab tu mgu bar byas la/dgag dbye bya'o//gal te de ltar grub na legs/gal te ma grub na
356a7('dul ba): khrus bya ste/khrus bya bas mgu zhing rab tu mgu bar byas la dgag dbye bya'o//gal te de ltar grub na legs/gal te ma grub na chos bsgrags par bya ste/chos bsgrags pas
356b1('dul ba): mgu zhing rab tu mgu bar byas la dgag dbye bya'o//gal te de ltar grub na legs/gal te ma grub na nye bar 'khor dge slong de dag dkyil 'khor gyi nang du dong la gso sbyong bya'o//gal
356b2('dul ba): te de dag 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag deng dge 'dun gyi dgag dbye bco lnga pa yin na/khyed cag ci'i phyir/gso sbyong byed ces zer na/de dag la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste/
356b3('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa khyed cag ni glo bur du 'ongs pa yin la/don 'di ni gau nyug mar gnas pa'i dge slong rnams kyi'o zhes smros shig/de nas de dag 'di snyam du tshe dang ldan pa 'di dag ni des
356b4('dul ba): par zla ba bzhi pa'i dgag dbye byed snyam du sems pa dang /de'i 'og tu 'jigs pa dang bral zhing phas kyi rgol ba dang brel nas slar yang dgag dbye bya'o//'di ltar yang dgag dbye
356b5('dul ba): bco lnga pa de nyid la/nad pa so mo nI ba'i dgag dbye 'jig na nad pa la 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa khyod ni nad pa ste/skyar mi bzod kyis 'dug shig ces brjod par bya'o//'di ltar yang
356b6('dul ba): dgag dbye bco lnga pa de nyid la/mi na bas nad pa'i dgrag dbye 'jog na mi na ba la 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa de ni nang po ste/sbyor mi bzod kyis khyod tshur zhes brjod par bya'o//'di ltar
356b7('dul ba): yang dgag dbye bco lnga pa de nyid la/nad pas mi na ba'i dgag dbye pho nya btang ste 'jog na pho nya la 'di skad ces/tshe dang ldan pa de ni na bas sbyor mi bzod kyis khyod 'dug cig ces brjod
357a1('dul ba): par bya'o//'di ltar yang dgag dbye bcoM lnga pa de nyid la mi na bas nud pa'i dgag dbye bo nya btang ste 'jog na/pho nya la 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa de ni na ngas sbyor
357a2('dul ba): mi bzod kyis/khyod tshur zhes brjod par bya'o//'di ltar yang dgag dbye bco lnga pa de nyid la/dngos po shes la gang zag ma yin pa dang /gang zag shes la dngos po ma yin pa
357a3('dul ba): dang /gang zag dang /dngos po shis pa dang /gang zag dang /dngos po mi shes pa ste/dngos po shes la gang zag ma yin pa ji lta bu zhe na/'di ltar yang dgag dbye bco lnga
357a4('dul ba): pa de nyid la/rgan zhugs mi shes pa rmongs pa mi gsal ba mi mkhas pa gzhan zhig gis spyod yul lam/spyod yul gyis lam kar rigs kyi bud med dam/rigs kyi ni
357a5('dul ba): chung la khros sam/tshig ngan smras sam/reg par gyur pas mi rnams khros te/kun dga' ra ba'i sgor 'ongs nas/'di skad ces 'phags pa 'di dag ni mi mdzes pa ma rtags
357a6('dul ba): pa yin te/'phags pa dag gis nyes pa 'di dang 'di dag byas zhes smras kyi che ge mo zhig gis zhes de skad du ma smras pa ste/de lta bu'i ni dngos po shes la gang zag ma yin zhes
357a7('dul ba): bya'o//gang zag shes la dngos po ma yin pa ji lta bu zhe ni/'di ltar yang dgag dbye bco lnga pa de nyid la zhes bya ba nas/kun dga' ra ba'i sgor 'ongs nas 'di skad ces
357b1('dul ba): gas da ma sa sa ma rgyugs pasgos ma ldas te 'di ltar 'a gas phyi / bya sa pa sa shos smras kyis/'duskad du 'du dang 'di dag rgyab
357b2('dul ba): zhes ni ma smos pa ste/de lta bu ni gang zag shes la dngos po ma yin pa'o//gang zag dang dngos po shes pa ji lta bu zhe na/'di ltar yang dgag dbye bco lnga pa de nyid la zhes bya ba
357b3('dul ba): nas/kun+da dga' ra ba'i sgrar 'ongs nas/'di skad ces 'phags pa 'di dag ni mi mdzes pa ma brtags pa zhes de'i bar snga ma bzhin te/'phags pa che ge mo zhes bya ngas nyos pa
357b4('dul ba): 'di dang 'di dag byaso zhes smras pa ste/de lta bu ni gang zag dang /dngos po shes pa yin no//gang zag dang dngos po mi shes pa ji lta bu zhe na/rnam pa 'di dag ma brtogs pa'o//
357b5('dul ba): dgag dbye gzhi rdzog sa//dbyar sti gzhi bsdus pa'i sdom la/dbyar gnas pa dang zla dang ni//dbyar ral ba dang lnga po dang //smig dang 'o ma rtsa mchil lham//
357b6('dul ba): dbyar dang ko lpags gzhi dag go/sdom la/dbyar gnas rje su gnang ba dang //'char kar 'gro ba dag dang ni//bya ba la ni zhag bdun dang //'gro byi ci zhig bya ba'o//sangs rgyas
357b7('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra bar dbyar bzhugs por zhal gyis bzhis//de'i tshe dge slong dag dbyar gyi nang logs su
358a1('dul ba): ljongs rgyu zhing dong ngo //de dag dbyar gyi nang log su ljongs rgyu zhing dong ba dag mi sbed cing ma bsrungs la ma smras par gyur pa dag la/mu stegs can rnams shes
358a2('dul ba): ldan dag/shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong 'di dag ni srog gcod pa yin te/srog gcod pa las ma log pa rnam par ma log phyir ma log pa 'di dag dbyar gyi nang logasu ljongs rgya zhing
358a3('dul ba): 'dong ste/dbyer gyi nang log suM ljongs rgyu zhing /'dong ba na/srog chags phra mo dang /shin tu phra mo mang po'i tshogs rnams brdzis nas srog dang bral bar byaso//ra zhig byi'u khug
358a4('dul ba): rta yang dbyar zla ba bzhi rang gi tshang na zhum zhum por byas/kun tu zhum zhum por byas nas bskums shing bskums nas 'dug ni/dge sbyong mgo reg 'di dag ni sa len po tsam
358a5('dul ba): yang mi shes na/dge sbyong mgo reg 'di dag la bsod snyoms sbyin pa dang /de la bya bar sems pa lta su zhig yod ces smod par byed 'phya bar byed kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs
358a6('dul ba): de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/de lta bas na rje su gnang ste/dge slong gis dbyar gnas par dam bca'
358a7('dul ba): bar bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis dbyar gnas par dam bca' bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa/dge slong rnams kyis ji ltar gnas par dam bcas pa ma shes nas/
358b1('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/de nyid kyi dbyur zla 'bring ngo'i chos bco lnga la gtsug lag khang rgyug chag bya'o//phyag dar bya'o//ba'i lci ba sar pa'i byug pas byug par bya'o//
358b2('dul ba): gnas mel thams cad gcig tu bsogs par bya ste/chung ngu na rkang pa bkrus pa'i tshil zangs kyang mi sba'o//de'i 'og tu gnas ma la stobs pa'i dge slong bsgo bar bya ste/chos
358b3('dul ba): dang ldan pa'i dge slong gnas mal stobs par ma skos pa ni bsko bar mi bya'o//bskos pa ni dbyung bar bya'o//lnga gang zhe na/'dun pas 'gro ba dang /zhe sdang gris 'gro ba dang /gti
358b4('dul ba): mug gos 'gro ba dang /'jigs pas 'gro ba dang /gnas mal bstabs pa dang /ma bstangs pa mi shes pa ste/chos 'di lnga dang ldan pa'i dge slong gnas mal stobs par ma
358b5('dul ba): bskos pa ni bsko bar mi bya'o//bskos pa ni dbyung bar bya'o//chos lnga dang ldan pa'i dge slong gnas mal stobs par ma sgos pa ni bsko bar bya'o//bskos pa ni dbyung bar mi bya'o//lnga
358b6('dul ba): gang zhe na/'dun pas mi 'gro ba dang /zhe sdang gis mi 'gro ba dang /gti mug gis mi 'gro ba dang /'jigs pas mi 'gro ba dang /gnas mal bstabs pa dang /ma bstabs pa
358b7('dul ba): shes pa ste/chos 'di lnga dang ldan pa'i dge slong gnas mal stobs par bskos pa ni bsgo bar bya'o//bskos pa ni dbyung bar mi bya'o//bsko ba ni 'di ltar bya ste/gnas mal bshas
359a1('dul ba): pa byas la/gaN+DI brdungs te/dge slong rnams la dris pa'i lan gyis yang dag par bsgo la/dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing 'thun par gyur pa dang /ro zhig dang por spro
359a2('dul ba): par bya ste/ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod dge 'dun la dbyar gyi gnas mal stobs par spro 'am/des spyi'o//zhes brjod par bya'o//de'i 'og tu dge slong cig gis gsol ba byas
359a3('dul ba): las bya'o//dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/gnas mal stobs pa'i dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun la dbyar gyi gnas mal stobs par spro no/gal
359a4('dul ba): te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na/dge 'dun gyis gnang ba mdzod cig dang /dge 'dun gyis ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun la gnas mal stobs par bsgo ste/gnas
359a5('dul ba): mal stobs pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun la dbyar gyi gnas mal stobaso//'di ni gsol ba'o//las ni 'di ltar bya ste/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/gnas
359a6('dul ba): mal stobs pa dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun la dbyar gyi gnas mal stobs par spro na/ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun la gnas mul stobs par bsgo ste/gnas
359a7('dul ba): mal stobs pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun la dbyar gyi gnas mal stobs par bgyid kyis/tshe dang ldan pa dag las gang dag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba gnas mal stobs
359b1('dul ba): par bsko bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung zhig/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig/dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyis
359b2('dul ba): pa dge 'dun la gnas mal stobs par bskos lags te 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to//ngas gnas mal stobs pa'i dge slong gi kun tu spyod pa'i chos bca'
359b3('dul ba): bar bya ste/gnas yal stobs pa'i dge slong gis dge 'dun gyi ched du tshul shing rnams yin pa ma yin pa dang /'khyor po ma yin pa dang /kyar kyor ma yin pa dang /dri zhim po dang /
359b4('dul ba): reg ni bde bar 'gyur ba bsten par bya'o//de'i 'og tu nang par sngar langs te gnas mal bsham pa byas la/gaN+DI brdungs nas/dge slong rnams la dris pa'i lan gyis yang dag
359b5('dul ba): par bsgo la/dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing 'thun par gyur pa dang /dge slong gnas mal stobs pas tshul shing dri zhim pos bskus te/sgrog ma'i nang du ras dkar po bting ba'i
359b6('dul ba): steng du bzhag nas rgan rims kyi mthar bzhag par bya'o//de'i 'og tu khrimasu bca' ba dag brjod par bya ste/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/gnas 'dir khrimasu
359b7('dul ba): bca' ba 'di dang 'di dag mchis kyis/tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed cag las gang khrimasu bca' ba 'di dang 'dis dbyar gnas par dam bca' bar skyo ba de ni tshul shing longs shig/khyed
360a1('dul ba): cag las dge slong sus kyang dbyar gyi nang log su dge slong la glong bar mi bya/dran par mi bya'o//khyod cag lasu yang rlung ba 'ga' zhig gis chung zad shes na/
360a2('dul ba): de spros shig/phyis 'byur gyi nang legasum gleng sh+log/khyed cag lasu dbyar gyi nang logasu gleng bar gyur na/de dge 'dun gyis phyis brtags par dgongaso//de'i
360a3('dul ba): 'og tu gnas mal stobs pa'i dge slong gis tshul shing brim par bya ste/jo thog mar ston pa'i tshul shing blang bar bya'o//de'i 'og tu dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis stan
360a4('dul ba): gyi steng nas spags te/tshul shing blangs la dal gyis bzhag par bya ste/dge 'dun gser bu rnams kyi bar du yang de bzhin du bya'o//dge tshul rnams kyis tshul shing
360a5('dul ba): ni slob dpon 'am mkhan pos blang bar bya'o//de'i 'og tu gnas bsrung rnams kyis yang blang bar bya'o//de'i 'og tu bgrangs te/gnas 'dir dge slong 'di snyed cig gis
360a6('dul ba): tshul shing blangaso zhes smros shig/de'i 'og tu gnas mal stobs pa'i dge slong gis lde mig dang lde mig khyog po dag blangs la dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyi mdun du 'dug
360a7('dul ba): ste/gnas brtan gnas khang che ge mo ni rnyed pa dang bcas pa gos dang bcas pa lags kyis/bzhis shog ces brjod par bya'o//gal te des blangs na/dge 'dun gyi
360b1('dul ba): gnas brtan gyis gnas khang gang yin pa de gnas brtan gnyis pa la sbyin par bya'o//gnas brtan gnyis pa'i gnas khang gang yin pa de gnas brtan gsum pa la sbyin par bya ste/
360b2('dul ba): dge 'dun gsar bu'i bar gyi yang de bzhin du bya'o//gal te dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis ma blangs na/gnas brtan gnyis pa la sbyin par bya'o//gal te gnas brtan gnyis
360b3('dul ba): byas ma blangs na/gnas brtan gsum pa la sbyin par bya'o//gal te gnas brtan gsum pas blangs pa la/dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan slong na tshig dang po la sbyin par mi bya'o//
360b4('dul ba): tshig gnyis pa la sbyin par mi bya'o//tshig gsum pa la sbyin par bya ste/dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis 'dul ba dang 'gal ba'i nyes byas kyi ltung ba bshags par bya'o//
360b5('dul ba): dge 'dun gsar bu'i bar du de bzhin du blangs pa la gal te/dge 'dun gsar bu gsum pa slong na/tshig drang po la sbyin par mi bya'o//tshig gnyis pa la yang sbyin par mi bya'o//
360b6('dul ba): tshig gsum pa la sbyin par bya ste/dge 'dun gsar bu gsum pas kyang 'dul ba dang 'gal ba'i nyes byas kyi ltung ba bshags par bya'o//dge slong rnams kyis gnas khang tha~Md
360b7('dul ba): bgos pa dang /glo bur du lhogs pa'i dge slong rnams phangs par gyur nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/glo bur du lhags pa'i dge slong rnams kyi phyir ma bgos
361a1('dul ba): pa'i gnas gcig gzhag par bya'o//dge slong rnams kyis sgo khang yang bgos pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/sgo khang bgo bar ma
361a2('dul ba): bya'o//khyams rnams bgos pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/khyams bgo bar mi bya'o//khyams stong pa rnam su khra dang /byi'u dang /phug ron dag gis
361a3('dul ba): tshong bca' ba dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/skrod pa'i dge slong dag bsko bar bya ste/des so sor blta bar bya'o//gal te sgo nga dag ma lhags par gyur na/
361a4('dul ba): bskrad par bya'o//de ste lhags na ni gzhag par bya'o//srin bu tre'i bu ka dang /trai'i la tA'i tshong bcas nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/so sor brtags par
361a5('dul ba): bya ste/gal te sgo nga ma lhags par gyur na bskyed par bya'o//gal te lhags par gyur na skud pas bcings na/'phel bar mi 'gyuraro//de nas gnas mal bsko bar bya ste/
361a6('dul ba): 'di ltar re zhig dngos po nyung zhig yin na/re re sbyin par bya'o//'on te mang po zhig yin na gnyis gnyis gsum gsum sbyin par bya'o//dngos po kha cig chen por gyur pas//
361a7('dul ba): dge slong rgan rabs rgan rabs dag byi dor byed pos dub tsong /ngal bar gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/de dag gnas 'cha' ba rnams la sbyin par bya'o//
361b1('dul ba): g+hA d+hA gnas mal stobs du'i dge slong gis khrims bcu ba dag brjod par byaste/dge slong smras dag 'dun hU~M gnas N+Dal la gdad ba me par 'das spung b+hU me d+hAr+dz+dza/
361b2('dul ba): ming thogs kyi gding bas ma yin/gding ba dri ma can gyis ma yin/skyeng bas ma min//stug pa yon na rim po gcig giso//snang ba yin na rim pa gnyis kyis//khyed lus
361b3('dul ba): gang gis dge 'dun gyis gnas mal longs spyad par bya ba ma yin par longs spyod na/de la dge 'dun gyis phyis brtag par bya bar dgongaso//gnas mal stobs pa'i dge slong gis
361b4('dul ba): zla ba phyed phyed cing gnas mal la so sor brtag par bya'o//'di ltar re zhig rgan po dag gis gnas mal longs spyod par bya ba ma yin par longs spyod pa mthong na/dge 'dun la
361b5('dul ba): gsol nas sba bar bya'o//'on te gsar bu zhig mngon mkhan po'am/slob dpon la brjod de sba bar bya'o//de'i 'og tu tshogs nas sbyin bdag cho ga mo zhes bgyi ba dang zhal ta
361b6('dul ba): bgyid pa che ge mo zhes dgye ba dang /spyod yul gyi grong ga ge mo zhes bgyi bas/dge 'dun dbyar gnas par dam bca' ba mdzad zhes brjod par bya'o//de'i 'og tu dge slong
361b7('dul ba): rnams kyi gnas dang /spyod yul bltos nas skyabs yod par zhugs te/dbyar gnas par dam bca' bar bya'o//gnas ji ltar brtag par bya zhe na/jig bdag la gnas 'dir
362a1('dul ba): tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa mkhas pa dag gis gang sdug bsngal ba dang /yid mi bde ba ma skyes pa mi skyed par 'gyur zhing /skyes pa yang myur ba kho nar
362a2('dul ba): so sor zhi bar byed par 'gyur la/gang bde ba dang /yid bde ba ma skyes pa skyed par 'gyur zhing /skyes pa yang legs por rab tu rje su srung bar sems dang /bdag na bar
362a3('dul ba): gyur na/nad g.yog byed par 'gyur ba lta yod dam zhes/de ltar gnos la rtogs par bya'o//spyod yul la ji ltar brtag par bya zhe na/ji ga spyod yul gyi grong 'di na bsod
362a4('dul ba): snyoms ster ba dang /na bar gyur na nad g.yog dang /sman sbyin par gyur pa lta yod dam/zhes de ltar spyod yul la brtag par bya'o//de'i 'og tu skyabs yod par zhugs
362a5('dul ba): la/dge slong rgan rims ji lta ba bzhin gyi mdun du 'dud pa dang bcas pas tsog tsog por 'dug la thal mo sbyar te/'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dgongasu gsol/deng dge
362a6('dul ba): 'dun gyi dbyar nye bar bsgrub pa dbyar zla 'bring por tshes bcu drug lags la/bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba'i dbyar nye bar bsgrub pa yang dbyar zla 'bring po tshes bcu
362a7('dul ba): drug legs te/bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba nang mtshams dang bcas pa'i gnas 'dir ral ba dang /'drums pa btsos pa'i slad du/sbyin bdag che ge mo zhes bgyi ba
362b1('dul ba): dang /zhal ta byed pa che ge mo zhes bgyi ba dang /spyod yul gyi grong ga ge mo zhes bgyi bar dbyar snga ma zla ba gsum gnas par dam bca'o//bdag dbyar 'di na mchis shing dbyar gyi
362b2('dul ba): gnas ni 'di lag so zhes de skad lan gnyis de skad lan gsum du bzlas tAM/de ltar dge slong rnams kyis dbyar gnas par dam bca' bar bya'o//dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa'i
362b3('dul ba): dge slong gis mtshams kyi phyi rol tu 'gro bar mi bya'o//gal te song na der gnas par mi bya'i//bcom ldan 'das kyis dbyar gnas por dam bcas pa'i dge slong gis mtshams
362b4('dul ba): kyi phyir du 'gro bar mi bya'o//gal te song na der gnas par mi bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang /glang po che skyong ba zhes bya ba'i grong na khyim bdag 'char ka zhes bya ba gnas te/de'i
362b5('dul ba): khyim na rang gi 'ching ba bag ma blangs nas des gos kyi rnyed pa dang zas kyi rnyed pa mang du sta gon byas te/des dge slong rnams la pho nyo btang nas/'phags pa dog longs spyad pa dag
362b6('dul ba): dbul gyis tshur spyon cig ces spring ba dang /dge slong rnams kyis dri bar brnams te/glang po che skyong ba'i grong du ji srid yod/der ni dpag tshad gsum lhag tsam mchis//bdag
362b7('dul ba): cag gis deng nyid dang la slar 'khor bar nus sam mi nus snyam pa las/de dag gis bsams pa/bcom ldan 'das kyis dbar gnas par dam bcas pa'i dge slong gis
363a1('dul ba): rdzu mtshams kyi phyi rol tu 'gro bar mi bya'o//gal te song na der gnas par mi bya'o zhes gsung so snyam nas/de rnams ma song ngo //de nas glang po che skyong bar
363a2('dul ba): grong gi nyen 'khor du dge slong gang dag dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa/de dag la des gos kyi rnyed pa dang zas kyi rnyed pa mang du phulo//de dag dbyar zla ba gsum 'das te/
363a3('dul ba): chos gos byas pa dang ldan/chos gos zin pa dang ldan nas lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te/mnyan yod gang na ba der rgyu zhing dong nas rim gyis rgyu zhing dong ba na/mnyan
363a4('dul ba): yod na phyin to//de dag dge slong rnams kyis rgyang ring po kho na nas mthong nas tshe dang ldan pa dag 'ongs pa leg so 'ongs pa legaso zhes ngal sor bcug nas smras pa/tshe dang
363a5('dul ba): ldan pa dag khyed gang nas da 'dir 'ongs/gang du dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa/tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag cag ni glang po che skyong ba'i grong nas da bzod 'dir 'ongs te/glang po
363a6('dul ba): che skyong ba'i grong du dbyar gnas par dam bcaso//tshe dang ldan pa dag ji ga khyed cag glang po che skyong ba'i grong du bde ba la reg por dbyar gnas par dam bcas sam/de na khyed
363a7('dul ba): bsod snyoms kyis bral bar ma gyur mod/tshe dang ldan pa dag bden te/bdag cag glang po che skyong ba'i grong du bde ba la reg par dbyar gnas par dam bcas shing bsod
363b1('dul ba): snyoms kyis kyang brel bar ma gyur to//tshe dang ldan pa dag ji lta bu zhig tu khyed cag glang po che skyong ba'i grong du bde ba la reg par dbyar gnas par dam bcas shing bsod snyoms kyis kyang //
363b2('dul ba): mi brel/tshe dang ldan pa dag glang po che skyong ba'i grong de na khyim bdag 'char ka zhes bya ba zhig gnas te de'i khyim na rang gi 'ching ba bag ma blangs nas/bdag cag la des gos kyi
363b3('dul ba): rnyed pa dang /zas kyi rnyed pa mang du phul te/de ltar na tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag cag glang po che skyong ba'i grong du bde ba la reg par dbyar gnas par dam bcas te/bsod snyoms
363b4('dul ba): kyis kyang brel bar ma gyur to//de dag gis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa bdag cag la yang khyim bdag des pho nya btang nas/'phags pa dag longs spyad pa dag 'bul gyis/'dir
363b5('dul ba): spyon cig ces spring ba las de las/de la bdag cag gis glang po che skyong ba'i grong du ji srid yod ces rmas na/der dpag tshad gsum lhag tsam yod zhes zer nas bdag cag gis
363b6('dul ba): blo skyes pa/bcom ldan 'das kyis dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa'i dge slong gis mtshams kyi phyi rol tu 'gro bar mi bya'o//gal te song na der gnas par mi bya'o zhes gsung so snyam
363b7('dul ba): nas bdag cag ma dong ngo //skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/kye ma nga'i nyan thos rnams ni gos kyi
364a1('dul ba): rnyed pa dang zas kyi rnyed pa dag 'dod kyis/mA la ngas dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bya ba'i phyir dang /spyan bdag gis sbyin pa'i chos yongasu spyad par
364a2('dul ba): bya ba'i phyir zhag bdun rjesu gnang bar bya ste/de lta bas na rjesu gnang ste bya ba'i phyir/zhag bdun byin gyis brlabs la 'gro bar bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bya ba'i phyir/
364a3('dul ba): zhog 'dun byin gyis brlabs te 'gro bor bya'o zhes gsungs pa dge slong dag gis gang gi bya ba'i phyir ma shes pa'i sgrubs de/dge sbyong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsal
364a4('dul ba): pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsol pa/dge bsnyen gyi bya ba dang /dge bsnyen mo'i bya ba dang /dge sbyong gi bya ba dang dge slong ma'i bya ba dang /dge tshul gyi bya ba dang /
364a5('dul ba): dge tshul ma'i bya ba'i phyir ro//dge bsnyen gyi bya ba gang zhe na/'di ltar yang dge bsnyen gyis khyim du rang gi 'ching ba bag ma blangs te/des der gos kyi rnyed pa dang /zas
364a6('dul ba): kyi rnyed du mang du stugano byas nas/des dge sbyong rnams la po nya btang ste/'phags pa dag longs spyod pa dag 'dul gyis tshur skyon cig ces spring na/zhag bdun byin gyis brla
364a7('dul ba): nas dge bsnyen gyi bya ba'i phyir dge slong 'gro ngar bya ste/'di ni dge 'asnyen gyis bya ba min//gnodi yang dge basbyin gyi bya ba 'di ste ste/dge sbyin gyis phyogs pa ni'i dge slong/
364b1('dul ba): gi dge 'dun gyi phyir gtsug lag khang brtsigs par 'dod nas/des der gos kyi rnyed pa dang zas kyi rnyed pa mang du sta gon byas te/des dge slong dag la pho nya btang nas 'phags pa
364b2('dul ba): dag longs spyad po dbul gyis tshur spyon cig ces spring na/zhag bdun byin gyis brlabs la/dge bsnyen gyi bya ba'i phyir/dge slong 'gro bar bya ste/'di ni dge bsnyen gyi bya ba yino///
364b3('dul ba): gzhan yang dge bsnyen gyi bya ba 'di lta ste/dge bsnyen gyis gtsug lag khang de nyid du gnas mal dbul por 'dod par gyur nas des der gos kyi rnyed pa dang /zas kyi rnyed pa mang
364b4('dul ba): du sta gon byas te/des dge slong rnams la pho nya btang nas 'phags pa dag longs spyod pa dag dbul gyis/chu rdzun spyon cig ces spring na/zhag bdun byin gyis rlabs la dge bsnyen gyi
364b5('dul ba): bya ba'i dge slong 'gro bar bya ste/'di ni dge bsnyen gyi bya ba yino//gzhan yang dge bsnyen gyi bya ba 'di lta ste/dgo bsnyen gyi gtsug lag khang de nyid du 'thun pa'i mchod sbyin brtan po
364b6('dul ba): bca' bar 'dod nas/des der gos kyi rnyed pa dang /zas kyi rnyed pa mang du sta gon byas te/des dge slong rnams la pha nya btang nas 'phags pa dag longs spyod pa dag dbul gyis tshur
364b7('dul ba): sbron cig ces spring na/zhag bdun byin gyis brlabs la dge bsnyen gyi bya ba'i phyir dge slong 'gro bar bya ste/'di na dge bsnyen gyi bya ba yino//gzhan yang dge bsnyen gyi bya ba 'di
365a1('dul ba): lta ste/dge bsnyen gyis gtsug lag khang de nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gis mchod rten brtsig par 'dod nas/des dge slong rnams la po nya btang /
365a2('dul ba): ste/'chags pa dag pa tshur spyon cig/chos kyi grogs mdzod cig ces spring na/zhag bdun byin gyis brlabs la/dge bsnyen gyi bya ba'i phyir dge slong 'gro bar bya ste/
365a3('dul ba): 'di ni dge bsnyen gyi bya ba yin//gzhan yang dge bsnyen gyi bya ba 'di lta ste/dge bsnyen gyis mchod rten de nyid la srog shing gzugs pa dang /gdugs gdags pa dang
365a4('dul ba): rgyal mtshan gzugs pa dang /'phan gdags pa dang /dri sna tshogs kyis byug pa dang /tsan dan gyis bsku ba dang /gur gum gyi byugs pa dag dbul bar 'dod nas/des
365a5('dul ba): dge slong rnams la pho nya btang ste/'phags pa dag tshur spyon cig/bdag gi chos kyi grogs mdzod cig ces spring na/zhag bdun byin gyis brlabs la/dge bsnyen gyi bya
365a6('dul ba): ba'i phyir dge slong 'gro bar bya ste/'di ni dge bsnyen gyi bya bo yin no//gzhan yang dge bsnyen gyi bya ba 'di lta ste/dge bsnyen gyi mdo sde ris bzhi las mdo sde'i rigs gang yang
365a7('dul ba): rung po zhig rgyas par blags sam bton par gyur nas/des der gos kyi rnyed pa dang /zas kyi snyed pa mang du sta gon byas te/dge slong dag la pho nya btang nas/'phags pa dag
365b1('dul ba): longs spyod pa dag dbul gyis tshur spyon cig ces spring na/zhag bdun byin gyis brlabs la/dge bsnyen gyi bya ba'i phyir/dge slong 'gro bar bya ste/'di ni dge bsnyen gyi bya ba yin//
365b2('dul ba): gzhan yang dge bsnyen gyi bya ba 'di lta ste/dge bsnyen zhig 'gyod pa skyes par gyur nas/des dge slong rnams la pho nya btang ste/'phags pa dag 'gyod pa skyes pa so sor bsal
365b3('dul ba): gyis tshur sbron cig ces spring na/zhag bdun byin gyis brlabs la/dge bsnyen gyi bya ba'i phyir dge slong 'gro bar bya ste/'di ni dge bsnyen gyi bya ba yino//gzhan yang dge
365b4('dul ba): bsnyen gyi bya ba 'di lta ste/dge bsnyen zhig sdig pa can gyi lta bar song ba skyes par gyur nas des dge slong dag la pho nya btang ste/'phags po dag sdig pa can gyi lta bar spong
365b5('dul ba): ba skyes pa de so sor bsal gyis tshur spyon cig ces spring na/zhig bdun byin gyis brlabs la/dge bsnyen gyi bya ba'i phyir/dge slong 'gro bar bya ste/'di ni dge bsnyen gyi bya ba yino//
365b6('dul ba): gzhan yang dge bsnyen gyi bya ba 'di lta ste/dge 'dun gyis dge bsnyen la lhung bzed khas dbub par 'dod par gyur pa dang /des dge slong dag la pho nya btang ste/'phags pa
365b7('dul ba): dag chos dang 'thun pa'i phyogs sten par bgyid kyis tshur spyon cig ces spring na/zhag bdun byin gyis brlabs la dge 'dun gyi bya ba'i phyir dge slong 'gro bar bya ste/'di ni
366a1('dul ba): dge bsnyen gyi bya ba yin//kuzhan yang dge bsnyen gyi bya ba 'di lta ste/dge 'dun gyi dge bsnyen la lhung bzed khas dbub par gyur pa dang /des dge slong
366a2('dul ba): rnams la pho nya btang ste/'phags pa dag lhung bzed khas phub pa btang bar gsol/tshur spyon cig ces spring na/zhag bdun byin gyis brlabs la/dge bsnyen gyi bya ba'i
366a3('dul ba): phyir dge slong 'gro bar bya ste/'di ni dge bsnyen gyi bya ba yin no//gzhan yang dge bsnyen gyi bya ba 'di lta ste/dge bsnyen na ba~M sdug bsngal ba nad tshabs che bar gyur nas/
366a4('dul ba): des dge slong rnams la pho nya btang ste/'phags po dag tshur spyon cig 'ga' stsol ces spring ni/zhag bdun byin gyis brlabs la/dge bsnyen gyi bya ba'i phyir dge slong 'gro
366a5('dul ba): bar bya ste/'di ni dge bsnyen gyi bya ba yino//dge bsnyen ma'i bya ba gang zhe na/de dag thams cad dge bsnyen mi'i bya ba yin te/rang gi 'ching ba bgo ma len pa ni ma gtogaso///
366a6('dul ba): dge slong gi bya ba gang zhe na/'di lta ste/dge slong zhig gis phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la kun dga' ra ba dbul bar 'dod nas/des der gos kyi rnyed pa dang /zas
366a7('dul ba): kyi rnyed pa mang du sta gon byas na/des dge slong rnams la pho nya btang ste/tshe dang ldan pa dag longs spyad pa dgra 'bul gyis tshur spyon cig ces spring na/zhag bdun byin gyis
366b1('dul ba): brlabs la dge slong gi bya ba'i phyir dge slong 'gro bar bya ste/'di ni dge slong gi bya ba yino//gzhan yang dge slong gi bya ba 'di lta ste/dge slong gis kun dga' ra ba de nyid du gtsug
366b2('dul ba): lag khang dang /gnas mal dang /'tshe ba brtan po dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gi mchod rten la dri sna tshogs kyi byug pa dang /tsan dan gyi byug pa dang /srog shing gzugs
366b3('dul ba): pa dang /rgyal mtshan gzugs pa dang /mdo sde'i ris bzhi las mdo sde'i ris glang yang rung ba dang /'gyod pa dang //sdig pa'i lta bar song ba skyes nas/des dge slong rnams la ponya
366b4('dul ba): btang ste/tshe dang ldan pa dag sdig pa'i lta bar song ba skyes pa so sor bsal gyis tshur spyon cig ces spring na/zhag bdun byin gyis brlabs la dge slong gi bya ba'i phyir dge slong 'gro
366b5('dul ba): bar+ya byA ste/'di ni dge slong gi bye ba yin te/thams cad gong ma bzhin du rgyus par brjod par bya'o//gzhan yang dge slong gi bya ba 'di lta ste/dge 'dun gyis dge slong zhig la chang
366b6('dul ba): pa'i las 'di lta ste/bsdigs pa'i lhas sam/snang ba'i las sam/bskrad pa'am/phyir 'gyed pa 'am/mi snang bar gnas nas dbyung ba 'am/phyir mi mchis pa gnas nas
366b7('dul ba): dbyung ba 'am/sdig pa'i lta bar sang ba ma btang ba gnas nas dbyung ba'i las de lto bu bya bar 'dod par gyur pa dang /des dge slong rnams lo pa nya btang ste/tshe dang ldan
367a1('dul ba): pa dag chos dang 'thun pa'i phyogs dang 'thun pa'i bgyid par 'gyur gyis tshur spyon cig ces spring na/zhag bdun byin gyis brlabs la/dge slong gi bya bar
367a2('dul ba): phyir/dge slong 'gro bar bya ste/'di ni dge slong gi bya ba yin//gzhan yang dge slong gi bya ba 'od lta ste/dge 'dun gyis dge slong gi chud nga'i las 'di lta ste/brtsigs
367a3('dul ba): pa'i las sam/smad pa'i las sam/bskrad pa'i las sam/phyir 'gyed pa'i las sam/mi snang bar gnas nas dbyung ba 'am/phyir mi 'chos pa gnas nas dbyung ba
367a4('dul ba): 'am/sdig pa'i lta bar song ba gnas nas dbyung ba'i las de ltar byas pa dang des dge slong rnams la pho nya btang ste/tshe dang ldan pa dag 'byin par 'gyur gyis/tshur sbyin
367a5('dul ba): cig ces spring na/zhag bdun byin gyis brlabs la dge slong gi bya ba'i phyir dge slong 'gro bar bya ste/'di ni dge slong gi bya ba yino//gzhan yang dge slong gi bya ba 'di lta ste/
367a6('dul ba): dge slong zhig la dge 'dun gyi lkog ma'i ltung ba byung bar gyur nas/des dge slong rnams la pho nya btang ste/tshe dang ldan po dag tshur spyon spo ba stsal du gsol/zhes spring na/
367a7('dul ba): zhag bdun byin gyis brlabs la/dge slong gi bya ba'i phyir dge slong 'gro bar bya ste/'di ni dge slong gi bya ba yino//gzhan yang dge slong gi bya ba 'di lta ste/dge slong
367b1('dul ba): gi spo ba rdzogs nas des dge slong rnams la pho nya btang ste/tshe dang ldan pa dag tshur spyon/mgu bar bgyi ba stsal du gsol zhes sprid na/zhag bdun byin gyis brlabs te/dge slong 'gro
367b2('dul ba): bar bya ba'i phyir dge slong 'gro bar bya ste/'di ni dge slong gi bya ba yin no//gzhan yang dge slong gi bya ba 'di lta ste/dge slong gis mgu bar bya ba spyad nas/des dge slong rnams la pho
367b3('dul ba): nya bting ste/tshe dang ldan pa dag tshur spyon/dbyung bar bgyir gsol zhes spring na/zhag bdun byin gyis brlabs te/dge slong gi bya ba'i phyir dge slong 'gro bar bya ste/'di ni dge
367b4('dul ba): slong gi bya ba yin no//gzhan yang dge slong gi bya ba 'di lta ste/dge slong na sdug bsngal ba nad tshobs che ba zhig gis dge slong rnams la pho nya btang ste/tshe dang ldan pa dag tshur spyon cig
367b5('dul ba): 'ga' stsol cig ces spring na/zhag bdun byin gyis brlabs la/dge slong gi bya ba'i phyir dge slong 'gro bar bya ste/'di ni dge slong gi bya ba yino//dge slong ma'i bya ba gang zhe na/
367b6('dul ba): dag thams cad dge slong ma'i bya ba yin te/chad pa'i las ni ma gtog so//gzhan yang dge slong ma'i bya ba 'di lta ste/dge slong ma l-i lci ba'i chos kyi ltung bar gyur nas/des dge
367b7('dul ba): slong rnams la pho nya btang ste/'phags pa dag tshur spyon/zla ba phyed kyi bar du mgu bar bgyi ba stsal du gsol zhes spring na/zhag bdun byin gyis brlabs la dge slong ma'i phyir/
368a1('dul ba): dge slong 'gro bar bya ste/'di ni dge slong ma'i bya ba yin no//dge slob ma'i bya ba gang zhe na/de dag thams cad dge slob ma'i bya ba yino//gzhan yang dge slong
368a2('dul ba): ma'i bya ba 'di lta ste/dge slob mas lo gnyis kyi bar du bsab pa'i chos drug dang rje su 'thun pa'i chos drug bslabs nas/des dge slong rnams la pho nya btang ste/'phags pa dag
368a3('dul ba): dge slob ma bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad du gsol/tshur spyon cig ces spring na/zhag bdun byin gyis brlabs la dge slob ma'i bya ba'i phyir/dge slong 'gro bar bya ste/'di ni dge
368a4('dul ba): slob ma'i bya ba yin no//dge tshul gyi bya ba gang zhe na/de dag thams cad dge tshul gyi bya ba yin no//gzhan yang dge tshul gyi bya ba gang zhe na/'di lta ste/dge tshul lo nyi shu
368a5('dul ba): lon par gyur nas/des dge slong rnams la pho nya btang ste/'phags pa dag bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad du gsol/tshur spyon cig ces spring na/zhag bdun byin gyis brlabs
368a6('dul ba): la/dge tshul gyi bya ba'i phyir dge slong 'gro bar bya ste/'di ni dge tshul gyi bya ba yino//dge tshul ma'i bya ba gang zhe na/de dag thams cad dge tshul ma'i bye bo yin no//
368a7('dul ba): gzhan yang dge tshul ma'i bya ba 'di lta ste/dge tshul ma khyim so bzung ba lo bcu gnyis lon pa 'am/gzhon nu ma lo bco brgyad lon nas des dge slong dag la pho nya btang ste/
368b1('dul ba): 'phags pa dag lo gnyis kyi bar du chos drug dang rjesu 'thun pa'i chos drug gi bslab pa stsal du gsol/tshur spyon cig ces spring na/zhag bdun byin gyis brlangs la dge tshul ma'i bya ba
368b2('dul ba): phyir dge slong 'gro bar bya ste/'di ni dge tshul ma'i bye ba yino//sdom la/kha zas sman dang g.yog dang ni//bud med skyes pa ma ning dang //mtshon ma gter dang gnyen dag dang //ba
368b3('dul ba): tshod kyis ni 'gro bya ba'o//'di ltar yang dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa'i dge slong 'di snyam du sems te/gnas 'dir bangag dbyar gnas par dam bcas na/bdag la bsod snyoms
368b4('dul ba): ster ba ni 'ga' yang med/bdag gis bsod snyoms ma rnyed pas bdag nyon mongs pa 'am/shi na bdag gis ma thob pa thob par bya ba dang /ma rtogs pa rtogs par bya ba dang /mngon
368b5('dul ba): sum du ma byas pa mngon sum du bya ba de'i bar chad du 'gyur gyis/ma la bdag gnas 'di nas 'gro'o snyam nas/des de lta bus rkyen byas te/gnas de nas song ba la sa byur ral
368b6('dul ba): na ltung ba med do//'di ltar yong dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa'i dge slong 'di snyam su sems te/gnas 'dir bdag dbyar gnas par dam bcas na/bdag nad kyis thabs
368b7('dul ba): nas na ba la nad kyi sman sbyin pa ni 'ga' yang med de/bdag gis sman ma rnyed pas nyon mongs pa 'am/'di na bdog gis ma thob pa thob par bya ba dang /ma rtogs pa
369a1('dul ba): rtogs par bya ba dang /mngon sum du ma byas pa mngon sum du bya ba de'i bar chad du 'gyur gyis ma la bdag gnas 'di nas 'gro'o snyam nas/des de lta bus rkyen
369a2('dul ba): byas te/gnas de nas song ba las dbyar ral na ltung ba medo//'di ltar yang dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa'i dge slong 'di snyam du sems te/gnas 'dir bdag dbyar
369a3('dul ba): gnas par dam bcas na/bdag nad kyi thebs ni nad g.yog byed pa 'ga' yang med de/bdag la nad g.yog byed pa med pas nyon mongs pa 'am shi na/bdag gis ma thob
369a4('dul ba): pa thob par bya ba dang /ma rtogs pa rtogs par bya ba dang /mngon sum du ma byas pa mngon sum du bya ba de'i bar chad du 'gyur gyis/ma la bdag gnas 'di nas 'gro'o/
369a5('dul ba): snyam nas/des de lta bus rkyen byas te/gnas dri nas song ba las/dbyar ral na ltung ba medado////'dul ba gzhi//bam pa nyi shu pa//'di ltar
369a6('dul ba): yang dbyar gnas par dam bcos pa'i dge slong gi drung du bud med dag 'ongs te/mi mtshams pas gsol ba 'debs te/'phags pa bzhugs shig/'phags pa dgyes
369a7('dul ba): par mdzod cig/khyod la bdag gis bsnyen bkur bgyi'o//khyod la bu mo dbu lo//khyod la mna' ma dang /khyod la dran mo dang las bgyid pa dbulo//de na dbyar gnas
369b1('dul ba): par dam bcas pa'i dge slong 'di snyam du sems te/gnas 'dir bdag dbyar gnas par dam bcas na bud med 'di bdag gi drung du 'ongs nas/mi 'tsham pa'i gsol ba 'debs
369b2('dul ba): te/'phags pa bzhugs shig 'phags pa dgyes pa mdzod cig/khyed la bdag gis bsnyen bkur bgyi'o//khyed la bu mo 'brul//khyod la mna' ma dang /khyod la bran mo dang
369b3('dul ba): las bgyid pa 'bulo zhes zer te/gal te gnas 'dir bdag dbyar gnas na/gzhi des bdag gi srog gi bar chad dang /dge sbyong gi tshul gyi bar chad dang /tshangs par spyod
369b4('dul ba): pa'i bar chad du 'gyur gyis/ma la bdag gnas 'di nas 'gro'o snyam ste/des de lta bus rkyen byas te/gnas de nas song ba las dbyar ral na ltung ba medado//'di ltar yang
369b5('dul ba): dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa'i dge slong gi drung du skyes pa zhig 'ongs nas mi 'tsham pa'i gsol bas gsol ba 'debs te/'phags pa bzhugs shig/'phags pa dgyes
369b6('dul ba): par mdzod cig/khyod la bdag bsnyen bkur bgyi'o//khyod la bu mo dbulo//khyod la mna' ma dang /khyod la bran mo dang las bgyid pa dbulo//de na dbyar gnas par dam
369b7('dul ba): bcas pa'i dge slong 'di snyam du sems te/gnas 'dir bdag dbyar gnas por dam bcas na/bdag gi drung du skyes pa 'di 'ongs nas/mi 'tsham po'i gsol bas gsol
370a1('dul ba): ba 'debs te/'phags pa bzhugs shig/'phags pa dgyes par mdzod cig/khyod la bdag bsnyen bkur dgye'o//khyod la bu mo dbul//mna' ma dang
370a2('dul ba): bran mo dang /las bgyid pa dbu lo zhes zer te/gal te gnas 'dir bdag dbyar gnas na gzhi des bdag gi srog gi bar chad dang /dge sbyong gi tshul gyi bar chad dang /
370a3('dul ba): tshatshongs par spyod pa'i bar chad du 'gyur gyis mya lA gnas 'dri nas 'gror snyam nas/des de lta bus rkyen byas te/gnas de nas song ba las dbyer ral ni ltung ba med//'di ltar
370a4('dul ba): yang dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa'i dge slong gi drung du ma ning zhig 'ongs nas/mi 'tsham po'i gsol bas gsol ba 'debs te/'phags po bzhugs shig/'phags pa
370a5('dul ba): dgyes par mdzod cig/khyod la bdag bsnyen bkur bgyi'o//khyod la bran mo dang las bgyid pa dbulo//de nas dbyar gnas par dam bcas ma'i dge slong 'di snyam du sems
370a6('dul ba): te/gnas 'dir bdag dbyar gnas par dam bcas na/bdag gi drung du ma ning 'di 'ongs nas/mi 'tsham pa'i gsol ngas gsol ba 'debs te 'phags pa bzhugs
370a7('dul ba): shig/'phags par gyis par mdzad cig/khyod la bdag bsnyen dkur 'gyi'o//khyod la bdag bran mo dang /khyod la las bgyid pa dbu'o zhes zer te/gal te gnas
370b1('dul ba): 'dir bdag dbyar gnas na/gzhi des bdag gi srog gi bar chad dang /dge sbyong gi tshul gyi bar chad dang /tshangs par spyod pa'i bar chad du 'gyur gyis/ma la bdag gnas 'di
370b2('dul ba): nas 'gro'o snyam nas des de lta bu'i rkyen byas te/gnas de nas song ba las dbyar ral na ltung ba medo//'di ltar yang dbyor gnas par dam bcas pa'i dge slong gis bud med gzhon
370b3('dul ba): nu mdog mdzes pa chags par 'os po zhog mthong nas tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i yid la byed pa bzung bar gyur to//de na dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa'i dge slong 'di snyam du sems te/
370b4('dul ba): gnas 'dir bdag dbyar gnas par dam bcas na/bud med gzhon nu mdzes pa chags par 'os pa zhig mthong nas/tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i yid la byed pa'i mtshan ma bzung bas
370b5('dul ba): gnas 'dir bdag dbyar gnas gnas na/gzhi des bdag gi srog gi bar chad dang /dge sbyong gi tshul gyi bar chad dang /tshangs par spyod pa'i bar chad du 'gyur gyis/ma la
370b6('dul ba): bdag 'di nas 'gro'o snyam nas/des de lta bus rkyen byas te/gnas de nas song ba las dbyar ral na ltung ba med//'di ltar yang dbyar gnos par dam bcas pa'i dge slong gi
370b7('dul ba): nor gyi gter zhig mthong ngo //de na dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa'i dge slong 'di snyam du sems te/gnas 'dir bdag dbyar gnas par dam bcas na/bdag gis 'dir
371a1('dul ba): nor gyis gter zhig mthong bas gnas 'dir bdag dbyar gnas na/gzhi dri bdag srog gi bar chad dang /dge sbyong gi tshul gyi bar chad dang /tshangs par spyod
371a2('dul ba): ba'i bar chad du 'gyur gyis/mA la bdag gnas 'di nas 'gro'o snyam nas/des de lta bus rkyen byas te/gnas de nas song ba los dbyar ral na ltung ba med//'di ltar yang
371a3('dul ba): dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa'i dge slong gi drung du gnyen dag 'ongs nas/mi 'tsham pa'i gsol bas gsol ba 'debs te/'phags pa khyod ci'i phyir mgo bregs shing lhung
371a4('dul ba): bzed lag tu thogs te/rigs kyi grong nas grong du rgyu zhing gos ngur smrig grang mo 'dis kyang lus gdung bar bgyi/'phags pa khyod tshur spyon 'dod pa la yongasu spyod cig/sbyin
371a5('dul ba): pa dag stsol cig/bsod nams dag gyis shig/de ni dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa'i dge slong 'di snyam du sems te/bdag gnas 'odar dbyar gnas par dom bcas pos//
371a6('dul ba): de bdag gi drung du gnyen dag 'ongs nas/mi 'tsham pa'i gsol bas gsol ba 'debs te/'phags pa khyod ci'i phyir mgo blags shing lhung bzed lag tu thogs te/rigs
371a7('dul ba): kyis grong nas grong du rgyu gos ngur smrig grang mo 'dis kyang /lus gzung bar bgyi/'phags pa khyod tshur spyon 'dod po la yongasu spyod cig/sbyin pa dag stsol cig/bsod nams
371b1('dul ba): dag gyis shig ces zer te/gal te gnas 'dir bdag dbyar gnas na/gzhi des bdag gi srog gi bar chad dang /dge sbyong gi tshul gyi bar chad dang /tshangs par spyod pa'i bar chad du
371b2('dul ba): 'gyur gyis mA la bdag gnas 'di nas 'gro'o snyam nas/des de lta bus rkyen byas te/gnas de nas song ba las dbyar ram na ltung ba medo//'di ltar yang rgyal po dpung gis chogs
371b3('dul ba): yan lag bzhi go bstan pa glang po che'i tshogs dang /rta nga'i tshogs dang /shong rta pa'i tshogs dang /dpung bu chung gi tshogs can kun dga' ra bA mo'i bar du lhags nas/spa
371b4('dul ba): thab su bskur ba sgrogs shing shes ldan dag shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong dag zung zhig ces bya ba nas/gong du gso sbyong gi gzhir ji skad bstan pa de bzhin du rgyas par rdzogs par bya ste/de
371b5('dul ba): nu dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa'i dge slong 'di snyam du se mos te/gnas 'dir bdag dbyar gnas par ngom bcas nA/rgyal po dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi gong skon pa ra nA dza
371b6('dul ba): tshogs dang /rta nga'i tshogs can zhes bya ba gong mi bzhin te/gal te gnas 'dir bdag dbyur gnas na/gzhi des bdag gi srog gi bar chad dang /dge sbyong gi rgyur gyi
371b7('dul ba): bar chad dang /tshangs par spyod pa'i bar chad du 'gyur gyis/ma la bdag gnas 'di nas 'gro'o snyam nas/des de lta bus rkyen byas te/gnas de nas song ba las/dbyar ngal na
372a1('dul ba): ltung ba med do//'di ltar yang dge slong gis skyes pa 'am/bud med dam/ma ning gang la brten nas dbyar gnas par dam bcas par gyur pa de rgyal pos bzung /
372a2('dul ba): ngam/btson du bzung ngam/bsad dam/de'i nor bregs sam/rgyal po'i 'jigs pa yul 'khor gzhan nam/yul gzhan du bros sam/shi bar gyur la den dbyar gnas
372a3('dul ba): par dam bcas pa'i dge slong 'di snyam du sems te/bdag skyes pa 'am/bud med dam/ma ning gang la brtan nas 'dir dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa de rgyas pos bzung ngam/
372a4('dul ba): btson du bathung ngam/bsad dam/de'i nor phrogs sam/rgyal po'i 'jigs pas yul 'khor gzhan nam/yul gzhan du bros sam/shi bar gyur pas/gal te bdag
372a5('dul ba): gnas 'dir dbyar gnas na/gzhi des bdag gi srog gi bar chad dang /dge sbyong gi tshul gyi bar chad dang /tshangs par spyod pa'i bar chad du 'gyur gyis/ma la bdag gnas
372a6('dul ba): 'di nas 'gro'o snyam nas/des de lta bus rkyen byas te/gnas de nas song ba las dbyar ral na ltung ba med//'di ltar yang chom rkun pa dag gis/grong bcom pa 'am/grong khyer
372a7('dul ba): bcom pa 'am/yul ljongs bcom nas kun dga' ra ba'i sgor lhags te/ba lang bsad dmi/ma he 'am/ra bsad pa'i khrag gis yan lag byugs nas dge slong rnams la
372b1('dul ba): phopo nye btang ste/'phags pa dag phyir byung zhig/bdag cag 'dir gan so zhes spring na/de na dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa'i dge slong 'di snyam du sems te/bdag gnas 'dir dbyar//
372b2('dul ba): gnas par dam bcas na/chomo rkun pa 'di dag grong btsem pa 'am/zhes bya bar gong ma bzhin te/des de lta bus rkyen byas te/gnas de nas song ba las dbyar ral na ltung ba mdo//
372b3('dul ba): 'di ltar yang dge slong gis bud med dang /skyes pa 'am/ma ning gang la brten nas/dbyar gnas par dam btsacas par gyur pa de/chom rkun pas bzung ngam/btson du bzung ngam/
372b4('dul ba): bsad dam/de'i nor phrogs sam/chom rkun pa'i 'jigs pas yul 'khor gzhan nas/yul gzhan du bros sam/shi bar gyur la/de na dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa'i dge
372b5('dul ba): slong 'di snyam du sems te/bdag bud med dam/skyes pa 'am/ma ning gang la brten te/dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa de/chom rkun dag gis bzung ngam/btson du bzung
372b6('dul ba): ngam/bsad dam/de'i nor phyogs sam/chom rkun pas 'jigs pas yul 'khor gzhan nam/yul gzhan du bros sam/shi bar gyur pas gal te bdag gnas 'dir dbyar
372b7('dul ba): gnas na/gzhi des bdag sreg bar chad dang /dge sbyong gi tshul gyi bar chad dang /tshangs par spyod pa'i bar chad du 'gyur gyis/ma la bdag gnas 'di nas 'gro'o snyam nas//
373a1('dul ba): des de lta bus rkyen byas te/gnas de nas song ba las/dbyar ral na ltung ba medo//'di ltar yang rgan zhugs mi shes pa rmongs pa mi gsal ba mikhas pa gzhan zhig/
373a2('dul ba): gis spyod yul lam/spyod yul gyi la mo kar rigs kyi bud med dam/rigs kyi na chung lag shes sam/kha ngan smras sam/reg pas mi rnams khros te/kun dga' ra ba'i sgor
373a3('dul ba): lhag so nas/spar thab su bsgrogs shing zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin te/des de lta bus rkyen byas te/gnas de nas song ba las dbyar ral na ltung ba medo//'di ltar yang dge
373a4('dul ba): slong gis bud med dam/skyes pa 'am/ma ning gang la brten nas/dbyar gnas par dam bcas par gyur pa de mi rnams kyis bzung ngam/btson du bzung ngam/bsad dam/der nor
373a5('dul ba): phrogs sam/mi'i 'jigs pas yul 'khor gzhan nam/yul gzhan du bros sam/shi bar gyur la/de na dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa'i dge slong 'di snyam du sems te/bdag
373a6('dul ba): bud med dam/skyes pa 'am/ma ning gang la brten te/gnas 'dir dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa de mi rnams kyis bzung ngam/btson du bzung ngam/bsad dam/de'i nor phrogs
373a7('dul ba): sam/mi'i 'jigs pas yul 'khor gzhan nam/yul gzhan du bros sam/shi bar gyur pas gal te bdag gnas 'dir dbyar gnas na/gzhi des bdag gi srog gis bar
373b1('dul ba): tshad dang /dge sbyong gi tshul gyi bar chad dang /tshangs par spyod pa'i bar chad du 'gyur gyis/ma la bdag gnas 'di nas 'gro'o snyam nas/des de lta bu'i rkyen byas te/gnas de nas song ba
373b2('dul ba): las dbyar ral ni ltung ba mdo//'di ltar yang mi ma yin pa gnas pa'i phyogs shig tu gtsug lag khang brtsigs la den rgan zhugs/mi shes pa/rmongs pa/mi gsal ba/mi mkhas
373b3('dul ba): ba/gzhan zhig gis mi rung ba'i phyogs shig tu gshang ba dang /gtso ba zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin te/des de lta bus rkyen byas te/gnas de nas song ba las dbyar ral na ltung
373b4('dul ba): bcas pa'i dge slong 'di snyam du sems te/bdag bud med dang /skyes pa 'am/ma ning gang la brtan nas/'dir dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa de mi ma yin pa bzung ngam/btson
373b5('dul ba): du bzung ngam/bsad dam/de'i nor phrogs sam/mi ma yin pa'i 'jigs pas yul 'khor gzhan nam/yul gzhan du bros sam/shi bar gyur pas/gal te bdag
374a1('dul ba): gnas 'dir dbyar gnas na/gzhi des bdag gi srog gi bar chad dang /dge sbyong gi tshul gyi bar chad dang /tshangs par spyod pa'i bar chad du 'gyur gyis/
374a2('dul ba): ma la bdag gnas 'di nas 'gro'o snyam nas/des de lta bus rkyen byas te/gnas de nas song po las/dbyar ral na ltung ba medo//'di ltar yang gdug pa gnas pa'i phyogs
374a3('dul ba): shig tu gtsug lag khang brtsigs la/de na rgan zhugs mi shes pa rmongs pa mi gsal ba mi mkhas pa gzhan zhig gis mi rung ba'i phyogs shig tu bshang ba dang /
374a4('dul ba): ba dang /mchil ma dang /snabs dang /skyugs pa dang /'khru ba dag bor zhing mi gtsang bas sbags pa'i gnas mal bzhug par gyur nas/gdugs pa khros te/spyod yul la//spyod du
374a5('dul ba): gyi lam klu 'am/'chag sa 'am/khyam sa sam/sgo khang rnam su 'dug nas/dge slong rnams la 'bab par byed/de na dbyar gnas par dum bcas pa'i dge slong 'di snyom
374a6('dul ba): du sems te/zhes bya ba gong ma bzhin te/des de lta bus rkyen byas te/gnas de nas song ba las dbyar ral na ltung ba medo//'di ltar yang dge slong gis bud med dam/skyes pa
374a7('dul ba): 'am/mi ning gang la brten te gnas 'dir dbyar gnas par dam btsas par gyur pa de/gtum po dog gis pi zung ngam/btson du bzung ngam/bsad dam/gtum po'i 'jigs
374b1('dul ba): bas yul 'khor gzhan nam/yul gzhan du bros sam/shi bar gyur la/de na dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa'i dge slong 'di snyam du sems te/bdag bud med dam/skyes pa 'am//
374b2('dul ba): ma ning gang la garten de/'dir dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa de gtum po rnams kyis bzung ngam/btson du bzung ste/dri nor phrogs sam/gtum po'i 'jigs pas/yul
374b3('dul ba): 'khor gzhan nam/yul gzhan du bros sam/shrI bar gyur pas/gal te bdag gnas 'dir dbyar gnas na/gzhi des bdag gi srog gi bar chad dang /dge sbyong gi tshul gyi
374b4('dul ba): bar chad dang /tshangs par spyod pa'i bar chad du 'gyur gyis/ma la bdag gnas 'di nas 'gro'o snyam nas/des de lta bus rkyen byas te/gnas de nas song ba las dbyar ral na ltung ba
374b5('dul ba): medo//'di ltar yang klu gnas pa'i sa phyogs shig tu gtsug lag khang brtsigs te/zhes bya bar gong ma bzhi no//des de lta bus rkyen byas te/gnas de nas song ba las/dbyar
374b6('dul ba): ral na ltung ba med do//'di ltar yang dge slong gis bud med dam/skyes pa 'am/ma ning gung la brten nas dbyar gnas par drim bcos par gyur pa de/klu rnams kyi bzung ngam/
374b7('dul ba): btson du bzung ngam/bsad dam/de'i nor phrogs sam/klu'i 'jigs pas/yul 'khor gzhan nam/yul gzhan du bros sam/shi bar gyur la/de na dbyer gnas par
375a1('dul ba): dam brgyas pa'i dge slong 'di snyam du sems te/bdag bud med dam/skyes pa 'am/ya ning gang la brten nas 'dir dbyar gnas par dam bsdus pa derma
375a2('dul ba): rnams kyis gzung ngam/btson du bzung ngam/bsad dam+b+ha/de'i nor phrogs sam/klu'i 'dzegs pas yul 'khor gzhan nam/yul gzhan du bros sam/shi bar gyu
375a3('dul ba): pas/gal te gnas 'dir bdag dbyar gnas na/gzhi des bdag go srog gi bar chad dang /dge sbyong gi dge tshul gyi bar chad dang /tshangs par spyod pa'i bar chad du 'gyur gyis
375a4('dul ba): ma la bdag gnas 'dri nas 'gro'o snyam nas//des de lta bus rkyen byas te/gnas de nas seng pa laso dbyar ral na ltung ba medado//'di ltar yang nogs khrod gcig tu gtsug
375a5('dul ba): lag khang brtsigs pa zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin te/des de lta bus rkyen byas te/gnas de nas song ba las dbyer ral na ltung ba med do//'di ltar yang dge slong gis bung
375a6('dul ba): med dam/skyes pa 'am/ma ning gang la brten nas dbyar gnas par dam bcas par gyur pa de mes tshig gam/de'i nor mes tshig gam/me'i 'jigs pas yul 'khor
375a7('dul ba): gzhan nam/yul gzhan du bros sam/shi bar gyur la/de na dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa'i dge slong 'di snyam du sems te/bdag bud med dam/skyes pa 'am/
375b1('dul ba): ma ning gang la brten te 'dir dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa de mes tshig gam/de'i nor mes tshig gam/me'i 'jigs pas yul 'khor gzhan nam/yul gzhan du bros sam/
375b2('dul ba): shi bar gyur pas/gal te gnas 'dir bdag dbyar gnas na/gzhi des bdag gi srog gi bar chad dang /dge sbyong gi tshul gyi bar chad dang /tshangs par spyod pa'i bar chad du 'gyur/
375b3('dul ba): gyis/ma la bdag gnas 'di nas 'gro'o snyam nas/des de lta bus rkyen byas te/gnas de nas song ba las/dbyar ral na ltung ba medo//'di ltar yang go shong zhig gis dbu
375b4('dul ba): btsug lag khang brtsigs la zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin te/des de lta bus rkyen byas te/gnas de nas song ba las/dbyar ral na ltung ba medo//'di ltar yang dge slong gis/
375b5('dul ba): bud med dam/skyes pa 'am/ma ning gang la brten de/dbyar gnas par dam bcas par gyur pa de chus khyer ram/de'i nor chus khyer ram/chu'i 'jigs pas yul 'khor
375b6('dul ba): gzhan nam/yu lo gzhan du bros sam/shi bar gyur la de na dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa'i dge slong 'di snyam du sems te/bdag bud med dam/skyes pa'am/ma ni
375b7('dul ba): gang la brten nas dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa de/chus khyer ro ma/de'i nor chus khyer ram/chu'i 'jigs pas yul 'khor gzhan nam/yul gzhon du bros sam/shi snga
376a1('dul ba): gyur pas gal te bdag gnas 'dir dbyar gnas na/gzhi des bdag go srog go bar chad dang /dge sbyong gi tshul gyi bar chad dang /tshangs par spyod pa'i bar
376a2('dul ba): chang du 'gyur gyis/ma la bdag gnas 'di nas 'gro'o snyam nas/des de lta bus rkyen byas te/gnas de nas song ba las dbyar ral na ltung ba med///
376a3('dul ba): sdom la/dbyar ral ltung ba med pa dang //gnas par dram ni bcas pa dag/snga mo yi ni bcu gnyis dang //phyi ma yi ni bcu gnyis//'di ltar yang dbyar gnas par dam
376a4('dul ba): bcas pa'i dge slong gis dge slong zhig dge 'dun gyi dbyen bya ba rtsol zhing de lta bur dge slong rnams la go bar byed/kun tu go bar byed/slob par byed/'dzin du 'jug par
376a5('dul ba): byed cing gang yang gnas 'dir dbyar gyi nang logs nyid du dge 'dun bye bar 'gyur ba'i gnas 'di yod par mthong nas/de na dbyar gnas par dmo bcas pa'i dge slong 'di
376a6('dul ba): snyom du sems te/gnas 'dri ro bdag dbyar gnas par dam btsas na/dge slong 'di dge 'dun myi dbyen bya bar rtsol zhing /de lta de lta bur dag slong rnams la go bar byed/
376a7('dul ba): kun tu go bar byed/slob par byed/'dzin du 'jug par byed cing /gang yang gnas 'dir dbyer gyi nango log pa nyid du dge 'dur bya bar 'gyur ba'i gnas 'di yod de/go
376b1('dul ba): te gnas 'dir bdag dbyar gnas na gang yang mi mthun pa'i sems skyes sam/ma brtags pa'i tshig byung na/bdag gis ma thob pa thob par bya ba dang /ma rtogs pa rtogs par
376b2('dul ba): byu ba dang /mngon sumo du ma byas pa mngon sum du bya ba'i bar chad du 'gyur ba'i gnas 'di yod pas/mi la bdag gnas 'di nas 'gro'o snyam nos/deste de lta bus rkyen byas te/
376b3('dul ba): gonas de nas song ba las dbyor ral na ltung ba med//'di ltar yang dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa'i dge slong gis gnas ga ge mo zhig tu/dge slong zhig gis dge 'dron gyi dbyen
376b4('dul ba): byubar rtul zhing de lta de lta byu dge smrang rnams lag par byed/kun+da d+h+r-ig par byed/rlob par byed/'dzin du 'jug par byed cing /glang yang gnas der dbyur gyin du lags nyid
376b5('dul ba): dge 'dun bye bar 'gyur ba'i gnas 'di yod par thos lo/dge slong de dang ni bdag tu gtam 'dres pa/phebs par spro tha/spros 'dren pa/'gags po shes pa yin gyis/gal
376b6('dul ba): te dug der snang na/bdag gis ji ltar gnas der dbyar gyi na log su dge 'dun bye bar mi 'gyur ba de lta de ltar gyi nus snyam nas dge slong gis zhag bdun byin gyi brlabs
376b7('dul ba): dge tshun gyi bya ba'i phyir 'gro bar byi ste/gas te dang sa na mnas/ma mngon 'gam tshangs can du hU~M //gal te dge 'dun gyi bya ba phyir des song ba las nag
377a1('dul ba): m+bu sa/spya spyan gyung ba sro// Sh+Ta nga nas pa da bas dge rlung nas gnas rgyun na d+hA na gyu/
377a2('dul ba): gyi dbyen bya ba rtsol zhing de lta de lta bur dge slong rnams la go bar byed/kun to glo bar byed/slob par byed/'dzin du 'jug par byed cing /gang yang gnas der bya
377a3('dul ba): nad logs nyid du dge 'dun bye bar 'gyur ba'i gnas 'di yod par zas la/dge slong de dang bdag tu gtom dres pa dang /khebs par smra ba dang /smos 'drin pa yong 'grogs
377a4('dul ba): bshes pa ma yin mod kyi 'on kyang dge slong de gang dang gtam 'dres pa/phebs par smra ba/smos 'dren pa/'grogs pa shes pa'i dge slong de dang bdag tu gtam 'dres pa
377a5('dul ba): phebs par sgrub/sgos 'dren pa/'grogs pashes pa yin gyis/bdag der song la/bdag gis ji ltar gnas der dbyar gyi nang lagasu dge 'dun bya bar mi 'byung ba de lta
377a6('dul ba): de ltar bya nus snyam nas/dge slong gis zhag bdun byin gyis brlabs la/dge 'dun gyi bya ba'i phyir 'gro bar bya ste/gol te sang na legs/me song na 'gus chubs kyi
